string: The PREDIMED study is a randomized nutritional intervention trial for primary cardiovascular prevention based on community-dwelling men and women at high risk of cardiovascular disease .
label: method

string: Dietary information was collected at baseline and yearly using a validated 137-item food frequency questionnaire ( FFQ ) .
label: method

string: We assigned GI values of each item by a 5-step methodology , using the International Tables of GI and GL Values .
label: method

string: Deaths were ascertained through contact with families and general practitioners , review of medical records and consultation of the National Death Index .
label: method

string: Cox regression models were used to estimate multivariable-adjusted hazard ratios ( HR ) and their 95 % CI for mortality , according to quartiles of energy-adjusted dietary GI/GL .
label: method

string: To assess repeated measures of exposure , we updated GI and GL intakes from the yearly FFQs and used Cox models with time-dependent exposures .
label: method

string: We followed 3,583 non-diabetic subjects ( 4.7 years of follow-up , 123 deaths ) .
label: result

string: As compared to participants in the lowest quartile of baseline dietary GI , those in the highest quartile showed an increased risk of all-cause mortality [ HR = 2.15 ( 95 % CI : 1.15-4 .04 ) ; P for trend = 0.012 ] .
label: result

string: In the repeated-measures analyses using as exposure the yearly updated information on GI , we observed a similar association .
label: result

string: Dietary GL was associated with all-cause mortality only when subjects were younger than 75 years .
label: result

string: Alcohol consumption of college students has a fluctuating nature , which might impact the measurement of intervention effects .
label: background

string: By using 25 follow-up time-points , this study tested whether intervention effects are robust or might vary over time .
label: background

string: Data were used from a two-arm parallel group randomized controlled trial applying ecological momentary assessment ( EMA ) with 30 data time-points in total .
label: method

string: Students between 18 and 24 years old who reported heavy drinking in the past six months and who were ready to change their alcohol consumption were randomly assigned to the experimental ( n = 456 : web-based brief alcohol intervention ) and control condition ( n = 451 : no intervention ) .
label: method

string: Outcome measures were weekly alcohol consumption , frequency of binge drinking , and heavy drinking status .
label: method

string: According to the intention-to-treat principle , regression analyses revealed that intervention effects on alcohol consumption varied when exploring multiple follow-up time-points .
label: result

string: Intervention effects were found for a ) weekly alcohol consumption at 1 , 2 , 3 , 4 , and 7 weeks follow-up , b ) frequency of binge drinking at 1 , 2 , 7 , and 12 weeks follow-up , and c ) heavy drinking status at 1 , 2 , 7 , and 16 weeks follow-up .
label: result

string: Netherlands Trial Register NTR2665 .
label: background

string: This cross-sectional analysis was performed in 1,217 participants ( 95 % of the active cohort ) in EDIC years 18/19 after an average of 24 years of follow-up .
label: method

string: Cheiroarthropathy-defined as the presence of any one of the following : adhesive capsulitis , carpal tunnel syndrome , flexor tenosynovitis , Dupuytren 's contracture , or a positive prayer sign-was assessed using a targeted medical history and standardized physical examination .
label: method

string: A self-administered questionnaire ( Disabilities of the Arm , Shoulder and Hand [ DASH ] ) assessed functional disability .
label: method

string: Cheiroarthropathy was present in 66 % of subjects ( 64 % of the INT group and 68 % of the CONV group ; P = 0.1640 ) and was associated with age , sex , diabetes duration , skin intrinsic fluorescence , HbA1c , neuropathy , and retinopathy ( P < 0.005 for each ) .
label: result

string: DASH functional disability scores were worse among subjects with cheiroarthropathy ( P < 0.0001 ) .
label: result

string: This prospective randomized controlled study included 180 eligible inpatients and outpatients randomly assigned to an ARD treatment ( n. = 60 ) , ginger-partitioned stimulation ( n = 60 ) , or combination treatment ( n = 60 ) .
label: method

string: Patients assigned to the ARD group were given oral celecoxib , methotrexate , and esomeprazole .
label: method

string: Patients assigned to the ginger-partitioned stimulation group were given ginger-partitioned acupoint stimulation at zusanli ( ST 36 ) in addition to the ARDs .
label: method

string: Patients in the combination treatment group were given oral sanhuangwuji powder , ginger-partitioned acupoint stimulation at susanli ( ST 36 ) , and ARDs .
label: method

string: All patients were followed up for 2 months to evaluate clinical effects and safety .
label: method

string: The study was registered in the World Health Organization database at the General Hospital of Chengdu Military Area Command Chinese People 's Liberation Army ( ChiCTR-TCC12002824 ) .
label: method

string: The combination treatment group had significantly greater improvements in RA symptoms , laboratory outcomes , and gastrointestinal symptom scores , compared with the other groups ( P < 0.05 ) .
label: result

string: The peptic ulcer healing rate in the combination treatment group was significantly greater than that in the ARD treatment group ( 2 = 16.875 , P < 0.05 ) and the ginger-partitioned stimulation group ( 2 = 6.171 , P < 0.05 ) .
label: result

string: Sixty-seven hip or pelvic 1.5-T MRIs ( 30:37 male : female , mean age : 53 years ) were retrospectively evaluated for the presence of hamstring and gluteus medius ( GM ) enthesitis by two readers ( a resident and an experienced radiologist ) .
label: method

string: Short tau inversion recovery ( STIR ) and T1-weighted pre - and post-contrast ( T1 + Gd ) images were evaluated by each reader at two sessions .
label: method

string: A consensus reading of two senior radiologists was regarded as the gold standard .
label: method

string: Clinical data was retrieved from patients ' referral form and medical files .
label: method

string: Cohen 's kappa was used for intra - and inter-observer agreement calculation .
label: method

string: Diagnostic properties were calculated against the gold standard reading .
label: method

string: A total of 228 entheses were evaluated .
label: result

string: Gold standard analysis diagnosed 83 ( 36 % ) enthesitis lesions .
label: result

string: Intra-reader reliability for the experienced reader was significantly ( p = 0.0001 ) higher in the T1 + Gd images compared to the STIR images ( hamstring : k = 0.84 / 0.45 , GM : k = 0.84 / 0.47 ) .
label: result

string: Sensitivity and specificity increased from 0.74 / 0.8 to 0.87 / 0.9 in the STIR images and T1 + Gd sequences .
label: result

string: Intra-reader reliability for the inexperienced reader was lower ( p > 0.05 ) .
label: result

string: Randomized , single-blind , clinical trial among 217 dyads ( 1 parent : 1 teenaged learner 's - permit holder ) to test TDP effectiveness on increasing the quantity and diversity of supervised practice and improving the teenagers ' prelicensed driving performance .
label: method

string: The study was conducted from December 2011 through January 2013 in Southeastern Pennsylvania .
label: method

string: Dyads were randomized ( 3:2 ) to receive the TDP or the Pennsylvania driver 's manual ( control group ) .
label: method

string: The TDP is a psychoeducational intervention designed to increase the quantity and diversity of parent-supervised practice .
label: method

string: Materials are grouped by the following driving environments : empty parking lots , suburban residential streets , intermediate ( 1 - or 2-lane ) roads , highways , rural roads with curves and elevation changes , and commercial districts .
label: method

string: The main outcomes were self-reported practice driving across 6 environments and 2 conditions and driving performance as measured by the teenagers ' completion of the standardized and validated tODA 24 weeks after enrollment .
label: method

string: Certified professional driving evaluators blinded to randomization status terminated the tODA if they determined that the teenager could not safely complete it .
label: method

string: We examined mean differences in the quantity of supervised practice , differences in the overall proportion of teenagers in each group that had assessments terminated for unsafe driving , and the point of termination during the assessment .
label: method

string: The TDP dyads reported more practice in 5 of the 6 environments and at night and in bad weather compared with the control dyads .
label: result

string: Overall , 5 of 86 TDP teenagers ( 6 % ) had the tODA terminated compared with 10 of 65 control teenagers ( 15 % ) ( risk difference [ TDP-control ] , -9 % [ 95 % CI , -21 % to 2 % ] ; P = .06 ) .
label: result

string: The hazard ratio for exposure to TDP was 0.35 ( 95 % CI , 0.12-1 .03 ; P = .05 , log-rank test ) .
label: result

string: clinicaltrials.gov Identifier : NCT01498575 .
label: background

string: Impairment in left ventricular systolic function has been described in heart failure ( HF ) with preserved ejection fraction ( HFpEF ) , but its prognostic relevance is not known .
label: background

string: We determined whether left ventricular longitudinal strain ( LS ) is predictive of cardiovascular outcomes in HFpEF beyond clinical and conventional echocardiographic measures .
label: background

string: LS was assessed by 2-dimensional speckle-tracking echocardiography at baseline in 447 patients with HFpEF enrolled in the Treatment of Preserved Cardiac Function Heart Failure With an Aldosterone Antagonist ( TOPCAT ) trial .
label: result

string: At a median follow-up of 2.6 years ( interquartile range , 1.5-3 .9 years ) , 115 patients experienced the primary composite outcome of cardiovascular death , HF hospitalization , or aborted cardiac arrest .
label: result

string: Impaired LS , defined as an absolute LS < 15.8 % , was present in 52 % of patients and was predictive of the composite outcome ( adjusted hazard ratio , 2.14 ; 95 % confidence interval , 1.26-3 .66 ; P = 0.005 ) , cardiovascular death alone ( adjusted hazard ratio , 3.20 ; 95 % confidence interval , 1.44-7 .12 ; P = 0.004 ) , and HF hospitalization alone ( adjusted hazard ratio , 2.23 ; 95 % confidence interval , 1.16-4 .28 ; P = 0.016 ) after adjustment for clinical and conventional echocardiographic variables .
label: result

string: LS was the strongest echocardiographic predictor of the composite outcome .
label: result

string: Exploratory analysis in a subset of 131 patients with follow-up LS assessed after 12 to 18 months demonstrated a trend toward improvement in LS associated with spironolactone in patients enrolled in the Americas but not in Russia or Georgia .
label: result

string: URL : http://www.clinicaltrials.gov .
label: background

string: Unique identifier : NCT00094302 .
label: background

string: We performed a multicenter randomized controlled trial .
label: method

string: We enrolled women at 36 weeks of gestation or greater with a singleton live fetus in cephalic presentation , intact membranes , an unfavorable cervix ( dilation less than 3 cm ; if 2 cm , less than 80 % effaced ) , and no contraindication to labor or either study agent .
label: method

string: Women were allocated to either a cervical Foley catheter inflated to 30 mL or dinoprostone for up to 12 hours .
label: method

string: Oxytocin was allowed only after study agent removal .
label: method

string: The primary outcome was time from agent placement to delivery .
label: method

string: Secondary outcomes included delivery by 24 hours , vaginal delivery by 24 hours , time to vaginal delivery , cesarean delivery rate , and rate of tachysystole .
label: method

string: Analysis was by intent-to-treat .
label: method

string: We enrolled 376 patients , 185 allocated to Foley catheter and 191 to dinoprostone .
label: result

string: In the Foley catheter group , time to delivery was shorter ( median 21.6 compared with 26.6 hours ; P = .003 ) , more patients delivered within 24 hours ( 56 % compared with 40 % ; P = .003 ) , more delivered vaginally within 24 hours ( 44 % compared with 30 % ; P = .004 ) , and time to vaginal delivery was shorter ( median 20.1 compared with 24.3 hours ; P = .005 ) .
label: result

string: The cesarean delivery rates were 29 % compared with 39 % ( P = .07 ) .
label: result

string: Uterine tachysystole occurred in 0 % compared with 3 % ( P = .06 ) .
label: result

string: ClinicalTrials.gov , www.clinicaltrials.gov , NCT01402050 .
label: background

string: LEVEL OF EVIEDENCE : I.
label: background

string: Bystander intervention approaches offer promise for reducing rates of sexual violence on college campuses .
label: background

string: Most interventions are in-person small-group formats , which limit their reach and reduce their overall public health impact .
label: background

string: A random probability sample of 743 male undergraduate students ( aged 18 to 24 years ) attending a large , urban university located in the southeastern United States was recruited online and randomized to either RealConsent ( n = 376 ) or a Web-based general health promotion program ( n = 367 ) .
label: method

string: Participants were surveyed online at baseline , postintervention , and 6-months postintervention .
label: method

string: RealConsent was delivered via a password-protected Web portal that contained six 30-minute media-based and interactive modules covering knowledge of informed consent , communication skills regarding sex , the role of alcohol and male socialization in sexual violence , empathy for rape victims , and bystander education .
label: method

string: Primary outcomes were self-reported prosocial intervening behaviors and sexual violence perpetration .
label: method

string: Secondary outcomes were theoretical mediators ( eg , knowledge , attitudes ) .
label: method

string: At 6-month follow-up RealConsent participants intervened more often ( P = .04 ) and engaged in less sexual violence perpetration ( P = .04 ) compared to controls .
label: result

string: In addition , RealConsent participants reported greater legal knowledge of sexual assault ( P < .001 ) , greater knowledge of effective consent ( P < .001 ) , less rape myths ( P < .001 ) , greater empathy for rape victims ( P < .001 ) , less negative date rape attitudes ( P < .001 ) , less hostility toward women ( P = .01 ) , greater intentions to intervene ( P = .04 ) , less hyper-gender ideology ( P < .001 ) , less positive outcome expectancies for nonconsensual sex ( P = .03 ) , more positive outcome expectancies for intervening ( P < .001 ) , and less comfort with other men 's inappropriate behaviors ( P < .001 ) .
label: result

string: Clinicaltrials.gov : NCT01903876 ; http://clinicaltrials.gov/show/NCT01903876 ( Archived by WebCite at http://www.webcitation.org/6S1PXxWKt ) .
label: background

string: This two-part , randomized , double-blind , placebocontrolled , four-period cross-over study was performed in healthy males ( 18 - 45 years ) .
label: method

string: In each period , subjects received 40 mg enoxaparin ( in part 1 ) , 5,000 units UFH ( in part 2 ) , or placebo followed by 4 or 16 mg/kg sugammadex , or placebo .
label: method

string: Treatments were separated by 4 days .
label: method

string: Primary endpoints were anti-Xa activity and APTT both time-averaged from 3 to 30 minutes post-dose .
label: method

string: Geometric mean ratios ( GMRs ) and their two-sided 90 % confidence limits were calculated for anticoagulant plus sugammadex ( 4 or 16 mg/kg ) vs. anticoagulant plus placebo .
label: method

string: The pre-specified threshold for a potential effect of clinical relevance was a 90 % upper confidence limit ( UCL ) > 1.50 .
label: method

string: In part 1 ( n = 13 ) , the 90 % UCLs were 1.07 and 1.08 for GMRs of anti-Xa activity after dosing with 4 and 16 mg/kg sugammadex , respectively .
label: result

string: In part 2 ( n = 43 ) , the 90 % UCLs for GMRs of APTT were 1.06 and 1.15 .
label: result

string: Neither sugammadex dose produced a treatment effect that met the pre-specified criterion for potential clinical relevance .
label: result

string: Treatments were generally well tolerated .
label: result

string: Italian Friesian dairy cows were given individually a supplement containing a mixture of silymarin ( 7.77 g/day/cow ) and lycopene ( 1.27 g/day/cow ) ( n = 10 ) or no supplement ( control ; n = 10 ) .
label: method

string: Treatment was administered from 7 days before the expected calving date to the first 14 days in milk .
label: method

string: At 7 days before the expected calving date , at calving , and 7 days postpartum , body condition score ( BCS ) and concentrations in serum of reactive oxygen metabolites ( ROM ) , total antioxidant capacity ( OXY ) and thiobarbituric acid reactive substances ( TBARS ) were evaluated .
label: method

string: Bodyweight , milk production , and somatic cell count ( SCC ) were determined at 7 , 14 and 21 days postpartum .
label: method

string: The mean time of treatment prior to calving was 6.3 ( min 4 , max 11 ) days .
label: result

string: Compared with control cows , treatment increased energy corrected milk yield ( 33.3 vs. 37.8 ( SEM 1.10 ) kg/day ; p = 0.006 ) and milk fat yield ( 1.14 vs. 1.32 ( SEM 0.06 ) kg/day ; p = 0.05 ) over the first 21 days of lactation .
label: result

string: Treated cows had lower mean log10 SCC compared to control cows ( 4.9 vs. 5.24 ( SEM 0.11 ) log10 cells/mL ) and had lower overall concentration of TBARS ( 1.47 vs. 1.59 ( SEM 0.016 ) nM/mL ; p < 0.001 ) , but similar concentrations of ROM and OXY in serum .
label: result

string: However there was a treatment by time interaction ( p = 0.09 ) for OXY , and at calving mean OXY was higher in treated cows compared with pre-calving values ( p < 0.001 ) .
label: result

string: With spherical intraocular lens ( IOL ) implantation , unaided vision of cataract patients with pre-existing corneal astigmatism is unsatisfactory because astigmatic spectacles will always be needed for clear vision .
label: background

string: Toric IOL has been proven to be a major improvement in cataract surgery for spectacle independence .
label: background

string: Aspheric property , reported to improve visual quality in a non-toric IOL , has now been added to toric IOL for even better unaided vision .
label: background

string: Cataract surgery was performed in cataract patients with pre-existing corneal astigmatism using 2 types of toric IOLs , a spherical toric IOL , Acrys of SN60T ( Group A ) and a aspheric toric IOL , Acrts of SN6AT , ( Group B ) as a randomized control trial .
label: method

string: The uncorrected distance ( UDVA ) and corrected ( CDVA ) distance visual acuities , residual astigmatism , spherical equivalent ( SE ) and spherical aberration were evaluated 3 months after implantation .
label: method

string: The present study included 44 eyes .
label: result

string: No statistically significant difference was found in UDVA , CDVA and residual astigmatism between both groups .
label: result

string: The UDVA of 0.1 logMAR or better was found in 78.26 % in Group A and 85.71 % in Group B.
label: result

string: In Group A , 78.26 % of eyes and in Group B , 76.19 % had a refractive astigmatism value within 0.50 diopter at KP90 ( polar value along the 90-degree meridian ) .
label: result

string: The spherical equivalent ( SE ) was within 0.5 diopter of emmetropia in 91.30 % in Group A and in 80.95 % in Group B. Group B had significantly lower spherical aberration Z ( 4 , 0 ) than Group A.
label: result

string: All Aboriginal ( 2002-2004 ) and a random sample of non-Aboriginal ( 2003 ) hospital admissions with a principal diagnosis of ACS were extracted from the WA Hospital Morbidity Data Collection of WA Data Linkage System .
label: method

string: Clinical information , history of co-morbidities and drugs were collected from medical notes by trained data collectors .
label: method

string: Evidence-based prescribing ( EBP ) was defined as prescribing of aspirin , statin and beta-blocker or angiotensin-converting enzyme inhibitor/angiotensin II antagonist .
label: method

string: Records for 1717 ACS patients discharged alive from hospitals were reviewed .
label: result

string: The majority of patients ( 71 % ) had EBP , and there was no significant difference between Aboriginal and non-Aboriginal patients ( 70 % vs 71 % , P = 0.36 ) .
label: result

string: Conversely , a significantly higher proportion of Aboriginal patients had none of the drugs prescribed compared with non-Aboriginal patients ( 11 % vs 7 % , P < 0.01 ) .
label: result

string: EBP for ACS was independently associated with male sex ( odds ratio ( OR ) 1.63 , 95 % confidence interval ( CI ) 1.26-2 .11 ) , previous admission for ACS ( OR 1.83 , 95 % CI 1.39-2 .42 ) and diabetes ( OR 1.36 , 95 % CI 1.04-1 .79 ) .
label: result

string: However , ACS patients living in regional and remote areas , attending district or private hospitals , or with a history of chronic obstructive pulmonary disease were significantly less likely to have ACS drugs prescribed at discharge .
label: result

string: The efficacy and safety outcome of laparoscopic surgery for clinical stages II/III colon cancer undergoing Japanese D3 dissection are still unclear .
label: background

string: Eligibility criteria included colon cancer ; tumor located in the cecum , ascending , sigmoid , or rectosigmoid colon ; T3 or T4 without involvement of other organs ; N0-2 ; and M0 .
label: method

string: Patients were randomized preoperatively and underwent tumor resection with D3 dissection .
label: method

string: Safety analyses were conducted by per-protocol set .
label: method

string: A total of 1057 patients were randomized between October 2004 and March 2009 .
label: result

string: By per-protocol set , 524 patients who underwent open surgery and 533 patients who underwent laparoscopic surgery were analyzed .
label: result

string: D3 dissection was performed in 521 ( 99.4 % ) patients in the open surgery arm and 529 ( 99.2 % ) patients in the laparoscopic surgery arm .
label: result

string: Conversion to open surgery was needed for 29 ( 5.4 % ) patients .
label: result

string: Patients assigned to laparoscopic surgery had less blood loss ( P < 0.001 ) , although laparoscopic surgery lasted 52 minutes longer ( P < 0.001 ) .
label: result

string: Laparoscopic surgery was associated with a shorter time to pass first flatus , decreased use of analgesics after 5 postoperative days , and a shorter hospital stay .
label: result

string: Morbidity [ 14.3 % ( 76/533 ) vs 22.3 % ( 117/524 ) , P < 0.001 ] was lower in the laparoscopic surgery arm .
label: result

string: In the PLATelet inhibition and patient Outcomes ( PLATO ) trial , ticagrelor significantly reduced rates of vascular and total death compared with clopidogrel .
label: method

string: In the 905 patients who died postenrolment in the PLATO trial ( n = 18624 ) , reviewers , blinded to study treatment , subclassified direct causes of death and evaluated whether infection or bleeding events contributed to fatal events .
label: method

string: Among vascular deaths , there were significantly fewer sudden deaths ( 63 ( 0.7 % ) vs 98 ( 1.1 % ) , p < 0.01 ) but no significant difference in deaths caused by acute myocardial infarction ( 179 ( 1.9 % ) vs 194 ( 2.1 % ) , p = 0.43 ) or heart failure ( 31 ( 0.3 % ) vs 42 ( 0.5 % ) , p = 0.20 ) with ticagrelor compared with clopidogrel .
label: result

string: For non-vascular deaths , there was no difference between treatments in deaths directly caused by infection .
label: result

string: Although , patients treated with ticagrelor were at lower risk for death where infection was either a direct cause or contributed to death ( 51 ( 0.5 % ) vs 76 ( 0.8 % ) , HR 0.67 ( 0.47 to 0.95 ) , p < 0.05 ) but not for bleeding ( 42 ( 0.5 % ) vs 42 ( 0.5 % ) , HR 0.99 ( 0.65 to 1.53 ) , p = 0.98 ) .
label: result

string: NCT00391872 ( http://www.clinicaltrial.gov ) .
label: background

string: A randomised double-blind , placebo-controlled , 24-week three centre trial of memantine ( 20mg/day ) was conducted in which tests of attention ( simple and choice reaction time ) and word recognition ( immediate and delayed ) from the CDR System were administered prior to dosing and again at 12 and 24weeks .
label: method

string: Although other results from this study have been published , the data from the CDR System tests were not included and are presented here for the first time .
label: method

string: Data were available for 51 patients ( 21 DLB and 30 PDD ) .
label: result

string: In both populations , memantine produced statistically significant medium to large effect sized improvements to choice reaction time , immediate and delayed word recognition .
label: result

string: Ankle fractures account for 9 % of all fractures with a quarter of these occurring in adults over 60years .
label: background

string: The short term disability and long-term consequences of this injury can be considerable .
label: background

string: Current opinion favours open reduction and internal fixation ( ORIF ) over non-operative treatment ( fracture manipulation and the application of a standard moulded cast ) for older people .
label: background

string: Both techniques are associated with complications but the limited published research indicates higher complication rates of fracture malunion ( poor position at healing ) with casting .
label: background

string: The aim of this study is to compare ORIF with a modification of existing casting techniques , Close Contact Casting ( CCC ) .
label: background

string: We propose that CCC may offer an equivalent functional outcome to ORIF and avoid the risks associated with surgery .
label: background

string: This study is a pragmatic multi-centre equivalence randomised controlled trial .
label: method

string: 620 participants will be randomised to receive ORIF or CCC after sustaining an isolated displaced unstable ankle fracture .
label: method

string: Participants will be recruited from a minimum of 20 National Health Service ( NHS ) acute hospitals throughout England and Wales .
label: method

string: Participants will be aged over 60years and be ambulatory prior to injury .
label: method

string: Follow-up will be at six weeks and six months after randomisation .
label: method

string: The primary outcome is the Olerud & Molander Ankle Score , a functional patient reported outcome measure , at 6months .
label: method

string: Follow-up will also include assessments of mobility , ankle range of movement , health related quality of life and complications .
label: method

string: The six-month follow-up will be conducted face-to-face by an assessor blinded to the allocated intervention .
label: method

string: A parallel economic evaluation will consider both a health service and a broader societal perspective including the individual and their family .
label: method

string: In order to explore patient experience of their treatment and recovery , a purposive sample of 40 patients will also be interviewed using a semi-structured interview schedule between 6-10weeks post treatment .
label: method

string: Current Controlled Trials ISRCTN04180738 .
label: background

string: Chronic kidney disease ( CKD ) is associated with an increased risk of cardiovascular events following acute coronary syndrome ( ACS ) .
label: background

string: The underlying pathobiology and optimal treatments for this population continue to be evaluated .
label: background

string: The MERLIN-TIMI 36 ( Metabolic Efficiency With Ranolazine for Less Ischemia in Non-ST-Elevation Acute Coronary Syndromes-Thrombolysis in Myocardial Infarction 36 ) trial randomized non-ST-elevation ACS patients to ranolazine or placebo , with no exclusion for renal dysfunction ( except dialysis ) .
label: method

string: We conducted a prespecified analysis among 6543 patients based on the degree of CKD .
label: method

string: Patients with worse renal function were older with more comorbidities ( P < 0.0001 for each ) .
label: result

string: They were less likely to receive evidence-based cardiovascular medicines ( P < 0.04 for each ) .
label: result

string: Rates of an early invasive management strategy varied based on renal function ; however , among patients with the highest TIMI risk scores , the rates of an early invasive management strategy were similar regardless of glomerular filtration rate ( GFR ) ( Pinteraction = 0.005 ) .
label: result

string: Lower GFR was associated with increased rates of cardiovascular disease or myocardial infarction in the short and long term , even after adjustment ( GFR < 30 vs 90 mL/min/1 .73 m ( 2 ) ; hazard ratio [ HR ] : 3.24 [ 95 % confidence interval { CI } : 1.26-8 .38 ] through 7 days and HR : 2.12 [ 95 % CI : 1.33-3 .39 ] through 1 year ) .
label: result

string: The effect of ranolazine vs placebo on clinical outcomes was similar among those with and without CKD ( Pinteraction = not significant ) .
label: result

string: Febrile neutropenia ( FN ) is a common and serious complication of cancer chemotherapy associated with significant morbidity and mortality .
label: background

string: Cefozopran ( CZOP ) is a potential candidate for empirical monotherapy in FN .
label: background

string: However , studies on the use of CZOP as empirical treatment for pediatric patients with FN are quite limited .
label: background

string: The purpose of this study was to compare the efficacy and safety of CZOP with cefepime ( CFPM ) empirical monotherapy in pediatric cancer patients with FN .
label: background

string: A total of 64 patients with 224 episodes of FN were randomly assigned to receive antibiotic therapy with either CZOP ( 100 mg/kg/day ) or CFPM ( 100 mg/kg/day ) .
label: method

string: Of these episodes , 223 were considered eligible for the study .
label: method

string: Success was defined as resolution of febrile episodes and clinical signs of infection within 120 hr following the start of antibiotic therapy .
label: method

string: The success rate was not significantly different between the CZOP ( 64.0 % ) and CFPM ( 56.3 % ) groups ( P = 0.275 ) .
label: result

string: Duration of fever , duration of antibiotic therapy , and the success rate in patients with blood stream infection did not differ between the two groups .
label: result

string: There was no infection-related mortality in the study period .
label: result

string: Asian Americans have the highest incidence of hepatocellular carcinoma ( HCC ) , the major form of primary liver cancer , of all ethnic groups in the United States .
label: background

string: Chronic hepatitis B virus ( HBV ) infection is the most common cause of HCC , and as many as 1 in 10 foreign-born Asian Americans are chronically infected with HBV .
label: background

string: We tested the effectiveness of a culturally tailored liver cancer education program for increasing screening for HBV among Chinese , Korean , and Vietnamese Americans residing in the Baltimore-Washington metropolitan area , from November 2009 through June 2010 .
label: background

string: We used a cluster randomized controlled trial to recruit volunteer participants from community-based organizations ( CBOs ) in the Baltimore-Washington metropolitan area .
label: method

string: We selected 877 participants by using a pretest survey .
label: method

string: People were eligible to participate if they had not attended a hepatitis B-related education program in the past 5 years .
label: method

string: The intervention group ( n = 441 ) received a 30-minute educational program , and the control group ( n = 436 ) received an educational brochure .
label: method

string: After attending the educational program , the intervention group completed a post-education survey .
label: method

string: Six months later , participants in both groups were followed up by telephone .
label: method

string: Receipt of HBV screening was the outcome measure .
label: method

string: Approximately 79 % ( n = 688 ) of participants completed the 6-month follow-up telephone survey .
label: result

string: Among those who had not had HBV screening at baseline ( n = 446 ) , the adjusted odds of self-reported receipt of HBV screening at the 6-month follow-up to the educational program were significantly higher for the intervention group than for the control group ( odds ratio = 5.13 ; 95 % confidence interval , 3.14-8 .39 ; P < .001 ) .
label: result

string: Chinese Americans and Vietnamese Americans had significantly higher odds of having HBV screening in the 6-month period than Korean Americans .
label: result

string: Sixty-one healthy , sedentary ( VOmax : 35 5 ml/kg/min ) , moderately overweight ( BMI : 27.9 1.8 ) , young ( age : 29 6 years ) men were randomized to sedentary living ( sedentary control group ; n = 18 ) , moderate ( moderate dose training group [ MOD ] : 300 kcal/day , n = 21 ) , or high ( high dose training group [ HIGH ] : 600 kcal/day , n = 22 ) dose physical exercise for 11 weeks .
label: method

string: The return rate for post-intervention testing was 82-94 % across groups .
label: result

string: Weekly exercise amounted to 2,004 24 and 3,774 68 kcal , respectively , in MOD and HIGH .
label: result

string: Cardiorespiratory fitness increased ( P < 0.001 ) 18 3 % in MOD and 17 3 % in HIGH , and fat percentage decreased ( P < 0.001 ) similarly in both exercise groups ( MOD : 32 1 to 29 1 % ; HIGH : 30 1 to 27 1 % ) .
label: result

string: Peripheral insulin sensitivity increased ( P < 0.01 ) ( MOD : 28 7 % ; HIGH : 36 8 % ) and the homeostasis model assessment of insulin resistance decreased ( P < 0.05 ) ( MOD : -17 7 % ; HIGH : -18 10 % ) .
label: result

string: The number of subjects meeting the criteria of the metabolic syndrome decreased by 78 % in MOD ( P < 0.01 ) and by 80 % in HIGH ( P < 0.05 ) .
label: result

string: General health assessed by questionnaire increased similarly in MOD ( P < 0.05 ) and HIGH ( P < 0.01 ) .
label: result

string: Hope is an essential dimension of successful coping in the context of illnesses such as HIV/AIDS , because positive expectations for the future alleviate emotional distress , enhance quality of life and have been linked to the capacity for behavioural change .
label: background

string: The social environment ( e.g. family , peers ) is a regulator of hope for people living with HIV/AIDS ( PLWHA ) .
label: background

string: In this regard , the dual aim of this article is ( 1 ) to analyze the influence of a peer adherence support ( PAS ) intervention and the family environment on the state of hope in PLWHA and ( 2 ) to investigate the interrelationship between the two determinants .
label: background

string: The Effective AIDS Treatment and Support in the Free State study is a prospective randomized controlled trial .
label: method

string: Participants were recruited from 12 public antiretroviral treatment ( ART ) clinics across five districts in the Free State Province of South Africa .
label: method

string: Each of these patients was assigned to one of the following groups : a control group receiving standard care , a group receiving additional biweekly PAS or a group receiving PAS and nutritional support .
label: method

string: Latent cross-lagged modelling ( Mplus ) was used to analyse the impact of PAS and the family environment on the level of hope in PLWHA .
label: method

string: The results of the study indicate that neither PAS nor the family environment has a direct effect on the level of hope in PLWHA .
label: result

string: Subsequent analysis reveals a positive significant interaction between family functioning and PAS at the second follow-up , indicating that better family functioning increases the positive effect of PAS on the state of hope in PLWHA .
label: result

string: This was a secondary analysis of data collected as part of the Rapid Anticonvulsant Medication Prior to Arrival Trial ( RAMPART ) , a study comparing intramuscular midazolam to intravenous lorazepam given by paramedics to patients with prehospital status epilepticus .
label: method

string: Subjects in RAMPART achieved a successful primary outcome if they had cessation of seizures by the time of emergency department arrival .
label: method

string: Data were collected on all subjects , but only the first enrollment for each individual was used in the primary analysis .
label: method

string: The patterns of repeat enrollment are described , along with the demographics of these subjects .
label: method

string: In addition , an intraclass correlation coefficient ( ICC ) was estimated to assess the amount of within-subject correlation and its effect on the estimated treatment effect when all enrollments are included in the analysis .
label: method

string: A total of 1,023 enrollments occurred in RAMPART among 893 unique individuals ( range of repeat enrollment observed = two to 14 ) .
label: result

string: The ICC for seizure cessation within individual was low at 0.119 ; when excluding subjects with benzodiazepine crossover , the ICC was 0.094 .
label: result

string: A widened electrocardiographic spatial QRS-T angle has been shown to be predictive of cardiovascular disease in HIV-infected individuals .
label: background

string: However , determinants and risk factors of developing widened QRS-T angle over time in this population remain unknown .
label: background

string: Spatial QRS-T angle was automatically measured from standard electrocardiogram of 1444 HIV-infected individuals without baseline widened spatial QRS-T angle from the Strategies for Management of Antiretroviral Therapy [ SMART ] , a clinical trial comparing two antiretroviral treatment strategies [ Drug Conservation ( DC ) vs. Viral Suppression ( VS ) ] .
label: result

string: Conditional logistic regression analysis was used to examine the association between baseline characteristics and incident widened spatial QRS-T angle ( a new angle > 93 in males and > 74 in females ) .
label: result

string: During 2544 person-years of follow-up , 199 participants developed widened angle at a rate of 7.8 per 100 person-years .
label: result

string: In unadjusted models , female sex , black race ( vs. white ) , DC treatment strategy , current and past smokers ( vs. never ) , history of alcohol abuse , greater body mass index , history of diabetes and higher levels of hs-C-reactive protein were associated with incident widened spatial QRS-T angle .
label: result

string: When these variables were entered together in the same model with adjustment for demographics and treatment strategy , DC treatment strategy [ OR ( 95 % CI ) : 1.50 ( 1.09 , 2.07 ) ] , female gender [ 1.69 ( 1.17 , 2.45 ) ] , current and past smoking ( vs. never ) [ 2.49 ( 1.63 , 3.81 ) and 1.93 ( 1.21 , 3.09 ) , respectively ] , and diabetes [ 2.28 ( 1.33 , 3.91 ) ] predicted incident widened spatial QRS-T angle .
label: result

string: Heavy drinking is common among students at UK universities .
label: background

string: US students overestimate how much their peers drink and correcting this through the use of social norm messages may promote responsible drinking .
label: background

string: 1,020 UK university students took part in an online study .
label: method

string: Participants were exposed to one of five message types : a descriptive norm , an injunctive norm , a descriptive and injunctive norm , or one of two control messages .
label: method

string: Message credibility was assessed .
label: method

string: Afterwards participants completed measures of intentions to drink responsibly and we measured usual drinking habits and perceptions of peer drinking .
label: method

string: Perceptions of peer drinking were associated modestly with usual drinking behavior , whereby participants who believed other students drank responsibly also drank responsibly .
label: result

string: Norm messages changed normative perceptions , but not in the target population of participants who underestimated responsible drinking in their peers at baseline .
label: result

string: Norm messages did not increase intentions to drink responsibly and although based on accurate data , norm messages were not seen as credible .
label: result

string: Hydroxyethyl starch ( HES ) is a colloid that has been widely used for fluid resuscitation for decades .
label: background

string: The newest generation of HES , tetrastarch , was believed to provide an efficient volume expansion without causing the side effects observed with former HES solutions .
label: background

string: However , this belief was based on physiological models and small studies rather than on firm clinical evidence .
label: background

string: Our aim was to assess the safety and efficacy of tetrastarch in a randomised clinical trial and in a systematic review .
label: background

string: We first conducted a blinded , clinical trial , in which we randomly assigned patients with severe sepsis in the intensive care unit to fluid resuscitation with either 6 % HES 130/0 .42 ( Tetraspan ) or Ringer 's acetate .
label: method

string: The primary outcome measure was death or dialysis-dependency at 90 days after randomisation .
label: method

string: Secondary outcomes described kidney function and serious adverse reactions .
label: method

string: Secondly , we systematically identified all randomised clinical trials comparing tetrastarch with either crystalloid or albumin in patients with sepsis and pooled their results in meta-analyses and trial sequential analyses .
label: method

string: Of the 804 patients who underwent randomisation , 798 were included in the modified-intention-to-treat population .
label: result

string: At 90 days after randomisation , 201 of 398 patients ( 51 % ) assigned to HES 130/0 .42 had died , as compared with 172 of 400 patients ( 43 % ) assigned to Ringer 's acetate ( relative risk 1.17 , p = 0.03 ) ; 1 patient in each group was dialysis-dependent at 90 days .
label: result

string: In the 90 day observation period , 87 patients ( 22 % ) assigned to HES received renal replacement therapy vs. 65 patients ( 16 % ) assigned to Ringer 's acetate ( relative risk 1.35 , p = 0.04 ) , and 38 patients ( 10 % ) vs. 25 patients ( 6 % ) had severe bleeding ( relative risk 1.52 , p = 0.09 ) .
label: result

string: Post-hoc sensitivity analysis showed a strongly significant increased risk of any bleeding with HES vs. Ringer 's acetate ( relative risk 1.56 , p = 0.003 ) .
label: result

string: In the systematic review , we identified nine trials that randomised 3,456 patients with sepsis .
label: result

string: In meta-analyses , tetrastarch vs. crystalloid or albumin lead to increased use of renal replacement therapy ( relative risk 1.36 , p = 0.009 ) and red blood cells ( relative risk 1.29 , p = 0.0002 ) and to more serious adverse events ( relative risk 1.30 , p = 0.03 ) .
label: result

string: Trials with low risk of bias suggested 11 % increased risk of death .
label: result

string: After adjusting the results with trial sequential analysis signals for harm persisted .
label: result

string: Chronic obstructive pulmonary disease ( COPD ) affects millions worldwide .
label: background

string: Although many therapies exist and are being developed to relieve symptoms and reduce mortality , few data are available to understand which of the therapeutic alternatives is the most cost-effective for COPD patients in everyday clinical practice , especially for traditional Chinese medicine ( TCM ) .
label: background

string: Comparative effectiveness research can help patients , clinicians , and decision-makers make best informed treatment decisions where such evidence was previously lacking .
label: background

string: This study aims to compare the effectiveness and economic evaluation of three treatments : ( 1 ) conventional Western medicine ; ( 2 ) TCM treatments , which have been evaluated and have certain effect ; and ( 3 ) a combination of both conventional Western medicine and TCM treatments , and then determine which treatment is the most suitable for COPD patients .
label: background

string: A multicenter , pragmatic , randomized , controlled trial is adopted .
label: method

string: A total of 360 patients will be recruited and randomly assigned to one of the three treatments group , with 120 in each group .
label: method

string: Patients in the conventional Western medicine group will be given Salbutamol , Formoterol , Salmeterol/fluticasone , respectively , according to the guidelines .
label: method

string: For the TCM group , patients will be given Bufei granule , Bu-Fei Jian-Pi granule , Bu-Fei Yi-Shen granule , and Yi-Qi Zi-Shen granule based on their corresponding TCM syndrome patterns , respectively .
label: method

string: For the combination of conventional medicine and TCM treatments group , patients will be given a combination of conventional Western medicine and TCM granules .
label: method

string: Treatments in each group are recognized as a whole comprehensive intervention .
label: method

string: After the 26-week treatment , another 26weeks will be followed up .
label: method

string: The outcome measures including the frequency and duration of acute exacerbations , lung function , dyspnea , exercise capacity , quality of life , and economic evaluation will be assessed .
label: method

string: ClinicalTrials.gov NCT01836016 .
label: background

string: Data were analyzed from 196 patients with type 1 diabetes who were randomized to receive sensor-augmented pump therapy in the 1-year STAR 3 trial .
label: method

string: CGM-glucose values and HbA1c levels from baseline and after 1 year were evaluated to determine associations of improvement in CGM-glucose at different times of the day with longitudinal improvement in HbA1c .
label: method

string: Improvement in HbA1c levels after 1 year was related to improvement in mean CGM-glucose levels in daytime ( 6 a.m.-midnight ) , overnight ( midnight-6 a.m. ) , and each mealtime period ( P < 0.0001 for each ) .
label: result

string: In multivariable analysis , only improvement in breakfast meal period was associated with improvement in HbA1c after 1 year , explaining 59 % of the HbA1c improvement using the partial R ( 2 ) test .
label: result

string: Moreover , among those patients who only improved CGM-glucose in the overnight period there was an associated improvement in breakfast meal period CGM-glucose of 26 22 mg/dL ( P < 0.01 ) .
label: result

string: Behavioral migraine approaches are effective in reducing headache attacks .
label: background

string: Availability of treatment might be increased by using migraine patients as trainers .
label: background

string: Therefore , Mrelle and colleagues developed and evaluated a home-based behavioral management training ( BMT ) by lay trainers ( 1 ) .
label: background

string: The maintenance of effects at long-term follow-up is studied in the present study .
label: background

string: Measurements were taken pre-BMT ( T0 ) , post-BMT ( T1 ) , at six-month follow-up ( T2 ) , and at long-term follow-up , i.e. two to four years after BMT ( T3 ) .
label: method

string: Data of 127 participants were analyzed with longitudinal multi-level analyses .
label: method

string: Short-term improvements in attack frequency and self-efficacy post-BMT were maintained at long-term follow-up ( DT0T3 = -.34 and DT0T3 = .69 , respectively ) .
label: result

string: The level of internal control that increased during BMT decreased from post-BMT to long-term follow-up ( DT0T3 = .18 ) .
label: result

string: Quality of life and migraine-related disability improved gradually over time ( DT0T3 = .45 and DT0T3 = -.26 , respectively ) .
label: result

string: As tau aggregation pathology correlates with clinical dementia in Alzheimer 's disease ( AD ) , a tau aggregation inhibitor ( TAI ) could have therapeutic utility .
label: background

string: Methylthioninium ( MT ) acts as a selective TAI in vitro and reduces tau pathology in transgenic mouse models .
label: background

string: An exploratory double-blind , randomized , placebo-controlled , dose-finding trial of MT ( 69 , 138 , and 228 mg/day ) was conducted in 321 mild/moderate AD subjects .
label: method

string: The primary outcome was change on the Alzheimer 's Disease Assessment Scale-cognitive subscale ( ADAS-cog ) at 24 weeks relative to baseline severity .
label: method

string: Effect of treatment on regional cerebral blood flow decline was determined in a sub-study in 135 subjects .
label: method

string: After 24 weeks , subjects were re-consented to enter sequential 6 - and 12-month blinded extension phases .
label: method

string: Registered with ClinicalTrials.gov ( NCT00515333 ) .
label: method

string: At 24 weeks , there were significant treatment benefits in two independent populations at the 138 mg/day dose : in moderate subjects on the ADAS-cog scale ( treatment effect : -5.42 units , corrected p = 0.047 ) and two other clinical scales ; in mild subjects on the more sensitive regional cerebral blood flow measure ( treatment effect : 1.97 % , corrected p < 0.001 ) .
label: result

string: With continued treatment for 50 weeks , benefit was seen on the ADAS-cog scale in both mild and moderate subjects .
label: result

string: The delivery of the highest dose was impaired due to dose-dependent dissolution and absorption limitations .
label: result

string: In this multicenter , prospective , randomized controlled trial , patients with curative gastric cancer were randomly assigned to undergo gastrectomy either with LigaSure or a conventional technique .
label: method

string: Of the 160 patients enrolled , 80 were randomized to the LigaSure group and 78 to the conventional group .
label: result

string: Patient characteristics were well balanced in the two groups .
label: result

string: There were no significant differences between the LigaSure and conventional groups in blood loss ( 288 vs. 260ml , respectively ; P = 0.748 ) or operative time ( 223 and 225min , respectively ; P = 0.368 ) ; nor in the incidence of surgical complications or duration of postoperative hospital stay .
label: result

string: In a subgroup analysis of patients who underwent gastrectomy that preserved the distal part of the greater omentum , the use of LigaSure significantly reduced blood loss ( 179 vs. 245ml ; P = 0.033 ) , and the duration of the operation ( 195 vs. 221min ; P = 0.039 ) .
label: result

string: This was a multicenter , randomized , double-blind , placebo and active antihypertensive drug parallel-controlled study .
label: method

string: After 2 weeks of placebo run-in period , 315 patients at 6 centers with diastolic blood pressure ( DBP ) between 95 to 109 mm Hg ( 1 mm Hg = 0.133 kPa ) while systolic blood pressure ( SBP ) below 180 mm Hg were randomized to receive aranidipine 5-20 mg/d ( n = 126 ) or retard-released felodipine 5-10 mg/d ( n = 126 ) for 12 weeks .
label: method

string: Others ( n = 63 ) received placebo for 4 weeks .
label: method

string: Their blood pressures were evaluated at baseline and the end of Weeks 4 , 8 and 12 .
label: method

string: After a 12-week treatment , SBP decreased from 148.8 10.7 mm Hg to ( 132.8 11.2 ) mm Hg while DBP dropped from ( 98.4 2.8 ) mm Hg to ( 83.9 7.5 ) mm Hg .
label: result

string: There were significant differences with the baseline values ( P < 0.0001 ) .
label: result

string: After a 4-week treatment , the reductions of SBP in aranidipine and retard-released felodipine groups were ( 12.1 11.0 ) mm Hg and ( 12.2 11.2 ) mm Hg while the reductions of DBP in two groups ( 11.8 6.9 ) mm Hg and ( 12.1 7.9 ) mm Hg respectively .
label: result

string: The reductions of SBP and DBP in two groups were ( 2.3 8.4 ) mm Hg and ( 4.0 5.1 ) mm Hg and they were significantly superior to that in placebo group ( P < 0.0001 ) .
label: result

string: But no significant difference existed between aranidipine and retard-released felodipine groups .
label: result

string: Also no significant differences were found between these two antihypertensive therapy groups at the end of Weeks 4 , 8 and 12 in the reduction of blood pressure , total response rate and blood pressure control rate .
label: result

string: But 20 mg daily aranidipine was significantly superior to 10 mg daily retard-released felodipine in the control rates of SBP and DBP .
label: result

string: Adverse events occurred at 24.22 % and 29.92 % in aranidipine and retard-released felodipine groups respectively ( P = 0.305 ) .
label: result

string: In our increasingly obesogenic environment , in which high-calorie convenience foods are readily available , food choices can drastically affect weight and overall health .
label: background

string: Learned food preferences , which are developed through repeated pairings with positively and negatively valenced stimuli , can contribute to obesity susceptibility if positive attitudes toward high-calorie foods are developed .
label: background

string: Thus , the modification of automatic associations with food may be a viable strategy to promote healthier eating behaviors .
label: background

string: Participants were randomly assigned to active or control IP .
label: method

string: In active IP ( n = 22 ) , high-calorie food images were implicitly primed with negatively valenced images , and low-calorie food images were implicitly primed with positively valenced images .
label: method

string: In control IP ( n = 20 ) , all food images were primed with neutral images of fixation crosses .
label: method

string: Food images were rated on the desire to eat immediately before and after IP .
label: method

string: A significant main effect of calorie ( high compared with low ; P < 0.001 ) and a significant calorie-by-group ( active compared with control ) interaction ( P = 0.025 ) were observed .
label: result

string: Post hoc tests identified a significantly greater high-calorie rating decline after active IP than after control IP ( P = 0.036 ) .
label: result

string: Furthermore , there was significantly greater change in high-calorie ratings than in low-calorie ratings in the active group ( P = 0.001 ) .
label: result

string: Active IP effects extended to high-calorie foods not specifically included in the intervention , which suggested an effect generalization .
label: result

string: Moreover , a greater change in high-calorie ratings than in low-calorie ratings persisted 3-5 d after active IP ( P < 0.007 ) , which suggested lasting effects .
label: result

string: Poisoning with organophosphorus ( OP ) compounds constitutes a global public health problem .
label: background

string: Standard treatment of OP poisoning involves use of atropine and pralidoxime .
label: background

string: While efficacy of atropine is well-established , clinical experience with pralidoxime in management of OP poisoning is controversial .
label: background

string: An open-label , parallel-group , randomized clinical trial was conducted in a tertiary care district hospital in West Bengal .
label: method

string: Patients presenting with features of OP poisoning were randomly allocated to receive atropine or atropine-plus-pralidoxime .
label: method

string: Efficacy was assessed by analyzing mortality , requirement for ventilator support and the duration of stay in hospital .
label: method

string: Chi-square test was done to compare the efficacy parameters between the two groups .
label: method

string: A two-tailed P-value < 0.05 was considered as statistically significant .
label: method

string: During the study period , 150 patients were screened following which 120 patients were randomized to either of the treatment arms .
label: result

string: Add-on pralidoxime therapy did not offer any appreciable benefit over atropine alone in terms of reducing mortality ( 18.33 % ( 11/60 ) versus 13.33 % ( 8/60 ) ) and ventilator requirement ( 5 % ( 3/60 ) versus 8.33 % ( 5/60 ) ) .
label: result

string: However , patients randomized in the add-on pralidoxime arm experienced longer duration of hospital stay ( 7.02 1.12 days ) than those receiving atropine-alone therapy ( 5.68 1.87 days ) ( P < 0.001 ) .
label: result

string: In a randomized controlled trial , 22 infants with PWS ( 12.9 7.1 months ) were followed over 2 years to compare a treatment group ( n = 10 ) with a waiting-list control group ( n = 12 ) .
label: method

string: Muscle thickness of 4 muscle groups was measured by using ultrasound .
label: method

string: Muscle strength was evaluated by using the Infant Muscle Strength meter .
label: method

string: Motor performance was measured with the Gross Motor Function Measurement .
label: method

string: Analyses of variance were used to evaluate between-group effects of GH on muscle thickness at 6 months and to compare pre - and posttreatment ( after 12 months of GH ) values .
label: method

string: Multilevel analyses were used to evaluate effects of GH on muscle thickness over time , and multilevel bivariate analyses were used to test relationships between muscle thickness , muscle strength , and motor performance .
label: method

string: A significant positive effect of GH on muscle thickness ( P < .05 ) was found .
label: result

string: Positive relationships were found between muscle thickness and muscle strength ( r = 0.61 , P < .001 ) , muscle thickness and motor performance ( r = 0.81 , P < .001 ) , and muscle strength and motor performance ( r = 0.76 , P < .001 ) .
label: result

string: A total of 64 early ( including 24 preperimetric ) glaucomatous and 40 normal eyes underwent macular and peripapillary retinal nerve fiber layer ( pRNFL ) scans ( 3D-OCT-2000 ) .
label: method

string: The area under the receiver operating characteristics ( AUC ) for glaucoma diagnosis was determined from the average thickness of the total 100 grids ( 6 6 mm ) , central 44 grids ( 3.6 4.8 mm ) , and peripheral 56 grids ( outside of the 44 grids ) , and for each macular sublayer : macular RNFL ( mRNFL ) , ganglion cell layer plus inner plexiform layer ( GCL/IPL ) , and mRNFL plus GCL/IPL ( ganglion cell complex [ GCC ] ) .
label: method

string: Correlation of OCT parameters with visual field parameters was evaluated by Spearman 's rank correlation coefficients ( rs ) .
label: method

string: The GCC-related parameters had a significantly larger AUC ( 0.82-0 .97 ) than GCL/IPL ( 0.81-0 .91 ) , mRNFL-related parameters ( 0.72-0 .94 ) , or average pRNFL ( 0.88 ) in more than half of all comparisons .
label: result

string: The central 44 grids had a significantly lower AUC than other analytical areas in GCC and mRNFL thickness .
label: result

string: Conversely , the peripheral 56 grids had a significantly lower AUC than the 100 grids in GCL/IPL inferior thickness .
label: result

string: Inferior thickness of GCC ( rs , 0.45-0 .49 ) and mRNFL ( rs , 0.43-0 .51 ) showed comparably high correlations with central visual field parameters to average pRNFL thickness ( rs , 0.41 , 0.47 ) even in the central 44 grids .
label: result

string: Forty-six children and adolescents with cerebral palsy were randomly assigned to either active ( 1 mA anodal ) or sham ( placebo ) tDCS over the left primary motor cortex ( Ml ) on five consecutive days .
label: method

string: Both group also received routine physical therapy .
label: method

string: Measures of spasticity and passive range of motion ( PROM ) were administered before treatment , immediately after treatment , and at 24 - and 48-hours follow-up .
label: method

string: Participants assigned to active tDCS treatment evidenced significantly more pre - to immediately post-treatment reductions in spasticity than participants assigned to the sham ( p = 0.004 , p < O. 001l , andp = 0.004 for shoulder wrist , and fingers respectively ) and these improvement in spasticity maintainedfor at least 48 hours for wrist joints ( p = 0.023 ) .
label: result

string: There was only one participant in the active tDCS condition developed erythematous rash .
label: result

string: However , all participants tolerated the tDCS well without any serious adverse events .
label: result

string: On two evenings ( 1700 h ) , 10 male patients ( 27 5 years of age , HbA1c 6.7 0.7 % [ 49.9 8.1 mmol/mol ] ) were administered a 25 % rapid-acting insulin dose with a carbohydrate bolus 60 min before 45 min of treadmill running .
label: method

string: At 60 min postexercise , patients were administered a 50 % rapid-acting insulin dose with one of two isoenergetic meals ( 1.0 g carbohdyrate/kg body mass [ BM ] ) matched for macronutrient content but of either low GI ( LGI ) or high GI ( HGI ) .
label: method

string: At 180 min postmeal , the LGI group ingested an LGI snack and the HGI group an HGI snack ( 0.4 g carbohdyrate/kg BM ) before returning home ( 2300 h ) .
label: method

string: Interval samples were analyzed for blood glucose and lactate ; plasma glucagon , epinephrine , interleukin-6 ( IL-6 ) , and tumor necrosis factor - ( TNF - ) ; and serum insulin , cortisol , nonesterified fatty acid , and - hydroxybutyrate concentrations .
label: method

string: Interstitial glucose was recorded for 20 h postlaboratory attendance through continuous glucose monitoring .
label: method

string: Following the postexercise meal , an HGI snack induced hyperglycemia in all patients ( mean SD glucose 13.5 3.3 mmol/L ) and marked increases in TNF - and IL-6 , whereas relative euglycemia was maintained with an LGI snack ( 7.7 2.5 mmol/L , P < 0.001 ) without inflammatory cytokine elevation .
label: result

string: Both meal types protected all patients from early hypoglycemia .
label: result

string: Overnight glycemia was comparable , with a similar incidence of nocturnal hypoglycemia ( n = 5 for both HGI and LGI ) .
label: result

string: There is increasing emphasis on the importance of intraocular pressure peaks and fluctuations as risk factors for glaucoma progression .
label: background

string: It is well recognized that the water drinking test raises intraocular pressure and there is reasonable evidence that caffeine can also raise intraocular pressure .
label: background

string: The aim of this study is to directly compare the effect of a caffeine test to that of the water drinking test on intraocular pressure , in patients with glaucoma .
label: background

string: Prospective , observer-masked , cross-over study .
label: method

string: Fourteen eyes of 14 patients with primary open-angle glaucoma .
label: method

string: Patients were initially randomized to either caffeine test or water drinking test .
label: method

string: Intraocular pressure was measured in both eyes with a Goldmann applanation tonometer at baseline and every 15min for 1h , by a masked examiner .
label: method

string: This was repeated the following week at the same time of day for the other test ( the cross-over ) .
label: method

string: Peak intraocular pressure and maximum fluctuation from baseline were compared between groups using paired t-tests .
label: method

string: Peak and fluctuation of intraocular pressure , time of maximum frequency of peak intraocular pressure .
label: method

string: The maximum intraocular pressure from the water drinking test ( 19.74.1 ) was greater than the caffeine test ( 16.74.1 ) and showed greater fluctuation in intraocular pressure ( 4.32.7 mmHg [ 27.7 % ] ; P < 0.0001 ) compared with the caffeine test ( 1.81.9 mmHg [ 11.7 % ] ) ; P = 0.004 ) .
label: result

string: As part of a clinical trial of symptom management strategies in patients receiving chronic hemodialysis , female sexual function was prospectively assessed monthly for 6 months and quarterly thereafter using the Female Sexual Function Index , to which questions were added differentiating sexual dysfunction/difficulty from sexual inactivity .
label: method

string: Beginning in month 7 , patients were asked three questions about sexual activity , difficulty , and satisfaction monthly .
label: method

string: Of the women enrolled in the clinical trial ,125 participants completed 1721 assessments between 2009 and 2011 .
label: result

string: Scores on 574 of 643 ( 89 % ) quarterly Female Sexual Function Index assessments were consistent with sexual dysfunction , due largely to sexual inactivity , which was reported on 525 ( 82 % ) quarterly assessments .
label: result

string: When reported ( n = 1663 ) , the most frequently described reasons for sexual inactivity were lack of interest in sex ( n = 715 ; 43 % ) and lack of a partner ( n = 647 ; 39 % ) , but rarely sexual difficulty ( n = 36 ; 2 % ) .
label: result

string: When reported ( n = 1582 ) , women were moderately to very satisfied with their sexual life on 1020 ( 64 % ) assessments and on 513 of 671 ( 76 % ) assessments in which lack of interest was cited as a reason for sexual inactivity .
label: result

string: Women indicated an interest in learning about the causes of and treatment for sexual dysfunction on just 5 % of all assessments .
label: result

string: Obese premenopausal women were stabilized on balanced HFD and randomized to consume 9g/d of encapsulated stearate ( 18:0 ) , oleate ( 18:1 ) , linoleate ( 18:2 ) or placebo .
label: method

string: Significant improvements occurred in fat oxidation rate ( 6 % ) , body composition ( % fat : 2.52.1 % ; % lean : 2.52.1 % ) , inflammation ( IL-1 , IL-1 , 1L-12 , Il-17 , IFN , TNF , TNF ) and vascular function ( BP , PAI-1 , tPA activity ) .
label: result

string: When compared to HFD + placebo , HFD + stearate had the greatest effect on reducing IFN ( 74 % ) and HFD + linoleate had the greatest effect on reducing PAI-1 ( 31 % ) .
label: result

string: Knee osteoarthritis is a major cause of disability in the aging population .
label: background

string: Based on pathological , magnetic resonance imaging ( MRI ) and arthroscopy studies , progressive osteoarthritis involves all tissues of the joint and includes bone marrow lesions , synovial proliferation , fat pad inflammation , and high subchondral bone turnover .
label: background

string: Recent research suggests that abnormal perfusion in bone marrow lesions , fat pads , and subchondral bone is associated with pain in knee osteoarthritis , and that dynamic contrast-enhanced MRI is a promising method for studying micro-perfusion alteration in knee osteoarthritis .
label: background

string: Traditional Chinese Medicine approaches have been employed for thousands of years to relieve knee osteoarthritis pain .
label: background

string: Among herbal medicines , the Jingui external lotion is the preferred and most commonly used method in China to reduce pain in patients with knee osteoarthritis ; however , there is a lack of validated evidence for its effectiveness .
label: background

string: The purpose of this study is to explore the effectiveness of Jingui external lotion for the management of painful knee osteoarthritis in a short-term study .
label: background

string: In addition , we will assess micro-perfusion alteration in the patellar fat pad as well as the femur and tibia subchondral bone via dynamic contrast-enhanced MRI .
label: background

string: This trial is a randomized , controlled study .
label: method

string: A total of 168 patients will be randomized into the following two groups : 1 ) the Jingui external lotion group ( treatment group ) ; and 2 ) the placebo lotion group ( control group ) .
label: method

string: In both groups , lotion fumigation and external washing of the patients ' knees will be administered twice a day for 14 consecutive days .
label: method

string: Follow-up will be at regular intervals during a 4-week period with a visual analog scale to assess pain , and additional characterization with the Western Ontario and McMaster Universities Index score ; rescue medication will be recorded as the extent and time pattern .
label: method

string: In addition , micro-perfusion alteration in the patellar fat pad , femur and tibia subchondral bone will be assessed via dynamic contrast-enhanced MRI .
label: method

string: ClinicalTrials.gov identifier : ChiCTR-TRC-14004727 ; 31 May 2014 .
label: background

string: In the Total Body Hypothermia for Neonatal Encephalopathy Trial ( TOBY ) , newborns with asphyxial encephalopathy who received hypothermic therapy had improved neurologic outcomes at 18 months of age , but it is uncertain whether such therapy results in longer-term neurocognitive benefits .
label: background

string: We randomly assigned 325 newborns with asphyxial encephalopathy who were born at a gestational age of 36 weeks or more to receive standard care alone ( control ) or standard care with hypothermia to a rectal temperature of 33 to 34C for 72 hours within 6 hours after birth .
label: method

string: We evaluated the neurocognitive function of these children at 6 to 7 years of age .
label: method

string: The primary outcome of this analysis was the frequency of survival with an IQ score of 85 or higher .
label: method

string: A total of 75 of 145 children ( 52 % ) in the hypothermia group versus 52 of 132 ( 39 % ) in the control group survived with an IQ score of 85 or more ( relative risk , 1.31 ; P = 0.04 ) .
label: result

string: The proportions of children who died were similar in the hypothermia group and the control group ( 29 % and 30 % , respectively ) .
label: result

string: More children in the hypothermia group than in the control group survived without neurologic abnormalities ( 65 of 145 [ 45 % ] vs. 37 of 132 [ 28 % ] ; relative risk , 1.60 ; 95 % confidence interval , 1.15 to 2.22 ) .
label: result

string: Among survivors , children in the hypothermia group , as compared with those in the control group , had significant reductions in the risk of cerebral palsy ( 21 % vs. 36 % , P = 0.03 ) and the risk of moderate or severe disability ( 22 % vs. 37 % , P = 0.03 ) ; they also had significantly better motor-function scores .
label: result

string: There was no significant between-group difference in parental assessments of children 's health status and in results on 10 of 11 psychometric tests .
label: result

string: Negative emotional states and abnormal stress reactivity are central components in drug addiction .
label: background

string: The brain stress system in the amygdala is thought to play a key role in the maintenance of drug dependence through negative reinforcement .
label: background

string: Although acute heroin administration was found to reduce anxiety , craving , and stress hormone release , whether these effects are reflected in amygdala activity has not yet been investigated .
label: background

string: With a randomized , crossover , double-blind design , saline and heroin were administered to 22 heroin-dependent patients , whereas 17 healthy control subjects were included for the placebo administration only .
label: method

string: We used functional magnetic resonance imaging to investigate blood oxygen level-dependent responses during fearful faces processing .
label: method

string: Stress reactivity was measured by adrenocorticotropic hormone levels and by cortisol concentrations in serum and saliva 60 min after substance administration .
label: method

string: Anxiety and craving levels were assessed with self-report ratings .
label: method

string: Heroin administration acutely reduced the left amygdala response to fearful faces relative to the saline injection .
label: result

string: Patients receiving saline showed a significantly higher left amygdala response to fearful faces than healthy control subjects , whose activity did not differ from patients receiving heroin .
label: result

string: The left amygdala activity correlated significantly with scores on state-anxiety and levels of adrenocorticotropic hormone , serum cortisol , and saliva cortisol among all patients and control subjects .
label: result

string: Fifty patients with liver cirrhosis and esophageal varices were randomly divided into an enhanced nutritional therapy group ( n = 25 ) and a control group ( n = 25 ) .
label: method

string: The enhanced nutritional therapy group received one week of enhanced nutritional supplementation , including liver nutritional elements , prior to routine endoscopic therapy .
label: method

string: The routine without any change to their diet .
label: method

string: The rate of transformation and status of wound healing of esophageal varices were compared between the two groups .
label: method

string: The ratio of ulcers occurring at the injection site was lower in the enhanced nutrition group than in the control group ( 16/25 vs. 23/25 ; x2 = 5.711 , P = 0.017 ) .
label: result

string: The enhanced nutrition group had only one case of minimal bleeding occurring during endoscopy as compared to the seven cases of bleeding in the control group ( x2 = 5.357 , P = 0.021 ) .
label: result

string: On average , the enhanced nutrition group required less sessions of endoscopic treatment to achieve eradication of esophageal varices than the control group ( 3.8 vs. 4.1 ; t = 2.069 , P = 0.044 ) .
label: result

string: Heart rate variability ( HRV ) is reduced in stable ischemic heart disease ( SIHD ) patients and is associated with sudden cardiac death ( SCD ) .
label: background

string: We evaluated the impact of traditional acupuncture ( TA ) on cardiac autonomic function measured by HRV in SIHD patients .
label: background

string: We conducted a randomized controlled study of TA , sham acupuncture ( SA ) , and waiting control ( WC ) in 151 SIHD subjects .
label: method

string: The TA group received needle insertion at acupuncture sites , the SA group received a sham at non-acupuncture sites , while the WC group received nothing .
label: method

string: The TA and SA groups received 3 treatments/week for 12 weeks .
label: method

string: 24-Hour , mental arithmetic stress , and cold pressor ( COP ) HRV was collected at entry and exit , along with BP , lipids , insulin resistance , hs-CRP , salivary cortisol , peripheral endothelial function by tonometry ( PAT ) , and psychosocial variables .
label: method

string: Mean age was 63 10 ; 50 % had prior myocardial infarction .
label: result

string: Comparison of WC and SA groups demonstrated differences consistent with the unblinded WC status ; therefore by design , the control groups were not merged .
label: result

string: Exit mental stress HRV was higher in TA vs. SA for markers of parasympathetic tone ( p 0.025 ) , including a 17 % higher vagal activity ( p = 0.008 ) .
label: result

string: There were no differences in exit 24-hour or COP HRV , BP , lipids , insulin resistance , hs-CRP , salivary cortisol , PAT , or psychosocial variables .
label: result

string: We randomized 1,060 study subjects recruited from the Diabetes Management through an Integrated Delivery System project in 2003-2005 into intervention ( n = 789 from 27 clinics ) and control ( n = 271 from 7 clinics ) groups .
label: method

string: The quarterly self-care and nutrition-education program in the intervention group was delivered by case managers , and standard care was provided to the control group .
label: method

string: The intervention program was conducted during 2003-2007 .
label: method

string: A multivariate mixed model analysis was used to assess the 3.5-year intervention effects on glycemic control .
label: method

string: Glycated hemoglobin ( HbA1c ) level in the intervention group ( especially for those with a baseline HbA1c level of 7-9 % and > 9 % ) was significantly lower than that in the control group 6 months after recruitment and remained lower through the subsequent three intervention years .
label: result

string: Wire-guided cannulation has become a common biliary cannulation technique worldwide .
label: background

string: Different guidewires with various tip shapes and materials have been reportedly used for wire-guided cannulation .
label: background

string: However , there are apparently no studies reporting changes in the biliary cannulation rate according to the type of guidewire used .
label: background

string: We conducted a prospective , multicenter , controlled study involving patients with a native papilla who required biliary cannulation .
label: method

string: We allocated the patients to the J-tip guidewire or angled-tip guidewire groups ( groups J and A , respectively ) .
label: method

string: If biliary cannulation was not achieved within 10min , the GW was changed and cannulation was continued .
label: method

string: Groups J and A consisted of 66 and 65 enrolled patients , respectively .
label: result

string: The biliary cannulation rate with a single guidewire for the first 10min was 84.8 % ( 56/66 ) for group J and 80.0 % ( 52/65 ) for group A.
label: result

string: The final success rate for biliary cannulation was 100 % in both groups .
label: result

string: The mean times necessary for biliary cannulation were 285.8 and 267.6 s in group J and group A , respectively .
label: result

string: The incidence rates of complications ( i.e. , all mild pancreatitis ) were 3.0 % ( 2/66 ) and 6.2 % ( 4/65 ) in group J and group A , respectively .
label: result

string: The mean amylase concentrations were 168.0 and 297.7 IU/L in group J and group A , respectively .
label: result

string: There were no significant differences in any results between both groups .
label: result

string: Totally 46 elderly patients with active RA were randomly assigned to the treatment group ( 22 cases ) and the control group ( 24 cases ) .
label: method

string: All patients received subcutaneous injection of etanercept , 25 mg each time , twice per week .
label: method

string: The dosage was reduced to once per week 3 months later .
label: method

string: Patients in the treatment group took TWP Tablet ( 10 mg each time , three times per day ) , while those in the control group took methotrexate ( MTX ) , 10 mg each time , once per week .
label: method

string: The whole course lasted for 24 weeks .
label: method

string: Patients ' rest pain , tender joint number , swollen joint number , health assessment questionnaire ( HAQ ) , patients ' global assessment , physicians ' global assessment , erythrocyte sediment rate ( ESR ) , C reactive protein ( CRP ) , rheumatic factor were assessed at week 0 , 4 , 8 , 12 , and 24 .
label: method

string: The curative effect was statistically evaluated by the United States Institute of Rheumatology ACR20 , ACR50 , and ACR70 improvement criteria .
label: method

string: Meanwhile , any adverse event was recorded and evaluated .
label: method

string: Totally 41 completed the trial , and 5 dropped off ( 3 in the treatment group and 2 in the control group ) .
label: result

string: Compared with the control group , there was no statistical difference in ACR20 , ACR50 , or ACR70 in the treatment group ( P > 0.05 ) .
label: result
