string: Compared with before treatment in the same group , there was some improvement in tender joint number , swollen joint number , visual analogue scale ( VAS ) for patients ' global assessment , VAS for physicians ' global assessment , ESR , CRP , and HAQ between the two groups , showing statistical difference ( P < 0.05 ) .
label: result

string: Compared with the control group in the same phase , there was no statistical difference in the treatment group ( P > 0.05 ) .
label: result

string: There was no statistical difference in the occurrence of adverse events between the two groups .
label: result

string: In a single-centre randomised controlled trial , discharge medication of 259 patients with AMI was obtained from medical records at hospital stay .
label: method

string: Follow-up drug use and use of the healthcare system were self-reported to study nurses over 1 year in 3-month intervals .
label: method

string: Predictors for persistence were modelled with multivariate logistic regression analysis considering demographics , co-morbidities and treatment characteristics .
label: method

string: At discharge , 99.2 % of the patients used anti-platelets , 86.5 % beta blockers , 95.0 % statins and 90.4 % angiotensin-converting enzyme inhibitors or angiotensin receptor blockers .
label: result

string: Use of the combination of all four drug classes decreased from discharge to 1 year post-AMI from 74.1 to 37.8 % and was significantly reduced by age 75 years ( odds ratio [ OR ] 0.49 ; 95 % confidence interval [ CI ] 0.29-0 .85 ) and ten or more visits with general practitioners ( GPs ) over 1 year ( OR 0.29 ; 95 % CI 0.17-0 .51 ) .
label: result

string: Persistence from month 3 to 12 was significantly associated with drug use at discharge for the single drug classes , but not for the drug combination .
label: result

string: High levels of emotional distress in cancer patients often goes unnoticed in daily clinical routine , resulting in severe undertreatment of mental health problems in this patient group .
label: background

string: Screening tools can be used to increase case identification , however , screening alone does not necessarily translate into better mental health for the patient .
label: background

string: Doctors play a key role in providing basic emotional support and transferring the patients in need of such specific support to mental health professionals .
label: background

string: This study investigates whether a stepped care model , combining screening , doctor consultation and professional psycho-oncological service in a structured way , improves the emotional wellbeing of cancer patients .
label: background

string: This study is a cluster randomized trial with two parallel groups ( intervention vs. care as usual ) , set in an academic hospital .
label: method

string: Participants are cancer patients , a total of 1,000 at baseline .
label: method

string: The intervention consists of stepped psychosocial care .
label: method

string: Step one : screening for distress , step two : feedback of screening results to the doctor in charge of the patient and consultation with the patient , and step three : based on a shared patient-doctor decision , either transferal to the consultation liaison ( CL ) service or not .
label: method

string: The outcome will be emotional well-being half a year after baseline , ascertained with the Hospital Anxiety and Depression Scale .
label: method

string: Randomization will be done by the cluster randomization of wards .
label: method

string: Clinical Trials Register ( Clinicaltrials.gov ) identifier : NCT01859429 registration date 17 May 2013 .
label: background

string: In a parallel designed randomised placebo-controlled clinical trial , a total of 118 non-smoker individuals with type 2 diabetes and insufficient 25-hydroxyvitamin D , aged > 30 years , were recruited from the Isfahan Endocrine and Metabolism Research Centre .
label: method

string: Participants were randomly assigned to four groups receiving : ( 1 ) 50,000 U/week vitamin D + calcium placebo ; ( 2 ) 1,000 mg/day calcium + vitamin D placebo ; ( 3 ) 50,000 U/week vitamin D + 1,000 mg/day calcium ; or ( 4 ) vitamin D placebo + calcium placebo for 8 weeks .
label: method

string: A study technician carried out the random allocations using a random numbers table .
label: method

string: All investigators , participants and laboratory technicians were blinded to the random assignments .
label: method

string: All participants provided 3 days of dietary records and 3 days of physical activity records throughout the intervention .
label: method

string: Blood samples were taken to quantify glycaemic and lipid profiles at study baseline and after 8 weeks of intervention .
label: method

string: 30 participants were randomised in each group .
label: result

string: During the intervention , one participant from the calcium group and one from the vitamin D group were excluded because of personal problems .
label: result

string: Calcium-vitamin D co-supplementation resulted in reduced serum insulin ( changes from baseline : -14.8 3.9 pmol/l , p = 0.01 ) , HbA1c [ -0.70 0.19 % ( -8.0 0.4 mmol/mol ) , p = 0.02 ] , HOMA-IR ( -0.46 0.20 , p = 0.001 ) , LDL-cholesterol ( -10.36 0.10 mmol/l , p = 0.04 ) and total/HDL-cholesterol levels ( -0.91 0.16 , p = 0.03 ) compared with other groups .
label: result

string: We found a significant increase in QUICKI ( 0.025 0.01 , p = 0.004 ) , HOMA of beta cell function ( HOMA-B ; 11.8 12.17 , p = 0.001 ) and HDL-cholesterol ( 0.46 0.05 mmol/l , p = 0.03 ) in the calcium-vitamin D group compared with others .
label: result

string: ClinicalTrials.gov NCT01662193 FUNDING : Clinical Research Council , Isfahan University of Medical Sciences , Isfahan , Iran .
label: background

string: A number of trials have shown improved radiological alignment following total knee arthroplasty using computer-assisted surgery ( CAS ) compared with conventional surgery .
label: background

string: Few studies , however , have looked at functional outcomes .
label: background

string: We prospectively studied a cohort of 107 patients that underwent TKA by a single surgeon .
label: method

string: Patients were randomised into 3 groups : computer-assisted surgery for both the femur and the tibia , intramedullary guides for both the femur and the tibia , and an intramedullary guide for the femur and an extramedullary guide for the tibia .
label: method

string: Patients were followed-up post-operatively with the Short Form Health Survey ( SF-12 ) and Oxford Knee Score ( OKS ) questionnaires .
label: method

string: At a median follow-up of 46 months ( range 30-69 months ) , there was a trend towards higher OKS results in the CAS group , with a mean score of 40.6 in the CAS group compared to 37.6 in the extramedullary group and 36.8 in the intramedullary group .
label: result

string: The difference seen in the OKS between CAS and the conventional groups had a significant unadjusted p-value ( 0.024 ) , and approached significance when adjusted for age and sex ( 0.054 ) .
label: result

string: There was a significant improvement in the OKS when the mechanical axis was within 3 of neutral , versus those outside this range ( median of 41.0 compared to 38.3 , p = 0.045 ) .
label: result

string: a total of 228 patients with endured coronary artery bypass graft operation were randomized depending on the method of exposing the great saphenous vein ( GSV ) - an open method of vein exposure ( OVE ) - 115 patients and endoscopic vein exposure ( EVE ) - 113 patients .
label: method

string: The evaluated parameters included healing of the postoperative wounds , postoperative oedema , pain intensity , and neuropathies in the early postoperative period .
label: method

string: We performed lymphoscintigraphy of the lower limbs , as well as morphological examination of the venous wall by means of light and electron scanning microscopy .
label: method

string: the duration of vein exposure was less in the EVE group than in the OVE group , amounting to 31.8 6.2 min and 40.3 15.8 min , respectively ( p < 0.01 ) .
label: result

string: Complications after GSV isolation were encountered considerably less often in the EVE group ( 11.5 % ) as compared to 44.4 % in the OVE ( p = 0.001 ) .
label: result

string: According to the results of the multivariate analysis , diabetes mellitus was the only risk factor for postoperative complications in OVE .
label: result

string: According the findings of lymphoscintigraphy the EVE group had no significant impairments of lymph outflow after the operation , whereas during OVE , accumulation of radiopaque material in the lymph nodes decreased twofold ( p 0.001 ) .
label: result

string: Histological assessment of the sampled vein specimens showed no considerable lesions of the venous wall in the examined groups .
label: result

string: The OB-202 / DM-230 Study was a 56-week phase 2 trial that randomized subjects to receive once-daily placebo or PHEN/TPM ER 15 mg/92 mg ( 15/92 ) .
label: method

string: The primary end point was change in HbAc level .
label: method

string: A post hoc analysis of a subpopulation with type 2 diabetes from a second study , CONQUER , is also presented .
label: method

string: All subjects made lifestyle modifications , and comorbidities were managed to the standard of care .

string: The study groups comprised 130 subjects with type 2 diabetes enrolled in the OB-202 / DM-230 Study ( mean baseline HbAc 8.7 % [ 72 mmol/mol ] ) and 388 subjects with type 2 diabetes in the CONQUER Study ( mean baseline HbA1c 6.8 % [ 51 mmol/mol ] ) .
label: result

string: At week 56 in the OB-202 / DM-230 , change in weight ( from intent-to-treat sample with last observation carried forward [ ITT-LOCF ] ) was -2.7 % for placebo and -9.4 % for PHEN/TPM ER 15/92 ( P < 0.0001 vs. placebo ) .
label: result

string: Change in HbA1c level ( from ITT-LOCF ) was -1.2 % ( -13.1 mmol/mol ) for placebo and -1.6 % ( -17.5 mmol/mol ) for PHEN/TPM ER 15/92 ( P = 0.0381 ) .
label: result

string: In both the OB-202 / DM-230 and CONQUER , greater numbers of patients randomized to receive PHEN/TPM ER treatment achieved HbAc targets with reduced need for diabetic medications when compared with the placebo group .

string: Common adverse events included paraesthesia , constipation , and insomnia .
label: result

string: HFH is an important , frequently recurrent event .
label: background

string: Conventional time-to-first event analyses do not take account repeat events .
label: background

string: We used a number of statistical approaches to examine the effect of treatment on first and repeat HFH in the CORONA trial .
label: background

string: In the CORONA trial , 5,011 patients 60 years of age with chronic New York Heart Association functional classes II to IV systolic heart failure resulting from ischemia were randomized to receive rosuvastatin or placebo .
label: method

string: Poisson , Andersen-Gill , and negative binomial methods ( NB ) were used to analyze the effect of rosuvastatin on HFH , and the NB and a parametric joint frailty model ( JF ) were used to examine this effect while accounting for the competing risk of cardiovascular ( CV ) death .
label: method

string: Rosuvastatin/placebo rate ratios were calculated , both unadjusted and adjusted .
label: method

string: A total of 1,291 patients had 1 or more HFH ( 750 of these had a single HFH only ) , and there were a total of 2,408 HFHs .
label: result

string: The hazard ratio for the conventional time-to-first event analysis for HFH was 0.91 ( 95 % confidence interval [ CI ] : 0.82 to 1.02 , p = 0.105 ) .
label: result

string: In contrast , the NB on repeat hospitalizations gave an unadjusted RR ( RR ) for HFH of 0.86 ( 95 % CI : 0.75 to 0.99 , p = 0.030 ) , adjusted 0.82 ( 95 % CI : 0.72 to 0.92 , p = 0.001 ) , and after including CV death as the last event , adjusted RR of 0.85 ( 95 % CI : 0.77 to 0.94 , p = 0.001 ) .
label: result

string: The JF gave an adjusted RR of 0.82 ( 95 % CI : 0.73 to 0.92 , p = 0.001 ) .
label: result

string: Similar results were found in analyses of all CV hospitalizations and all-cause hospitalizations .
label: result

string: Stroke is a devastating complication of coronary artery bypass grafting ( CABG ) .
label: background

string: This study was carried out with the aim that the development of off pump coronary artery surgery decreases the incidence/adverse outcome due to extra corporeal circulation .
label: background

string: The data utilized in this study was extracted from a randomized controlled trial that was conducted from January 2006 to March 2007 at Punjab Institute of Cardiology .
label: method

string: One hundred patients were included in ` on pump ' group-A , and 100 patients in ` off pump ' group-B .
label: method

string: The mean age of the patients in group-A was 53.51 9.96 years and in group-B it was 51.59 10.30 years .
label: result

string: Renal failure occurred in 21 % patients of group-A as compared to 10 % of group-B while Acute Myocardial Infarction occurred in significantly higher number of patients in group-B ( 11 % ) as compared to group-A ( 2 % ) .
label: result

string: Off pump was associated with significant decrease in rate of stroke 1.5 % as compared to on pump 3.5 % .
label: result

string: similarly there was decreased in the risk of deaths after stroke 0 % as compared to on pump 1.5 % mortality after stroke .
label: result

string: In group A 6 ( 3.5 % ) patients developed stroke where as in group-B 2 ( 1.5 % ) patients developed stroke out of these 6 patients there were 2 mortalities after stroke in group-A while in group-B there was no mortality after stroke within 30 days postoperatively .
label: result

string: Emergence of artemisinin resistance has raised concerns that the most potent anti-malarial drug may be under threat .
label: background

string: Artesunate-amodiaquine ( AS-AQ ) and artemether-lumefantrine ( AL ) are , respectively , the first - and second-line treatments for uncomplicated falciparum malaria in Cte d'Ivoire .
label: background

string: Constant monitoring by National Malaria Control Programme ( NMCP ) of drug efficacy is an important tool in establishing rational anti-malarial drug policies in Cte d'Ivoire .
label: background

string: In an open label , randomized controlled clinical trial , children and adults were randomized to receive AS-AQ or AL. .
label: method

string: Both drug regimens were given for three days , and follow-up was for 42 days .
label: method

string: The primary endpoint was the 42-day cure rate and was defined as proportion of patients with PCR-corrected cure rate after 42 days of follow-up .
label: method

string: A total of 383 patients who were attending the Anonkoua-koute ( Abidjan ) , Petit Paris ( Korhogo ) and Libreville ( Man ) hospitals and presenting with symptomatic acute uncomplicated falciparum malaria were randomized to receive AS-AQ ( 188 ) and AL ( 195 ) .
label: result

string: The intention-to-treat analysis showed effectiveness rates of 94.7 % and 96.4 % for AS-AQ and AL , respectively on day 42 .
label: result

string: After adjustment for PCR , these rates were 96.8 % and 99 % , respectively .
label: result

string: At day 42 , in per-protocol analysis , Adequate clinical and parasitological response ( ACPR ) PCR uncorrected was 97.8 % and 97.4 % for AS-AQ and AL , respectively .
label: result

string: The PCR adjusted ACPR was 100 % for each combination and both regimens were well tolerated .
label: result

string: Hereditary hemorrhagic telangiectasia ( HHT ) is a dominantly inherited genetic vascular disorder in which epistaxis is the most frequent manifestation , responsible for high morbidity .
label: background

string: Management of this symptom has no standard , and local treatments are often aggressive .
label: background

string: Their efficacy is variable and has not been proven .
label: background

string: Anti-angiogenic drugs , such as bevacizumab , are a new treatment strategy .
label: background

string: Its systemic administration in patients with HHT improves liver damage-related symptoms and epistaxis .
label: background

string: To limit the systemic adverse effects of bevacizumab and to ease administration , a local administration seems suitable .
label: background

string: Phase 1 , randomized , double-blind , placebo-controlled , monocentric study performed sequentially ( dose escalation ) on 5 groups of 8 patients .
label: method

string: Each group was made up of 6 verum and 2 placebos .
label: method

string: Five increasing doses of bevacizumab nasal spray ( 25 mg/mL ) were evaluated : 12.5 , 25 , 50 , 75 and 100 mg .
label: method

string: A total of 40 patients were included between October 2011 and October 2012 .
label: result

string: Bevacizumab nasal spray was well tolerated in all patients and the drug was not detected in their serum .
label: result

string: No dose limiting toxicity was observed .
label: result

string: No efficacy was observed at any dose in this study .
label: result

string: ClinicalTrials.gov Identifier #NCT 01507480 .
label: background

string: We retrospectively reviewed the HR-MRI data of 60 patients with unilateral MCA occlusion ( 32 symptomatic and 28 asymptomatic ) and 205 control subjects with normal MCA on magnetic resonance angiography .

string: The presence or absence of DTFV , defined as three or more flow voids along the occluded MCA on at least two consecutive T2-weighted image slices , was observed .

string: The relationships among DTFV , clinical presentations , and infarct sizes were analyzed .

string: DTFV were identified in 20/28 ( 71 % ) patients with asymptomatic MCA occlusions , much more frequently than in the patients with symptomatic occlusions ( 5/32 , 16 % ) ( P < 0.001 ) .

string: There were 9 patients with a large territorial infarction ( 1/3 MCA distribution ) , none of whom had DTFV on HR-MRI .

string: DTFV was not observed in any control subject .
label: result

string: It has been demonstrated that protein ingestion before sleep increases muscle protein synthesis rates during overnight recovery from an exercise bout .
label: background

string: However , it remains to be established whether dietary protein ingestion before sleep can effectively augment the muscle adaptive response to resistance-type exercise training .
label: background

string: Forty-four young men ( 22 1 y ) were randomly assigned to a progressive , 12-wk resistance exercise training program .
label: method

string: One group consumed a protein supplement containing 27.5 g of protein , 15 g of carbohydrate , and 0.1 g of fat every night before sleep .
label: method

string: The other group received a noncaloric placebo .
label: method

string: Muscle hypertrophy was assessed on a whole-body ( dual-energy X-ray absorptiometry ) , limb ( computed tomography scan ) , and muscle fiber ( muscle biopsy specimen ) level before and after exercise training .
label: method

string: Strength was assessed regularly by 1-repetition maximum strength testing .
label: method

string: Muscle strength increased after resistance exercise training to a significantly greater extent in the protein-supplemented ( PRO ) group than in the placebo-supplemented ( PLA ) group ( +164 11 kg and +130 9 kg , respectively ; P < 0.001 ) .
label: result

string: In addition , quadriceps muscle cross-sectional area increased in both groups over time ( P < 0.001 ) , with a greater increase in the PRO group than in the PLA group ( +8.4 1.1 cm ( 2 ) vs. +4.8 0.8 cm ( 2 ) , respectively ; P < 0.05 ) .
label: result

string: Both type I and type II muscle fiber size increased after exercise training ( P < 0.001 ) , with a greater increase in type II muscle fiber size in the PRO group ( +2319 368 m ( 2 ) ) than in the PLA group ( +1017 353 m ( 2 ) ; P < 0.05 ) .
label: result

string: The present randomized , two-period , cross-over bioequivalence study compared two soft capsules of etoposide ( test and reference formulations ) , in treating 18 advanced lung cancer patients .
label: background

string: The pharmacokinetic parameters were determined based on the concentrations of etoposide , using HPLC with fluorescence detector .
label: method

string: In each of the two study periods , a single dose of test or reference product was administered .
label: method

string: The pharmacokinetic parameters assessed included area under the plasma concentration-time curve ( AUC ( 0-12h ) ) from 0 to 12 hours , AUC ( 0-T ) from time zero to infinity , the peak plasma concentration of the drug ( C ( max ) ) , time to achieve C ( max ) , and the elimination half-life .
label: method

string: Comparison of the test and reference products containing etoposide showed that geometric mean ratios ( 90 % confidence interval ( CI ) ) of AUC ( 0-T ) , AUC ( 0 - ) , and C ( max ) were 99.7 % ( 92.1 - 103.7 % ) , 99.4 % ( 92.3 - 105.2 % ) , and 101.5 % ( 94.2 - 109.6 % ) , respectively .

string: Both AUC and C ( max ) ratio 90 % CI of test and reference formulations were within its acceptable range for bioequivalence .
label: result

string: The values of tmax and t1/2 were not found to have a statistically significant difference between the test and the reference drug ( p > 0.05 ) .
label: result

string: No adverse events occurred in this bioequivalence study .

string: Functional abdominal pain ( FAP ) is not only a highly prevalent disease but also poses a considerable burden on children and their families .
label: background

string: Untreated , FAP is highly persistent until adulthood , also leading to an increased risk of psychiatric disorders .
label: background

string: Intervention studies underscore the efficacy of cognitive behavioral treatment approaches but are limited in terms of sample size , long-term follow-up data , controls and inclusion of psychosocial outcome data .
label: background

string: In a multicenter randomized controlled trial , 112 children aged 7 to 12 years who fulfill the Rome III criteria for FAP will be allocated to an established cognitive behavioral training program for children with FAP ( n = 56 ) or to an active control group ( focusing on age-appropriate information delivery ; n = 56 ) .
label: method

string: Randomization occurs centrally , blockwise and is stratified by center .
label: method

string: This study is performed in five pediatric gastroenterology outpatient departments .
label: method

string: Observer-blind assessments of outcome variables take place four times : pre - , post - , 3 - and 12-months post-treatment .
label: method

string: Primary outcome is the course of pain intensity and frequency .
label: method

string: Secondary endpoints are health-related quality of life , pain-related coping and cognitions , as well as self-efficacy .
label: method

string: DRKS00005038 ( date : 25 July 2013 ) ; NCT02030392 ( date : 7 January 2014 ) .
label: background

string: In this clinical trial , 90 females with mild to moderate osteoarthritis were assigned to two intervention and one placebo groups .
label: method

string: In addition to the conventional therapy , the patients in intervention groups received 15g/day of E. angustifolia L. medulla and whole fruit powders respectively for 8 weeks .
label: method

string: The levels of tumor necrosis factor-alpha ( TNF - ) , interleukine-1 ( IL-1 ) , interleukine-10 ( IL-10 ) , matrix metalloproteinase-1 ( MMP-1 ) and -13 ( MMP-13 ) were measured with human ELISA kits .
label: method

string: Paired t-test and ANOVA were used for statistical analysis .
label: method

string: The statistically significant decrease was observed in the mean levels of serum TNF - in the medulla ( 0.004 ) and whole fruit ( 0.001 ) groups after 8 weeks of supplementation .
label: result

string: In contrast to the placebo group , there was a significant rise in the mean levels of serum IL-10 in medulla ( p-value = 0.01 ) and whole fruit groups ( p-value = 0.009 ) at the end of study .
label: result

string: The interventions resulted in significant decrease in the mean levels of serum MMP-1 in the medulla ( 0.001 ) and whole fruit ( 0.002 ) groups .
label: result

string: After the interventions , no significant changes were observed in the serum IL-1 and MMP-13 levels .
label: result

string: Antidepressants are often the first-line treatment for depression in primary care .
label: background

string: However , not all patients respond to medication after an adequate dose and duration of treatment .
label: background

string: Currently , there are no estimates of the prevalence of treatment-resistant depression ( TRD ) from UK primary care .
label: background

string: Potential participants ( aged 18-75 years who had received repeated prescriptions for antidepressants ) were identified from general practice records .
label: method

string: Those who agreed to be contacted were mailed a questionnaire that included questions on depressive symptoms ( Beck Depression Inventory [ BDI-II ] ) , and adherence to antidepressants .
label: method

string: Those who scored 14 on the BDI-II and had taken antidepressants for at least 6 weeks at an adequate dose were defined as treatment resistant .
label: method

string: A total of 2439 patients completed the questionnaire ( 84 % of those who agreed to be contacted ) , of whom 2129 had been prescribed an adequate dose of antidepressants for at least 6 weeks .
label: result

string: Seventy-seven per cent ( 95 % CI = 75 % to 79 % ) had a BDI score of 14 .
label: result

string: Fifty-five per cent ( 95 % CI = 53 % to 58 % ) ( n = 1177 ) met the study 's definition of TRD , of whom 67 % had taken their antidepressants for more than 12 months .
label: result

string: The UKW3 trial compared biopsy/pre-operative chemotherapy versus immediate nephrectomy and afforded the opportunity to examine the influence of percutaneous retroperitoneal biopsy and other factors on local and distant relapse of Wilms tumour ( WT ) .
label: background

string: Patients with unilateral WT ( stages I-IV ) excluding metachronous relapse or early progressive disease were eligible .
label: method

string: Metastatic and ` inoperable ' tumours were biopsied electively .
label: method

string: ` Local ' was defined as relapse within the abdomen , except for liver metastases considered as ` distant ' relapse , together with other haematogenous routes .
label: method

string: Uni - and multivariable analyses estimated the risk factors for relapse .
label: method

string: Overall , 285/635 ( 44.9 % ) patients had a biopsy .
label: result

string: With a median follow-up of 10.1 years , 35 ( 5.5 % ) patients experienced a ` local ' , 15 a combined ( 2.4 % ) and 60 ( 9.4 % ) a ` distant ' relapse .
label: result

string: On univariate analysis , biopsy , anaplasia and tumour size were associated with an increased risk of local relapse .
label: result

string: On multivariable analysis , anaplasia and tumour size remained significant for local relapse whereas the elevated risk of biopsy ( hazards ratio ( HR ) = 1.80 : 95 % confidence interval ( CI ) 0.97-3 .32 , p = 0.060 ) was marginal .
label: result

string: Age , anaplasia , tumour size , lymph nodes metastases and stage , but not biopsy , were individually associated with increased risk of distant relapse but only age and anaplasia remained significant following multivariable analysis .
label: result

string: This was a randomized , placebo-controlled , multicenter trial involving 130 patients ( 65 for each group ) who had mild-to-moderate NPDR with macular HE .
label: method

string: Participants were given a daily dose of either 50 mg sulodexide or a matching dose of placebo orally for 12 months .
label: method

string: Main outcome measure was an improvement in HE defined as a decrease in severity by at least two grades on a 10-grade severity scale .
label: method

string: This was evaluated by fundus photography over 12-month period .
label: method

string: The sulodexide group showed significantly greater improvement in HE severity than that shown by the placebo group ( 39.0 % vs. 19.3 % ; chi square , P = 0.005 ) .
label: result

string: Logistic regression analysis yielded an odds ratio of 2.790 ( 95 % confidence interval , 1.155-6 .743 ; P = 0.023 ) for the effect of treatment once adjustments were made for demographic , prognostic and disease confounders .
label: result

string: Intention to treat and per-protocol analysis yielded similar results .
label: result

string: Sulodexide 's safety was comparable to that of the placebo .
label: result

string: Cardiovascular ( CV ) disease is the leading cause of morbidity and mortality in patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus ( T2DM ) .
label: background

string: Furthermore , patients with T2DM and acute coronary syndrome ( ACS ) have a particularly high risk of CV events .
label: background

string: The glucagon-like peptide 1 receptor agonist , lixisenatide , improves glycemia , but its effects on CV events have not been thoroughly evaluated .
label: background

string: ELIXA ( www.clinicaltrials.gov no .
label: method

string: NCT01147250 ) is a randomized , double-blind , placebo-controlled , parallel-group , multicenter study of lixisenatide in patients with T2DM and a recent ACS event .
label: method

string: The primary aim is to evaluate the effects of lixisenatide on CV morbidity and mortality in a population at high CV risk .
label: method

string: The primary efficacy end point is a composite of time to CV death , nonfatal myocardial infarction , nonfatal stroke , or hospitalization for unstable angina .
label: method

string: Data are systematically collected for safety outcomes , including hypoglycemia , pancreatitis , and malignancy .
label: method

string: Enrollment began in July 2010 and ended in August 2013 ; 6,068 patients from 49 countries were randomized .
label: result

string: Of these , 69 % are men and 75 % are white ; at baseline , the mean SD age was 60.3 9.7 years , body mass index was 30.2 5.7 kg/m ( 2 ) , and duration of T2DM was 9.3 8.2 years .
label: result

string: The qualifying ACS was a myocardial infarction in 83 % and unstable angina in 17 % .
label: result

string: The study will continue until the positive adjudication of the protocol-specified number of primary CV events .
label: result

string: Prospective , controlled , experimental study .
label: method

string: Adult female spayed Beagles ( n = 12 ) .
label: method

string: Full thickness cutaneous wounds were created on each antebrachium ( n = 24 ) .
label: method

string: Immediately after surgery , cefazolin ( 22mg/kg intravenously [ IV ] ) was administered to each dog and continued every 8hours during the study .
label: method

string: The right wound was randomly assigned to group I or group II whereas the wound on the contralateral antebrachium was assigned to the other group .
label: method

string: Group I wounds were treated with negative pressure wound therapy ( NPWT ) and group II wounds were treated with nonadherent dressings for 3 days .
label: method

string: Dressings were changed and tissue biopsies obtained from wound beds at 24hours intervals for both groups .
label: method

string: Cefazolin wound tissue and plasma concentrations were measured by liquid chromatography mass spectrometry ( LC-MS/MS ) .
label: method

string: Blood samples for measuring plasma cefazolin concentrations were collected before biopsy sampling .
label: method

string: At the time of surgery and at each subsequent bandage change , wound beds were swabbed and submitted for aerobic and anaerobic culture .
label: method

string: After initiating cefazolin treatment , wound tissue antibiotic concentrations between treatment groups were not significantly different at any sampling time .
label: result

string: Similarly , after initiating cefazolin treatment , plasma cefazolin concentrations were not significantly different at any sampling time for individual dogs .
label: result

string: Medical textbooks often list Legionnaires ' disease as a differential diagnosis of the syndrome of inappropriate secretion of anti-diuretic hormone ( ADH ) ( SIADH ) , but evidence supporting this association is largely lacking .
label: background

string: We tested the hypothesis whether hyponatremia in patients with Legionnaires ' disease would be caused by increased CT-ProVasopressin .
label: background

string: We measured CT-ProVasopressin and sodium levels in a prospective cohort of 873 pneumonia patients from a previous multicentre study with 27 patients having positive antigen tests for Legionella pneumophila .
label: method

string: Patients with Legionnaires ' disease more frequently had low sodium levels ( Na < 130mmol/L ) ( 44.4 % vs 8.2 % , p < 0.01 ) , but similar mean CT-ProVasopressin levels ( pmol/l ) ( 39.4 [ 7 ] vs 51.2 [ 2.7 ] , p = 0.43 ) as compared to patients with pneumonia of other etiologies .
label: result

string: In patients with Legionnaires ' disease , CT-ProVasopressin levels showed a positive correlation with sodium ( r = 0.42 , p < 0.05 ) .
label: result

string: Independent of pneumonia etiology , CT-ProVasopressin correlated significantly with the pneumonia severity index ( r = 0.56 , p < 0.05 ) , ICU admission ( adjusted odds ratio per decile , 95 % CI ) ( 1.6 , 1.2 - 2.0 ) , and 30-day-mortality ( 1.8 , 1.3 - 2.4 ) .
label: result

string: There is a paucity of data on the use of optimal medical therapy ( OMT ) in patients with complex coronary artery disease undergoing revascularization with percutaneous coronary intervention or coronary artery bypass grafting ( CABG ) and its long-term prognostic significance .
label: background

string: The Synergy Between Percutaneous Coronary Intervention With TAXUS and Cardiac Surgery ( SYNTAX ) trial is a multicenter , randomized , clinical trial of patients ( n = 1800 ) with complex coronary disease randomized to revascularization with percutaneous coronary intervention or CABG .
label: result

string: Detailed drug history was collected for all patients at discharge and at the 1-month , 6-month , 1-year , 3-year , and 5-year follow-ups .
label: result

string: OMT was defined as the combination of at least 1 antiplatelet drug , statin , - blocker , and angiotensin-converting enzyme inhibitor/angiotensin receptor blocker .
label: result

string: Five-year clinical outcomes were stratified by OMT and non-OMT .
label: result

string: OMT was underused in patients treated with coronary revascularization , especially CABG .
label: result

string: OMT was an independent predictor of survival .
label: result

string: OMT was associated with a significant reduction in mortality ( hazard ratio , 0.64 ; 95 % confidence interval , 0.48-0 .85 ; P = 0.002 ) and composite end point of death/myocardial infarction/stroke ( hazard ratio , 0.73 ; 95 % confidence interval , 0.58-0 .92 ; P = 0.007 ) at the 5-year follow-up .
label: result

string: The treatment effect with OMT ( 36 % relative reduction in mortality over 5 years ) was greater than the treatment effect of revascularization strategy ( 26 % relative reduction in mortality with CABG versus percutaneous coronary intervention over 5 years ) .
label: result

string: On stratified analysis , all the components of OMT were important for reducing adverse outcomes regardless of revascularization strategy .
label: result

string: Mild head injuries commonly present to emergency departments .
label: background

string: The challenges facing clinicians in emergency departments include identifying which patients have traumatic brain injury , and which patients can safely be sent home .
label: background

string: Traumatic brain injuries may exist with subtle symptoms or signs , but can still lead to adverse outcomes .
label: background

string: Despite the existence of several high quality clinical practice guidelines , internationally and in Australia , research shows inconsistent implementation of these recommendations .
label: background

string: The aim of this trial is to test the effectiveness of a targeted , theory - and evidence-informed implementation intervention to increase the uptake of three key clinical recommendations regarding the emergency department management of adult patients ( 18years of age or older ) who present following mild head injuries ( concussion ) , compared with passive dissemination of these recommendations .
label: background

string: The primary objective is to establish whether the intervention is effective in increasing the percentage of patients for which appropriate post-traumatic amnesia screening is performed .
label: background

string: The design of this study is a cluster randomised trial .
label: method

string: We aim to include 34 Australian 24-hour emergency departments , which will be randomised to an intervention or control group .
label: method

string: Control group departments will receive a copy of the most recent Australian evidence-based clinical practice guideline on the acute management of patients with mild head injuries .
label: method

string: The intervention group will receive an implementation intervention based on an analysis of influencing factors , which include local stakeholder meetings , identification of nursing and medical opinion leaders in each site , a train-the-trainer day and standardised education and interactive workshops delivered by the opinion leaders during a 3month period of time .
label: method

string: Clinical practice outcomes will be collected retrospectively from medical records by independent chart auditors over the 2month period following intervention delivery ( patient level outcomes ) .
label: method

string: In consenting hospitals , eligible patients will be recruited for a follow-up telephone interview conducted by trained researchers .
label: method

string: A cost-effectiveness analysis and process evaluation using mixed-methods will be conducted .
label: method

string: Sample size calculations are based on including 30 patients on average per department .
label: method

string: Outcome assessors will be blinded to group allocation .
label: method

string: Australian New Zealand Clinical Trials Registry ACTRN12612001286831 ( date registered 12 December 2012 ) .

string: Current academic literature suggests that school gardening programmes can provide an interactive environment with the potential to change children 's fruit and vegetable intake .

string: This is the first cluster randomised controlled trial ( RCT ) designed to evaluate whether a school gardening programme can have an effect on children 's fruit and vegetable intake .
label: background

string: The trial included children from 23 schools ; these schools were randomised into two groups , one to receive the Royal Horticultural Society ( RHS ) - led intervention and the other to receive the less involved Teacher-led intervention .
label: method

string: A 24-hour food diary ( CADET ) was used to collect baseline and follow-up dietary intake 18months apart .
label: method

string: Questionnaires were also administered to evaluate the intervention implementation .
label: method

string: A total of 641 children completed the trial with a mean age of 8.1 years ( 95 % CI : 8.0 , 8.4 ) .
label: result

string: The unadjusted results from multilevel regression analysis revealed that for combined daily fruit and vegetable intake the Teacher-led group had a higher daily mean change of 8g ( 95 % CI : -19 , 36 ) compared to the RHS-led group -32 g ( 95 % CI : -60 , -3 ) .
label: result

string: However , after adjusting for possible confounders this difference was not significant ( intervention effect : -40 g , 95 % CI : -88 , 1 ; p = 0.06 ) .
label: result

string: The adjusted analysis of process measures identified that if schools improved their gardening score by 3 levels ( a measure of school gardening involvement - the scale has 6 levels from 0 ` no garden ' to 5 ` community involvement ' ) , irrespective of group allocation , children had , on average , a daily increase of 81g of fruit and vegetable intake ( 95 % CI : 0 , 163 ; p = 0.05 ) compared to schools that had no change in gardening score .
label: result

string: The prevalence of hepatitis-C-virus ( HCV ) infections is high among opioid-dependent individuals .

string: However , it has been noted that favorable substance use therapy outcomes may improve the likelihood of HCV-treatment initiation and success .

string: Therefore , current guidelines for the treatment of HCV among illicit drug users suggest that treatment for addiction be given the highest priority .

string: Data came from the National Drug Abuse Treatment Clinical Trial Network study 0003.516 eligible opioid-dependent participants were randomized to either a 7-day or 28-day buprenorphine tapering schedule following a 4-week buprenorphine stabilization period .

string: Generalized estimating equations were used to test the research question .

string: Participants with the HCV antibody were significantly less likely to submit opioid-negative urine analyses during and/or immediately following active treatment [ OR = 0.69 ; CI = 0.51-0 .93 ] , indicating a higher rate of opioid use among this group .

string: Small increases in mean serum creatinine ( SCr ) were observed in studies of rheumatoid arthritis patients during tofacitinib treatment .

label: method

string: In Phase 3 , least squares mean SCr differences from placebo at Month 3 were 0.02 and 0.04 mg/dl for tofacitinib 5 and 10 mg twice daily ( BID ) ( P < 0.05 ) , respectively .

string: Phase 3 data confirmed that patients with higher baseline CRP or greater CRP decreases following tofacitinib treatment had the largest increases in SCr .

string: Population sequencing ( PS ) has shown that telaprevir-resistant variants are not typically detectable at baseline ( prevalence , 5 % of patients ) , and most variants present at the time of treatment failure are no longer detectable at the end of the study .

label: method

string: Seventy-seven EAGLE patients with nonarteritic CRAO .
label: method

string: Analysis of vascular risk factors and underlying diseases detected by questionnaire and standardized physical examination within 1 month after occlusion .
label: method

string: The standardized physical examination included carotid Doppler ultrasonography , echocardiography , electrocardiography , blood pressure monitoring , pulse rate , urine analysis , body mass index analysis , and laboratory tests .
label: method

string: Seventy-seven of 84 patients had complete datasets for analysis .
label: result

string: Fifty-two ( 67 % ) patients had cardiovascular risk factors in their medical history , and comprehensive phenotyping identified at least 1 new risk factor in 60 patients ( 78 % ; 95 % confidence interval , 67 % -87 % ) .
label: result

string: Thirty-one ( 40 % ) had carotid artery stenosis of at least 70 % .
label: result

string: Eleven patients experienced a stroke , 5 of those within 4 weeks after the CRAO occurred .
label: result

string: Arterial hypertension was found in 56 ( 73 % ) patients and was newly diagnosed in 12 ( 16 % ) study participants .
label: result

string: Cardiac diseases were also highly prevalent ( 22 % coronary artery disease , 20 % atrial fibrillation , and 17 % valvular heart disease ) .
label: result

string: The study was a 12-month , prospective , double-blind , randomized trial of tetracaine versus saline set in the emergency department ( ED ) of a regional tertiary care teaching hospital .
label: method

string: A total of 116 patients presenting with uncomplicated corneal abrasions were included in this study .
label: method

string: The intervention was either undiluted , preservative-free , topical tetracaine hydrochloride 1 % or saline , applied up to every 30 minutes while awake for 24 hours .
label: method

string: Main safety outcome measures were repeat ED examinations at 48 hours with fluorescein staining and slit-lamp examination , 1-week and 1-month telephone interviews with additional examinations as needed , and monitoring of charts for complications .
label: method

string: Secondary outcome measures were 100-mm visual analogue scale ( VAS ) pain scores recorded every 2 hours while awake for 48 hours and patient-perceived overall effectiveness using a numeric rating scale ( NRS ) of 0 to 10 obtained during telephone interviews .
label: method

string: At least one follow-up encounter was completed on each of the 116 patients .
label: result

string: No complications specifically attributed to topical anesthetic use occurred in the 59 patients in the tetracaine group , and the binomial probability confidence interval ( CI ) of this occurring is 0 to 6.1 .
label: result

string: There was no significant difference in corneal healing as measured by the percentage of patients with persistent fluorescein uptake at 48 hours between the two groups ( 23.9 % vs. 21.3 % , difference = 2.6 % , 95 % CI = -14 % to 20 % , p = 0.761 ) or persistent symptoms at 48 hours ( 21.7 % vs. 21.3 % , difference = 0.4 % , 95 % CI = -16 % to 17 % , p = 0.957 ) .
label: result

string: There was no clinical difference in VAS pain scores between the groups .
label: result

string: Patients in the tetracaine group rated the study drugs ' overall effectiveness significantly higher on the NRS ( 7.7 vs. 3.9 ) compared to patients in the saline group ( difference = 3.9 , 95 % CI = 2.4 to 5.3 , p < 0.0005 ) .
label: result

string: In a prospective , multicenter study , 174 eyes were implanted with the TECNIS Toric IOL ( Abbott Medical Optics , Inc. , Santa Ana , CA ) .
label: method

string: A custom-developed software was used to analyze high-resolution slit-lamp photographs of 156 eyes taken at day 1 ( baseline ) and 1 , 3 , and 6 months postoperatively .
label: method

string: The software uses iris and sclera landmarks to align the baseline image and later images for comparison .
label: method

string: Validation of software was performed through repeated analyses of protractor images rotated from 0.1 to 10.0 and randomly selected photographs of 20 eyes .
label: method

string: Software validation showed precision ( repeatability plus reproducibility variation ) of 0.02 using protractor images and 2.22 using slit-lamp photographs .
label: result

string: Good quality slit-lamp images and clear landmarks were necessary for precise measurements .
label: result

string: At 6 months , 94.2 % of eyes had 5 or less change in IOL orientation versus baseline ; only 2 eyes ( 1.4 % ) had axis shift greater than 30 .
label: result

string: Most eyes were within 5 or less of rotation between 1 and 3 months ( 92.9 % ) and 3 and 6 months ( 94.1 % ) .
label: result

string: Mean absolute axis change ( standard deviation ) from 1 day to 6 months was 2.70 5.51 .
label: result

string: Efficacy and safety of first-line axitinib/paclitaxel/carboplatin versus bevacizumab/paclitaxel/carboplatin in advanced non-squamous non-small-cell lung cancer ( NSCLC ) was evaluated .
label: background

string: Patients with stage IIIB/IV disease stratified by adjuvant therapy and gender were randomised 1 : 1 to axitinib ( 5 mg twice daily ) or bevacizumab [ 15 mg/kg every 3 weeks ( Q3W ) ] , both with paclitaxel ( 200 mg/m ( 2 ) Q3W ) / carboplatin ( AUC 6 mg min/ml Q3W ) .
label: method

string: The trial was discontinued after preliminary analysis .
label: result

string: Median progression-free survival ( primary end point ) for axitinib ( N = 58 ) and bevacizumab ( N = 60 ) , respectively , was 5.7 and 6.1 months [ hazard ratio ( HR ) 1.09 , 95 % confidence interval ( CI ) 0.68-1 .76 ; one-sided stratified P = 0.64 ] ; median overall survival was 10.6 and 13.3 months ( HR 1.12 , 95 % CI 0.74-1 .69 ; one-sided stratified P = 0.70 ) .
label: result

string: Objective response rates ( 95 % CI ) were 29.3 % ( 18.1-42 .7 ) and 43.3 % ( 30.6-56 .8 ) , respectively ; risk ratio 0.676 ( 95 % CI 0.41-1 .11 ; one-sided stratified P = 0.94 ) .
label: result

string: The most common grade 3/4 adverse events included neutropenia ( 28 % versus 20 % ) , fatigue ( 14 % versus 7 % ) , and hypertension ( 14 % versus 5 % ) .
label: result

string: Patient-reported outcomes based on the EORTC QLQ-C30 were similar between arms .
label: result

string: HER2-positive breast cancer tissue samples were collected and processed with the PAXgene Tissue System .
label: method

string: A total of 24 breast cancers were analyzed .
label: method

string: Genetic alterations of 409 cancer-related genes were analyzed by a bench-top next-generation sequencer .
label: method

string: DNA methylation statuses were analyzed by a bead array with 485,512 probes .
label: method

string: The WNT pathway was potentially activated by aberrant methylation of its negative regulators , such as DKK3 and SFRP1 , in 9 breast cancers .
label: result

string: The AKT/mTOR pathway was activated by mutations of PIK3CA in 5 breast cancers .
label: result

string: The Notch pathway was potentially activated by mutations of NOTCH1 and NOTCH2 in 4 breast cancers .
label: result

string: The p53 pathway was inactivated by mutations of TP53 in 13 breast cancers and potentially by aberrant methylation of its downstream genes in 10 breast cancers .
label: result

string: Cell adhesion was affected by mutations of CDH1 in 1 breast cancer .
label: result

string: Selective serotonin reuptake inhibitors ( SSRIs ) are often prescribed in patients with postural tachycardia syndrome ( POTS ) , and act at synaptic terminals to increase monoamine neurotransmitters .
label: background

string: We hypothesized that they act to increase blood pressure and attenuate reflex tachycardia , thereby improving symptoms .
label: background

string: Acute hemodynamic profiles after SSRI administration in POTS patients have not previously been reported .
label: background

string: Patients with POTS ( n = 39 ; F = 37 , 39 9 years ) underwent a randomized crossover trial with sertraline 50mg and placebo .
label: method

string: Heart rate , systolic , diastolic , and mean blood pressure were measured with the patient seated and standing for 10 min prior to drug or placebo administration , and then hourly for 4 h.
label: method

string: The primary endpoint was standing heart rate at 4 h.
label: method

string: At 4 h , standing heart rate and systolic blood pressure were not significantly different between sertraline and placebo .
label: result

string: Seated systolic ( 10612 mmHg vs. 1018 mmHg ; p = 0.041 ) , diastolic ( 728 mmHg vs. 698 mmHg ; p = 0.022 ) , and mean blood pressure ( 869 mmHg vs. 819 mmHg ; p = 0.007 ) were significantly higher after sertraline administration than placebo .
label: result

string: At 4 h , symptoms were worse with sertraline than placebo .
label: result

string: We performed an open-label study of patients with cirrhosis ( 92 % Child class A or B , 70 % alcoholic ) treated at 10 medical centers in Germany .
label: method

string: Patients were assigned randomly more than 5 days after variceal hemorrhage to groups given a small covered transjugular intrahepatic portosystemic stent-shunt ( TIPS ) ( 8 mm ; n = 90 ) , or medical reduction of portal pressure ( propranolol and isosorbide-5-mononitrate ; n = 95 ) .
label: method

string: HVPG was determined at the time patients were assigned to groups ( baseline ) and 2 weeks later .
label: method

string: In the medical group , patients with an adequate reduction in HVPG ( responders ) remained on the drugs whereas nonresponders underwent only variceal band ligation .
label: method

string: The study was closed 10 months after the last patient was assigned to a group .
label: method

string: The primary end point was variceal rebleeding .
label: method

string: Survival , safety ( adverse events ) , and quality of life ( based on the Short Form-36 health survey ) were secondary outcome measures .
label: method

string: A significantly smaller proportion of patients in the TIPS group had rebleeding within 2 years ( 7 % ) than in the medical group ( 26 % ) ( P = .002 ) .
label: result

string: A slightly higher proportion of patients in the TIPS group experienced adverse events , including encephalopathy ( 18 % vs 8 % for medical treatment ; P = .05 ) .
label: result

string: Rebleeding occurred in 6 of 23 patients ( 26 % ) receiving medical treatment before hemodynamic control was possible .
label: result

string: Per-protocol analysis showed that rebleeding occurred in a smaller proportion of the 32 responders ( 18 % ) than in nonresponders who received variceal band ligation ( 31 % ) ( P = .06 ) .
label: result

string: Fifteen patients from the medical group ( 16 % ) underwent TIPS placement during follow-up evaluation , mainly for refractory ascites .
label: result

string: Survival time and quality of life did not differ between both randomized groups .
label: result

string: We assessed the efficacy of onabotulinumtoxinA ( BOTOX , Allergan Inc. , Irvine , CA , USA ) in patients with refractory overactive bladder ( OAB ) after treatment for benign prostatic hyperplasia ( BPH ) .
label: background

string: This was a two-center , randomized , double-blinded pilot study conducted in patients with OAB secondary to bladder outlet obstruction ( BOO ) , refractory to anticholinergic medication and persistent for greater than 3 months after surgical intervention to relieve obstruction , with an International Prostate Symptom Score ( IPSS ) > 12 .
label: method

string: Patients were randomized in 1:1 fashion to either 200 units of onabotulinumtoxinA versus placebo .
label: method

string: Fifteen patients received onabotulinumtoxinA versus 13 who received placebo .
label: method

string: Follow up was performed at 1 week and then 1 , 3 , 6 , and 9 months .
label: method

string: The primary endpoint was reduction in the frequency of micturition per 24 hours by 3-day voiding diary .
label: method

string: Secondary endpoints were maximum flow rate ( Qmax ) , post-void residual ( PVR ) , and IPSS scores .
label: method

string: Patients receiving onabotulinumtoxinA demonstrated significantly improved quality of life scores at 180 and 270 days after treatment ( p = 0.02 and 0.03 , respectively ) as well as significantly lower International Consultation on Incontinence Questionnaire ( ICIQ ) scores ( p < 0.05 ) .
label: result

string: Baseline urinary frequency was 10.5 versus 11.0 voids/day ( p = 0.47 ) .
label: result

string: Frequency episodes improved from 11 episodes per day to 8 episodes per day in the treatment arm .
label: result

string: The placebo arm did not have a decrease in frequency episodes .
label: result

string: This response was durable up to 90 days , although this was not statistically significant .
label: result

string: IPSS , PVR , and urgency were unchanged postoperatively in both groups .
label: result

string: Type 2 diabetes , also known non-insulin-dependent diabetes , is the most prevalent type of the disease and involves defects in the secretion and action of insulin .
label: background

string: The aim of the proposed study is to evaluate the efficacy of pre-exercise low-level laser therapy ( LLLT ) on muscle performance of the quadriceps femoris in individuals with type 2 diabetes .
label: background

string: A double-blind , randomized , controlled clinical trial will be carried out in two treatment phases .
label: method

string: In the first phase , quadriceps muscle performance will be evaluated using an isokinetic dynamometer and the levels of creatine kinase and lactate dehydrogenase ( biochemical markers of muscle damage ) will be determined .
label: method

string: The participants will then be allocated to four LLLT groups through a randomization process using opaque envelopes : Group A ( 4 Joules ) , Group B ( 6 Joules ) , Group C ( 8 Joules ) and Group D ( 0 Joules ; placebo ) .
label: method

string: Following the administration of LLLT , the participants will be submitted to an isokinetic eccentric muscle fatigue protocol involving the quadriceps muscle bilaterally .
label: method

string: Muscle performance and biochemical markers of muscle damage will be evaluated again immediately after as well as 24 and 48hours after the experimental protocol .
label: method

string: One week after the last evaluation the second phase will begin , during which Groups A , B and C will receive the LLLT protocol that achieved the best muscle performance in phase 1 for a period of 4weeks .
label: method

string: At the end of this period , muscle performance will be evaluated again .
label: method

string: The protocol for this study is registered with the World Health Organization under Universal Trial Number U1111-1146-7109 .
label: method

string: We conducted a prospective randomized clinical trial .
label: method

string: Ninety nine patients after DRF were randomized to two groups .
label: method

string: Both groups were contacted after their fracture and were asked to answer a questionnaire and were informed about the possible relationship between DRF and OP .
label: method

string: In the intervention group , patients were sent an explanatory pamphlet and a letter to their primary care physician .
label: method

string: An additional survey was conducted to establish whether the intervention improved the number of patients who undergo OP workup .
label: method

string: The intervention increased the proportion of patients who turned to their primary care physician from 22.9 % to 68.6 % , and increased the proportion of patients undergoing OP workup from 14.3 % to 40 % ( p < 0.001 ) .
label: result

string: In this seven-arm , randomized , double-blind , controlled parallel-group study , 35 healthy females aged 5070 years ( 5 per group ) received 20 g calcifediol or vitamin D ( 3 ) daily , 140 g calcifediol or vitamin D ( 3 ) weekly , for 15 weeks , or a single bolus of either 140 g calcifediol , or vitamin D ( 3 ) , or both .
label: method

string: 25 ( OH ) D3 plasma concentrations were quantified using LCMS/MS in 14 clinical visits among all participants .
label: method

string: For daily ( weekly ) dosing , the area under the concentrationtime curve ( AUC024h ) , which is the measure for exposure , was 28 % ( 67 % ) higher after the first dose of calcifediol than after the first dose of vitamin D3 .
label: result

string: After 15 weeks , this difference was 123 % ( 178 % ) .
label: result

string: All women in the daily and weekly calcifediol groups achieved 25 ( OH ) D3 concentrations > 30 ng/mL ( mean , 16.8 days ) , but only 70 % in the vitamin D3 daily or weekly groups reached this concentration ( mean , 68.4 days ) .
label: result

string: A single dose of 140 g calcifediol led to 117 % higher 25 ( OH ) D3 AUC096h values than 140 g vitamin D3 , while the simultaneous intake of both did not further increase exposure .
label: result

string: A total of 109 patients with epilepsy who did not to take their antiepileptic drugs ( AEDs ) more than once were randomly assigned to two intervention groups : the medication education group ( group I ) and the medication education with behavioral intervention group ( group II ) .
label: method

string: Group I was initially provided with medication education in the form of oral education and written materials , and this education was reinforced by monthly calls from the pharmacist over the next six months .
label: method

string: The behavioral intervention provided to group II consisted of a modified medication schedule which was based on cue-dose training therapy .
label: method

string: The outcomes that were evaluated both in the beginning and in the end of the study included adherence , which was measured using the four-item Morisky Medication Adherence Scale ( MMAS-4 ) , the number of seizures , knowledge of AEDs , and the number of patients who missed a dose of their AEDs .
label: method

string: Differences within and between the groups were analyzed .
label: method

string: After intervention , the adherence and knowledge of AEDs increased greatly in all patients , and the number of patients who had seizures or missed AEDs decreased .
label: result

string: However , no significant differences were observed between groups I and II .
label: result

string: The observed changes were ( group I vs group II , p value ) increased adherence : 62.3 % vs 64.3 % , 0.827 ; increased knowledge of AEDs : 88.7 % vs 80.4 % , 0.231 ; and improved seizure control : 64.2 % vs 64.3 % , 0.988 .
label: result

string: In addition , the percentage of patients who forgot to take their AEDs decreased to 45.0 % from more than 70 % , and 44.9 % of these patients took the missed AEDs as soon as they remembered .
label: result

string: Dementia affects 35 million people worldwide and is currently incurable .
label: background

string: Many cases may be preventable because regular participation in physical , mental and social leisure activities during middle age is associated with up to 47 % dementia risk reduction .
label: background

string: However , the majority of middle-aged adults are not active enough .
label: background

string: MCI is therefore a clear target for activity interventions aimed at reducing dementia risk .
label: background

string: An active lifestyle during middle age reduces dementia risk but it remains to be determined if increased activity reduces dementia risk when MCI is already evident .
label: background

string: Before this can be investigated conclusively , complex multimodal activity programmes are required that ( 1 ) combine multiple health promoting activities , ( 2 ) engage people with MCI , and ( 3 ) result in sufficient adherence rates .
label: background

string: We designed the ThinkingFit programme to engage people with MCI in a complex intervention comprised of three activity components : physical activity , group-based cognitive stimulation ( GCST ) and individual cognitive stimulation ( ICST ) .
label: method

string: Engagement and adherence was promoted by applying specific psychological techniques to enhance behavioural flexibility in an early pre-phase and during the course of the intervention .
label: method

string: To pilot the intervention , participants served as their own controls during a 6 - to 12-week run-in period , which was followed by 12weeks of activity intervention .
label: method

string: Out of 212 MCI patients screened , 163 were eligible , 70 consented and 67 completed the intervention ( mean age 74years ) .
label: result

string: Activity adherence rates were high : physical activity = 71 % ; GCST = 83 % ; ICST = 67 % .
label: result

string: Significant treatment effects ( p < .05 ) were evident on physical health outcomes ( decreased BMI and systolic blood pressure , [ pre/post values of 26.3 / 25.9 kg/m2 and 145/136mmHg respectively ] ) , fitness ( decreased resting and recovery heart rate [ 68/65bpm and 75/69bpm ] ) , and cognition ( improved working memory [ 5.3 / 6.3 items ] ) .
label: result

string: ClinicalTrials.gov registration nr : NCT01603862 ; date : 17/5/2012 .
label: background

string: Forty-eight gastric cancer patients were prospectively enrolled in the study .
label: method

string: Among them , 36 patients scheduled for elective LG were randomly assigned to low pressure group ( LP ) , middle pressure ( MP ) , and high pressure group ( HP ) with 12 cases in each group .
label: method

string: The CO2 pneumoperitoneum pressure was maintained at 8-10 mmhg in LP , 11-13 mmhg in MP , and 14-16 mmhg in HP .
label: method

string: The control group was open gastrectomy group ( OG ) in 12 cases .
label: method

string: The intestinal pathomorphism and level of plasma D-lactic acid before , during and after operation , and postoperative intestinal function of four groups were examined and compared .
label: method

string: There were no statistical differences in preoperative data among the four groups ( all P > 0.05 ) .
label: result

string: LG group was associated with a lower rate of surgical complications than OG ( 8.3 % vs. 41.7 % , P < 0.05 ) .
label: result

string: No obvious damage of intestinal mucosa was found in OG group .
label: result

string: Damage degree of intestinal mucosa after operation in LP , MP and HP groups was 0-1 , 1-2 , and 2-3 respectively .
label: result

string: There was significant change in intestinal pathomorphism after operation in both HP and MP groups .
label: result

string: The levels of D-lactic acid before operation were not significantly different among all the four groups , but increased significantly in each group after operation ( all P < 0.05 ) .
label: result

string: HP group had the highest level of plasma D-lactic acid and presented with delayed bowel sound return ( 4.5 d ) , time to first flatus ( 5.4 d ) , and intake ( 6.0 d ) as compared to the other 3 groups ( all P < 0.05 ) .
label: result

string: This was a prospective randomized trial of medical abortion with misoprostol after mifepristone priming at 14-24 weeks of gestation .
label: method

string: From 2009 to 2013 , recruited women received 200 mg mifepristone orally followed 24-48 hours later by an 800-microgram vaginal loading dose of misoprostol .
label: method

string: Women were then randomized to receive additional 400-microgram misoprostol doses orally every 3 hours , vaginally every 4 hours , or sublingually every 3 hours .
label: method

string: The main outcome was the duration of abortion with emphasis on the proportion of women undelivered 12 hours after the misoprostol loading dose in the three groups .
label: method

string: A total of 302 women were randomized : 100 to oral , 100 to vaginal , and 102 to sublingual misoprostol .
label: result

string: The median gestation at recruitment was oral 19.1 weeks ( interquartile range 17.2-20 .8 ) , vaginal 19.4 weeks ( interquartile range 17.3-20 .4 ) , and sublingual 19.7 weeks ( interquartile range 17.6-21 .0 ) .
label: result

string: The overall abortion duration was longer in women receiving oral misoprostol : oral 9.5 hours ( 95 % confidence interval [ CI ] 8.5-11 .4 ) , vaginal 7.4 hours ( 95 % CI 6.5-8 .2 ) , and sublingual 7.8 hours ( 95 % CI 7.0-9 .2 ) .
label: result

string: Overall , 84 of 302 ( 27.8 % ) women were undelivered at 12 hours , comprising 37.0 % ( 95 % CI 28.7-47 .8 ) oral , 20.5 % ( 95 % CI 14.0-30 .1 ) vaginal , and 21.0 % ( 95 % CI 14.3-30 .7 ) sublingual groups .
label: result

string: ClinicalTrials.gov , www.clinicaltrials.gov , NCT00864799 .
label: background

string: I.
label: method

string: In a randomised , controlled , outcome-assessor blinded trial 1932 six-month-old children from Malawi received one of five interventions daily from 6-18 months of age : 10-g milk-LNS , 20-g milk-LNS , 20-g non-milk-LNS , 40-g milk-LNS or 40-g non-milk-LNS , or received no intervention in the same period ( control ) .
label: method

string: The control group received delayed intervention with corn-soy blend from 18-30 months .
label: method

string: Physical activity was measured over 1 week by ActiGraph GT3X + accelerometer at 18 months .
label: method

string: Main outcome was mean vector magnitude accelerometer counts/15s .
label: method

string: Analyses were restricted to children with valid accelerometer data on at least 4 days with minimum 6h of wearing time per day .
label: method

string: Of the 1435 children recruited to this substudy , 1053 provided sufficient data for analysis .
label: result

string: The mean ( s.d. ) vector magnitude accelerometer counts in the total sample were 307 ( 64 ) .
label: result

string: The difference ( 95 % CI ) in mean accelerometer counts , compared with the control group , was 8 ( -6 to 21 , P = 0.258 ) in 10-g milk-LNS , 3 ( -11 to 17 , P = 0.715 ) in 20-g milk-LNS , 5 ( -8 to 19 , P = 0.445 ) in 20-g non-milk-LNS , 10 ( -3 to 23 , P = 0.148 ) in 40-g milk-LNS and 2 ( -12 to 16 , P = 0.760 ) in 40-g non-milk-LNS groups .
label: result

string: The unaltered long-term prognosis after heart transplantation underscores an urgent need to identify and improve factors related to survival outcomes .
label: background

string: The healthcare system ( e.g. level of chronic illness management implemented ) and patient self-management are major drivers of outcome improvement .
label: background

string: The study uses a survey design in 40 heart transplant centres covering 11 countries in four continents .
label: method

string: Theoretical frameworks informed variable selection , which are measured by established and investigator-developed instruments .
label: method

string: Heart transplant recipients , outpatient clinicians and programme 's directors complete a survey .
label: method

string: A staged convenience sampling strategy is implemented in heart transplant centres , countries and continents .
label: method

string: Depending on the centre 's size , a random sample of 25-60 patients is selected ( N estimated 1680 heart transplant recipients ) .
label: method

string: Five randomly selected clinicians and the medical director from each centre will be invited to participate .
label: method

string: Sixty Class II division 1 malocclusion patients with mandibular retrusion were divided into 3 groups ( Twin - block group , Class II elastic group and control group , 20 patients in each group ) randomly .
label: method

string: Differences of condylar process morphology were compared using cone - beam CT ( CBCT ) before and after treatment .
label: method

string: Condylar largest anteroposterior diameter and upper condylar height increased after treatment in both Twin-block group and Class II elastic group .
label: result

string: The condylar largest anteroposterior diameter and upper condylar height were longer in both Twin - block group [ ( 8.51 1.48 ) and ( 7.39 1.42 ) mm ] and Class II elastic group [ ( 8.44 1.03 ) and ( 7.24 0.89 ) mm ] than those in the control group [ ( 7.47 1.27 ) and ( 6.47 1.56 ) mm ] ( P < 0.05 ) .
label: result

string: No significant difference was found in other measurements ( P > 0.05 ) .
label: result

string: Adult patients with cancer receiving opioids with average pain intensity 4 ( numeric rating scale [ NRS ] , 0 to 10 ) in the last 24 hours were eligible .
label: method

string: Patients were randomly assigned to methylprednisolone ( MP ) 16 mg twice daily or placebo ( PL ) for 7 days .
label: method

string: Primary outcome was average pain intensity measured at day 7 ( NRS , 0 to 10 ) ; secondary outcomes were analgesic consumption ( oral morphine equivalents ) , fatigue and appetite loss ( European Organisation for Research and Treatment of Cancer-Quality of Life Questionnaire C30 , 0 to 100 ) , and patient satisfaction ( NRS , 0 to 10 ) .
label: method

string: A total of 592 patients were screened ; 50 were randomly assigned , and 47 were analyzed .
label: result

string: Baseline opioid level was 269.9 mg in the MP arm and 160.4 mg in the PL arm .
label: result

string: At day-7 evaluation , there was no difference between the groups in pain intensity ( MP , 3.60 v PL , 3.68 ; P = .88 ) or relative analgesic consumption ( MP , 1.19 v PL , 1.20 ; P = .95 ) .
label: result

string: Clinically and statistically significant improvements were found in fatigue ( -17 v 3 points ; P .003 ) , appetite loss ( -24 v 2 points ; P = .003 ) , and patient satisfaction ( 5.4 v 2.0 points ; P = .001 ) in favor of the MP compared with the PL group , respectively .
label: result

string: There were no differences in adverse effects between the groups .
label: result

string: Ecological intervention programs are recommended to prevent overweight and obesity in children .
label: background

string: The National Institute of Public Health ( INSP ) in Mexico implemented a successful ecological intervention program to promote healthy lifestyle behaviors in school age children .
label: background

string: This study assessed the integration of ecological principles and Social Cognitive Theory ( SCT ) constructs in this effective school-based obesity prevention program implemented in 15 elementary schools in Mexico City .
label: background

string: Two coders applied the Intervention Analysis Procedure ( IAP ) to `` map '' the program 's integration of ecological principles .
label: method

string: A checklist gauged the use of SCT theory in program activities .
label: method

string: Thirty-two distinct intervention strategies were implemented in one setting ( i.e. , school ) to engage four different target-groups ( students , parents , school representatives , government ) across two domains ( Nutrition and Physical Activity ) .
label: result

string: Overall , 47.5 % of the strategies targeted the school infrastructure and/or personnel ; 37.5 % of strategies targeted a key political actor , the Public Education Secretariat while fewer strategies targeted parents ( 12.5 % ) and children ( 3 % ) .
label: result

string: More strategies were implemented in the Nutrition domain ( 69 % ) than Physical Activity ( 31 % ) .
label: result

string: The most frequently used SCT construct within both intervention domains was Reciprocal Determinism ( e.g. , where changes to the environment influence changes in behavior and these behavioral changes influence further changes to the environment ) ; no significant differences were observed in the use of SCT constructs across domains .
label: result

string: In the Effects of Postconditioning on Myocardial Reperfusion in Patients with ST-segment Elevation Myocardial Infarction ( POST ) trial , ischemic postconditioning failed to improve myocardial reperfusion .
label: background

string: However , long-term effects of ischemic postconditioning on clinical outcomes are not known in patients with ST-segment elevation myocardial infarction .
label: background

string: A total of 700 patients undergoing primary percutaneous coronary intervention ( PCI ) were randomly assigned to the postconditioning group or the conventional primary PCI group in a 1:1 ratio .
label: method

string: Postconditioning was performed immediately after restoration of coronary flow by balloon occlusion 4 times for 1 minute .
label: method

string: Complete follow-up data for major clinical events at 1 year were available in 695 patients ( 99.3 % ) , and analyses were done by the intention to treat principle .
label: method

string: The primary outcome was a composite of death , myocardial infarction , severe heart failure , or stent thrombosis at 1 year .
label: method

string: At 1 year , a composite of death , myocardial infarction , severe heart failure , or stent thrombosis occurred in 21 patients ( 6.1 % ) in the postconditioning group and 16 patients ( 4.6 % ) in the conventional PCI group ( hazard ratio [ HR ] 1.32 , 95 % CI 0.69-2 .53 , P = .40 ) .
label: result

string: The risk of death ( 4.9 % vs 3.7 % , HR 1.32 , 95 % CI 0.64-2 .71 , P = .46 ) , heart failure ( 2.6 % vs 2.3 % , HR 1.13 , 95 % CI 0.44-2 .94 , P = .80 ) , and stent thrombosis ( 2.3 % vs 1.7 % , HR 1.34 , 95 % CI 0.46-3 .85 , P = .59 ) did not differ significantly between the 2 groups .
label: result

string: A random sample of 1,436 college and university men ages 19-25 years completed an online survey , including conformity to masculine norms , alcohol-related expectancies , HED , and negative drinking consequences .
label: method

string: Regression analyses and structural equation modeling were used .
label: method

string: Six of seven dimensions of masculinity and the alcohol expectancy scales were significantly associated with both HED and negative consequences .
label: result

string: In multivariate regression models predicting HED and negative consequences , the playboy and violence dimensions of masculinity and the risk/aggression alcohol expectancy remained significant .
label: result

string: HED and the risk-taking dimension of masculinity were also significant in the model predicting negative consequences .
label: result

string: The structural equation model indicated that masculinity was directly associated with HED and negative consequences but also influenced negative consequences indirectly through HED and alcohol expectancies .
label: result

string: In the general population , the epidemiological relationships between delirium and adverse outcomes are not well defined .
label: background

string: The aims of this study were to : ( 1 ) construct an algorithm for the diagnosis of delirium using the Geriatric Mental State ( GMS ) examination ; ( 2 ) test the criterion validity of this algorithm against mortality and dementia risk ; ( 3 ) report the age-specific prevalence of delirium as determined by this algorithm .
label: background

string: Participant and informant data in a randomly weighted subsample of the Cognitive Function and Ageing Study were taken from a standardized assessment battery .
label: method

string: The algorithmic definition of delirium was based on the DSM-IV classification .
label: method

string: Outcomes were : proportional hazard ratios for death ; odds ratios of dementia at 2-year follow-up .
label: method

string: Data from 2197 persons ( representative of 13,004 ) were used , median age 77 years , 64 % women .
label: result

string: Study-defined delirium was associated with a new dementia diagnosis at two years ( OR 8.82 , 95 % CI 2.76 to 28.2 ) and death ( HR 1.28 , 95 % CI 1.03 to 1.60 ) , even after adjustment for acute illness severity .
label: result

string: Similar associations were seen for study-defined subsyndromal delirium .
label: result

string: Age-specific prevalence as determined by the algorithm increased with age from 1.8 % in the 65-69 year age group to 10.1 % in the 85 age group ( p < 0.01 for trend ) .
label: result

string: For study-defined subsyndromal delirium , age-specific period prevalence ranged from 8.2 % ( 65-69 years ) to 36.1 % ( 85 years ) .
label: result

string: A study was conducted to evaluate and compare the effectiveness of two different spot-on topical flea products to control flea infestations on naturally infested dogs and cats in Tampa , FL USA .
label: background

string: Thirty-two dogs and 3 cats with natural flea infestations living in 18 homes were treated topically with a 19.53 % w/w spot-on formulation of indoxacarb .
label: method

string: Another thirty dogs and 2 cats living in 19 different homes were treated topically with either fipronil ( 9.8 % w/w ) / ( s ) - methoprene ( 8.89 % w/w ) or fipronil ( 9.8 % w/w ) / ( s ) - methoprene ( 11.8 % w/w ) , respectively .
label: method

string: All products were applied according to label directions by study investigators on day 0 and again between days 28 and 30 .
label: method

string: Flea populations on pets were assessed using visual area counts and premise flea infestations were assessed using intermittent-light flea traps on days 0 , 7 , 14 , 21 , 28-30 , 40-45 , and 54-60 .
label: method

string: A single application of the indoxacarb or fipronil ( s ) - methoprene formulations reduced flea populations on pets by 97.8 % and 85.5 % , respectively within 7 days .
label: result

string: One month ( 28-30 days ) after treatment the indoxacarb and fipronil ( s ) - methoprene formulations reduced on-animal flea burdens by 95.0 % and 49.5 % , respectively .
label: result

string: Following two monthly applications of either the indoxacarb or fipronil ( s ) - methoprene formulations , pet flea burdens were reduced by 99.1 % and 54.8 % , respectively , by days 54-60 .
