label: result

string: At the end of the two month study , 77.1 % and 15.6 % of the dogs and cats in the indoxacarb and fipronil ( s ) - methoprene treatment groups , respectively were flea free .
label: result

string: Flea numbers in the indoor-premises were markedly reduced in both treatment groups by days 54-60 , with 97.7 % and 84.6 % reductions in intermittent-light flea trap counts in the indoxacarb and fipronil ( s ) - methoprene treatment groups , respectively .
label: result

string: Ghrelin , which is a stomach-derived hormone , increases with fasting and energy restriction and may influence eating behaviors through brain hedonic reward-cognitive systems .
label: background

string: Therefore , changes in plasma ghrelin might mediate counter-regulatory responses to a negative energy balance through changes in food hedonics .
label: background

string: In a crossover design , 22 healthy , nonobese adults ( 17 men ) underwent a functional magnetic resonance imaging ( fMRI ) food-picture evaluation task after a 16-h overnight fast ( Fasted-Saline ) or after eating breakfast 95 min before scanning ( 730 kcal , 14 % protein , 31 % fat , and 55 % carbohydrate ) and receiving a saline ( Fed-Saline ) or acyl ghrelin ( Fed-Ghrelin ) subcutaneous injection before scanning .
label: method

string: One male subject was excluded from the fMRI analysis because of excess head motion , which left 21 subjects with brain-activation data .
label: method

string: Compared with the Fed-Saline visit , both ghrelin administration to fed subjects ( Fed-Ghrelin ) and fasting ( Fasted-Saline ) significantly increased the appeal of high-energy foods and associated orbitofrontal cortex activation .
label: result

string: Both fasting and ghrelin administration also increased hippocampus activation to high-energy - and low-energy-food pictures .
label: result

string: These similar effects of endogenous and exogenous hyperghrelinemia were not explicable by consistent changes in glucose , insulin , peptide YY , and glucagon-like peptide-1 .
label: result

string: Neither ghrelin administration nor fasting had any significant effect on nucleus accumbens , caudate , anterior insula , or amygdala activation during the food-evaluation task or on auditory , motor , or visual cortex activation during a control task .
label: result

string: A visual search task was used as a training paradigm ; participants ( n = 16 adolescents , aged 13-16 ) had to repeatedly identify the only smiling face in a 4 4 matrix of negative emotional faces , while participants in the control condition ( n = 16 ) were randomly allocated to one of three placebo training versions .
label: method

string: An assessment version of the task was developed to directly test whether attentional bias changed due to the training .
label: method

string: Self-reported anxiety and depressive symptoms and self-esteem were measured pre - and post-training .
label: method

string: After two sessions of training , the ABM group showed a significant decrease in attentional bias for negative information and self-reported social phobia , while the control group did not .
label: result

string: There were no effects of training on depressive mood or self-esteem .
label: result

string: The incidence of chronic diseases , including diabetes mellitus ( DM ) , heart failure ( HF ) and chronic obstructive pulmonary disease ( COPD ) is on the rise .
label: background

string: The existing health care system must evolve to meet the growing needs of patients with these chronic diseases and reduce the strain on both acute care and hospital-based health care resources .
label: background

string: Paramedics are an allied health care resource consisting of highly-trained practitioners who are comfortable working independently and in collaboration with other resources in the out-of-hospital setting .
label: background

string: Expanding the paramedic 's scope of practice to include community-based care may decrease the utilization of acute care and hospital-based health care resources by patients with chronic disease .
label: background

string: This will be a pragmatic , randomized controlled trial comparing a community paramedic intervention to standard of care for patients with one of three chronic diseases .
label: method

string: The objective of the trial is to determine whether community paramedics conducting regular home visits , including health assessments and evidence-based treatments , in partnership with primary care physicians and other community based resources , will decrease the rate of hospitalization and emergency department use for patients with DM , HF and COPD .
label: method

string: The primary outcome measure will be the rate of hospitalization at one year .
label: method

string: Secondary outcomes will include measures of health system utilization , overall health status , and cost-effectiveness of the intervention over the same time period .
label: method

string: Outcome measures will be assessed using both Poisson regression and negative binomial regression analyses to assess the primary outcome .
label: method

string: ClinicalTrials.gov : NCT02034045 .
label: background

string: Date : 9 January 2014 .
label: background

string: Sixty investigators at 58 private , ambulatory , primary care sites in the US enrolled 542 outpatient adults 40 years old with moderate to severe idiopathic osteoarthritis pain into a randomized , placebo-controlled , double-blind 12 week clinical trial .
label: method

string: Patients were randomly assigned to treatment given three times daily of acetaminophen 1300mg ( n = 267 ) or placebo ( n = 275 ) .
label: method

string: The three primary endpoints measured through week 12 favored acetaminophen ER as follows : least squares ( LS ) mean change from baseline for WOMAC physical function subscale score was significantly greater for acetaminophen ER than for placebo ( P = 0.011 ) ; LS mean patient 's global assessment of response to therapy was significantly greater for acetaminophen ER than for placebo ( P = 0.010 ) ; and LS mean change from baseline for WOMAC pain subscale score was marginally greater for acetaminophen ER than for placebo ( P = 0.054 ) .
label: result

string: LS mean change from baseline for secondary endpoints through week 12 also favored acetaminophen ER compared with placebo : significantly for WOMAC stiffness subscale score ( P = 0.004 ) , significantly for WOMAC total index score ( P = 0.013 ) , and marginally for Nottingham Health Profile energy subscale score ( P = 0.057 ) .
label: result

string: The percentage of patients with any adverse event was similar for both treatment groups .
label: result

string: Hepatic transaminases exceeded 3ULN in seven acetaminophen ER patients and one placebo patient .
label: result

string: Elevations were attributed to health conditions in three of seven acetaminophen ER patients ; elevations in the remaining four patients returned to or toward normal .
label: result

string: We performed a randomised , double-blind , placebo-controlled study , examining the effect of 1-year treatment with allopurinol ( 300mg daily ) , on change in CBP , arterial stiffness and CIMT progression at 1year and change in endothelial function and circulating inflammatory markers at 6months .
label: method

string: Patients aged over 18years with recent ischaemic stroke or TIA were eligible .
label: method

string: Eighty participants were recruited , mean age 67.8 years ( SD 9.4 ) .
label: result

string: Systolic CBP [ -6.6 mmHg ( 95 % CI -13.0 to -0.3 ) , p = 0.042 ] and augmentation index [ -4.4 % ( 95 % CI -7.9 to -1.0 ) , p = 0.013 ] were each lower following allopurinol treatment compared with placebo at 12months .
label: result

string: Progression in mean common CIMT at 1year was less in allopurinol-treated patients compared with placebo [ between-group difference [ -0.097 mm ( 95 % CI -0.175 to -0.019 ) , p = 0.015 ] .
label: result

string: No difference was observed for measures of endothelial function .
label: result

string: ISRCTN11970568 .
label: background

string: Patient-reported outcomes are increasingly incorporated in drug evaluation trials .
label: background

string: Whether new immunosuppressive drugs result in an improved health-related quality of life ( HRQoL ) and a reduced side effect experiences remains unknown .
label: background

string: Moreover , the relationship between HRQoL and kidney function has never been investigated in kidney transplant recipients .
label: background

string: Using the BENEFIT and BENEFIT-EXT trials , we investigated the following : ( a ) evolution of HRQoL , assessed by the Medical Outcomes Short Form Health Survey ( SF-36 ) in the first 3 years ( baseline , 12 , 24 , and 36 months ) after kidney transplantation ; ( b ) association among kidney function ( chronic kidney disease stage ) , HRQoL , and patient-reported side effects ( Modified Transplant Symptom Occurrence and Symptom Distress Scale-59R ; BENEFIT trial only ) ; and ( c ) impact of belatacept and cyclosporine on side effect experience and HRQoL .
label: method

string: In the BENEFIT trial , all subjects reported clinically meaningful improvements compared with baseline and returned to general population scores , both for physical composite score ( PCS ) and mental composite score Short Form ( 36 ) Health Survey at 12 to 36 months after transplantation .
label: result

string: In the BENEFIT-EXT trial , this was observed for PCS only .
label: result

string: Belatacept-treated patients reported better absolute PCSs compared with cyclosporine-treated patients .
label: result

string: The differences were small but statistically significant at all times .
label: result

string: Belatacept-treated patients tended to experience less side effects compared with cyclosporine-treated patients , except for dry skin .
label: result

string: Worsening kidney function was associated with a significant decrease in HRQoL .
label: result

string: Neurocysticercosis causes a substantial burden of seizure disorders worldwide .
label: background

string: Treatment with either praziquantel or albendazole has suboptimum efficacy .
label: background

string: We aimed to establish whether combination of these drugs would increase cysticidal efficacy and whether complete cyst resolution results in fewer seizures .
label: background

string: We added an increased dose albendazole group to establish a potential effect of increased albendazole concentrations .
label: background

string: In this double-blind , placebo-controlled , phase 3 trial , patients with viable intraparenchymal neurocysticercosis were randomly assigned to receive 10 days of combined albendazole ( 15 mg/kg per day ) plus praziquantel ( 50 mg/kg per day ) , standard albendazole ( 15 mg/kg per day ) , or increased dose albendazole ( 225 mg/kg per day ) .
label: method

string: Randomisation was done with a computer generated schedule balanced within four strata based on number of cysts and concomitant antiepileptic drug .
label: method

string: Patients and investigators were masked to group assignment .
label: method

string: The primary outcome was complete cyst resolution on 6-month MRI .
label: method

string: Enrolment was stopped after interim analysis because of parasiticidal superiority of one treatment group .
label: method

string: Analysis excluded patients lost to follow-up before the 6-month MRI .
label: method

string: This trial is registered with ClinicalTrials.gov , number NCT00441285 .
label: method

string: Between March 3 , 2010 and Nov 14 , 2011 , 124 patients were randomly assigned to study groups ( 41 to receive combined albendazole plus praziquantel [ 39 analysed ] , 43 standard albendazole [ 41 analysed ] , and 40 increased albendazole [ 38 analysed ] ) .
label: result

string: 25 ( 64 % ) of 39 patients in the combined treatment group had complete resolution of brain cysts compared with 15 ( 37 % ) of 41 patients in the standard albendazole group ( rate ratio [ RR ] 175 , 95 % CI 110-279 , p = 0014 ) .
label: result

string: 20 ( 53 % ) of 38 patients in the increased albendazole group had complete cyst resolution at 6-month MRI compared with 15 ( 37 % ) of 41 patients in the standard albendazole group ( RR 144 , 95 % CI 087-238 , p = 0151 ) .
label: result

string: No significant differences in adverse events were reported between treatment groups ( 18 in combined treatment group , 11 in standard albendazole group , and 19 in increased albendazole group ) .
label: result

string: National Institute of Neurological Disorders and Stroke ( NINDS ) , National Institutes of Health .
label: background

string: From February 2008 to April 2012 , 652 patients with ALS from European population-based registries ( France , Ireland , Italy , United Kingdom , Serbia ) and 1,166 population controls ( matched for age , sex , and residency ) were assessed .
label: method

string: Upon direct interview , data were collected on occupation and history of sport and leisure activities , physical activity , and accidental injuries .
label: method

string: Physical exercise was defined as having spent time doing activities that caused an individual to breath hard at least once per month and was coded as none , job-related , and/or sport-related .
label: method

string: Sport-related and work-related physical exercise were quantified using metabolic equivalents ( METs ) .
label: method

string: Risks were calculated using conditional logistic regression models ( adjusting for age , country , trauma , and job-related physical activity ) and expressed as odds ratios ( ORs ) and adjusted ORs ( Adj ORs ) with 95 % confidence intervals ( CIs ) .
label: method

string: Overall physical activity was associated with reduced odds of having ALS ( Adj OR = 0.65 , 95 % CI = 0.48-0 .89 ) as were work-related physical activity ( Adj OR = 0.56 , 95 % CI = 0.36-0 .87 ) and organized sports ( Adj OR = 0.49 , 95 % CI = 0.32-0 .75 ) .
label: result

string: An inverse correlation was observed between ALS , the duration of physical activity ( p = 0.0041 ) , and the cumulative MET scores , which became significant for the highest exposure ( Adj OR = 0.34 , 95 % CI = 0.21-0 .54 ) .
label: result

string: An inverse correlation between ALS and sport was found in women but not in men , and in subjects with repeated traumatic events .
label: result

string: Intensive hemodialysis ( HD ) may have significant benefits .
label: background

string: Recently , the role of extended hemodiafiltration ( HDF ) has gained interest .
label: background

string: The aim of this study was to evaluate the acute effects of extended HD and HDF on hemodynamic response and solute removal .
label: background

string: Randomized crossover trial .
label: method

string: Stable patients with end-stage renal disease undergoing conventional HD .
label: method

string: 13 patients randomly completed a single study of 4-hour HD ( HD4 ) , 4-hour HDF ( HDF4 ) , 8-hour HD ( HD8 ) , and 8-hour HDF ( HDF8 ) , with a 2-week interval between study sessions .
label: method

string: Between study sessions , patients received routine conventional HD treatments .
label: method

string: Acute hemodynamic effects and uremic toxin clearance .
label: result

string: Blood pressure and heart rate , pulse wave analysis , cardiac output , and microvascular density by sublingual capillaroscopy , as well as relative blood volume and thermal variables , were measured .
label: method

string: Clearance and removal of uremic toxins also were studied .
label: method

string: Long treatments showed more stability of peripheral systolic blood pressure ( change during HD4 , -21.715.6 mm Hg ; during HDF4 , -23.320.8 mm Hg ; during HD8 , -6.715.2 mm Hg [ P = 0.04 vs. HD4 ; P = 0.08 vs. HDF4 ] ; and during HDF8 , -0.514.4 mm Hg [ P = 0.004 vs. HD4 ; P = 0.008 vs. HDF4 ] ) .
label: result

string: A similar observation was found for peripheral diastolic and central blood pressures .
label: result

string: Cardiac output remained more stable in extended sessions ( change during HD4 , -1.41.5 L/min ; during HDF4 , -1.61.0 L/min ; during HD8 , -0.40.9 L/min [ P = 0.02 vs. HDF4 ] ; and during HDF8 , -0.50.8 L/min [ P = 0.06 vs. HD4 ; P = 0.03 vs. HDF4 ) , in line with the decreased relative blood volume slope in long dialysis .
label: result

string: No differences in microvascular density were found .
label: result

string: Energy transfer rates were comparable ( HD4 , 13.34.7 W ; HDF4 , 16.25.6 W ; HD8 , 14.26.0 W ; and HDF8 , 14.54.3 W ) .
label: result

string: Small-molecule and phosphate removal were superior during long treatments .
label: result

string: 2-Microglobulin and fibroblast growth factor 23 ( FGF-23 ) reduction ratios were highest in HDF8 .
label: result

string: Results from the National Lung Cancer Audit demonstrate unexplained variation in outcomes .
label: background

string: Peer review with supported quality improvement has been shown to reduce variation in other areas of health care but has not been formally tested in cancer multidisciplinary teams .
label: background

string: The aim of the current study is to assess the impact of reciprocal peer-to-peer review visits with supported quality improvement and collaborative working on lung cancer process and outcome measures .
label: background

string: English lung cancer teams were randomised to usual care or facilitated reciprocal peer review visits followed by 12 months of supported quality improvement .
label: method

string: The primary outcome was change in the following national audit indicators ; mulitdisciplinary team discussion , histological confirmation , active treatment , surgical resection , small-cell chemotherapy and specialist nurse review .
label: method

string: Patient experience was measured using a new lung cancer patient questionnaire in the intervention group .
label: method

string: Thirty teams ( 31 trusts ) entered the intervention group and 29 of these submitted a total of 67 quality improvement plans .
label: result

string: Active treatment increased in the intervention group ( n = 31 ) by 5.2 % compared with 1.2 % in the control group ( n = 48 , mean difference 4.1 % , 95 % CI -0.1 to 8.2 % , P = 0.055 ) .
label: result

string: The remaining audit indicators improved similarly in all groups .
label: result

string: Mean patient experience scores in the intervention group did not change significantly during the study but a significant improvement was seen in the scores for the five teams with the worst baseline scores ( 0.86 to 0.22 , P < 0.001 ) .
label: result

string: A total of 96 patients with silicosis were randomly divided into treatment group ( 49 cases ) and control group ( 47 cases ) .
label: method

string: Both groups were given routine therapy including anti-inflammatory , antitussive , and antiasthmatic drugs , and the patients in treatment group were given tetrandrine combined with acetylcysteine effervescent tablets at the same time .
label: method

string: Tetrandrine ( 100 mg ) was orally administrated twice a day , and there was a one-day interval between every 6 days ' continuous administration ; totally , there were four courses of treatment , with 3 months for each course , and there was a one-month break between each course .
label: method

string: Acetylcysteine effervescent tablets ( 600 mg ) were taken twice a day ; each course of treatment was 12 days , and there were four courses ; for the first two months , there was one course per month , and then one course every other two months for the rest of time .
label: method

string: Clinical symptoms , pulmonary ventilation function , serum superoxide dismutase ( SOD ) and changes in X-ray findings were observed .
label: method

string: After treatment , the treatment group had significantly increased rates of improvements in cough , expectoration , chest congestion and pain , and dyspnea compared with the control group ( P < 0.05 ) .
label: result

string: Compared with the control group ( serum SOD level : 70.46620.261 U/ml ) and the treatment group before therapy ( serum SOD level : 68.18221.414 U/ml ) , the treatment group after therapy had significantly increased serum SOD level ( 77.38921.315 U/ml ?
label: result

string: , forced vital capacity , and forced expiratory volume in one second ( P < 0.05 ) .
label: result

string: Eight patients in treatment group showed improvement in the chest X-ray findings of silicosis .
label: result

string: Pneumococcal polysaccharide conjugate vaccines prevent pneumococcal disease in infants , but their efficacy against pneumococcal community-acquired pneumonia in adults 65 years of age or older is unknown .
label: background

string: In a randomized , double-blind , placebo-controlled trial involving 84,496 adults 65 years of age or older , we evaluated the efficacy of 13-valent polysaccharide conjugate vaccine ( PCV13 ) in preventing first episodes of vaccine-type strains of pneumococcal community-acquired pneumonia , nonbacteremic and noninvasive pneumococcal community-acquired pneumonia , and invasive pneumococcal disease .
label: method

string: Standard laboratory methods and a serotype-specific urinary antigen detection assay were used to identify community-acquired pneumonia and invasive pneumococcal disease .
label: method

string: In the per-protocol analysis of first episodes of infections due to vaccine-type strains , community-acquired pneumonia occurred in 49 persons in the PCV13 group and 90 persons in the placebo group ( vaccine efficacy , 45.6 % ; 95.2 % confidence interval [ CI ] , 21.8 to 62.5 ) , nonbacteremic and noninvasive community-acquired pneumonia occurred in 33 persons in the PCV13 group and 60 persons in the placebo group ( vaccine efficacy , 45.0 % ; 95.2 % CI , 14.2 to 65.3 ) , and invasive pneumococcal disease occurred in 7 persons in the PCV13 group and 28 persons in the placebo group ( vaccine efficacy , 75.0 % ; 95 % CI , 41.4 to 90.8 ) .
label: result

string: Efficacy persisted throughout the trial ( mean follow-up , 3.97 years ) .
label: result

string: In the modified intention-to-treat analysis , similar efficacy was observed ( vaccine efficacy , 37.7 % , 41.1 % , and 75.8 % , respectively ) , and community-acquired pneumonia occurred in 747 persons in the PCV13 group and 787 persons in placebo group ( vaccine efficacy , 5.1 % ; 95 % CI , -5.1 to 14.2 ) .
label: result

string: Numbers of serious adverse events and deaths were similar in the two groups , but there were more local reactions in the PCV13 group .
label: result

string: Basal cell carcinoma ( BCC ) is the most common form of cancer among Caucasians and its incidence continues to rise .
label: background

string: Surgical excision ( SE ) is considered standard treatment , though randomised trials with long-term follow-up are rare .
label: background

string: We now report the long-term results of a randomised trial comparing surgical excision with Mohs ' micrographic surgery ( MMS ) for facial BCC .
label: background

string: 408 facial , high risk ( diameter at least 1cm , H-zone location or aggressive histological subtype ) primary BCCs ( pBCCs ) and 204 facial recurrent BCCs ( rBCCs ) were randomly allocated to treatment with either SE or MMS between 5th October 1999 and 27th February 2002 .
label: method

string: The primary outcome was recurrence of carcinoma .
label: method

string: A modified intention to treat analysis was performed .
label: method

string: For primary BCC , the 10-year cumulative probabilities of recurrence were 4.4 % after MMS and 12.2 % after SE ( Log-rank test ( 2 ) 2.704 , p = 0.100 ) .
label: result

string: For recurrent BCC , cumulative 10-year recurrence probabilities were 3.9 % and 13.5 % for MMS and SE , respectively ( Log-rank ( 2 ) 5.166 , p = 0.023 ) .
label: result

string: A substantial proportion of recurrences occurred after more than 5years post-treatment : 56 % for pBCC and 14 % for rBCC .
label: result

string: I.v. 0.9 % sodium chloride ( normal saline ) is frequently used to treat ED patients with acute alcohol intoxication despite the lack of evidence for its efficacy .
label: background

string: A single-blind , randomised , controlled trial was conducted to compare a single bolus of 20 mL/kg i.v. normal saline plus observation with observation alone .
label: method

string: One hundred and forty-four ED patients with uncomplicated acute alcohol intoxication were included .
label: method

string: The study was conducted in one tertiary and one urban ED in Queensland , Australia .
label: method

string: Primary outcome was ED length of stay ( EDLOS ) .
label: method

string: Secondary outcomes were treatment time , breath alcohol levels , intoxication symptom score , level of intoxication and associated healthcare costs .
label: method

string: Both groups were comparable at baseline : blood alcohol content ( BAC ) was similar between treatment and control groups ( 0.20 % BAC vs 0.19 % BAC , P = 0.44 ) as were initial intoxication symptom scores ( 22.0 vs 22.3 , P = 0.90 ) .
label: result

string: Both groups had a similar EDLOS ( 287 min vs 274 min , P = 0.89 ; difference 13 min [ 95 % CI -37 -63 ] ) and treatment time ( 244 min vs 232 min , P = 0.94 ; difference 12 min [ 95 % CI -31 -55 ] ) .
label: result

string: Change of breath alcohol levels , intoxication score and level of intoxication were not significantly different between the two groups .
label: result

string: Patients in the treatment group had an additional healthcare cost of A$ 31.92 compared with control .
label: result

string: Four disbudding protocols were used on 3 - to 6-week-old Friesian-Jersey calves .
label: method

string: Farm staff disbudded 101 calves without sedation or local analgesia , of which 51 received 20mg meloxicam S/C .
label: method

string: Veterinary staff disbudded 101 calves with sedation and local analgesia , of which 51 also received 20mg meloxicam S/C .
label: method

string: Calves were weighed before disbudding , 15 and 30 days later , and individual milk consumption was recorded for 11 days .
label: method

string: Daily weight gain and milk consumption were analysed using mixed models and ANOVA .
label: method

string: From disbudding ( Day 0 ) to Day 15 farmer-disbudded calves receiving meloxicam grew faster ( 0.65 kg/day ) than calves without meloxicam ( 0.55 kg/day ; p = 0.011 ) , but an interaction between operator and meloxicam treatment ( p = 0.056 ) meant that meloxicam treatment did not increase growth rates in veterinary-disbudded calves ( 0.63 vs. 0.64 kg/day ; p = 0.872 ) .
label: result

string: From Days 16-30 there was no significant effect of meloxicam on growth rate , but veterinarian-disbudded calves grew faster ( 0.76 kg/day ) than farmer-disbudded calves ( 0.66 kg/day ; p = 0.034 ) .
label: result

string: Overall , for the first 30 days after disbudding , if meloxicam was not used ' , veterinarian-disbudded calves grew faster than farmer-disbudded calves ( p = 0.002 ) .
label: result

string: However if meloxicam was used at disbudding there was no difference in growth rate between veterinarian - and farmer-disbudded calves ( p = 0.878 ) .
label: result

string: Mean cumulative milk consumption for the 11 days after disbudding was greater for calves disbudded by veterinary staff than by farm staff ( p < 0.001 ) , but there was no effect of meloxicam treatment ( p = 0.618 ) and no interaction with operator ( p = 0.86 ) on cumulative milk consumption .
label: result

string: Data on risk associated with 24-hour ambulatory diastolic ( DBP24 ) versus systolic ( SBP24 ) blood pressure are scarce .
label: background

string: We recorded 24-hour blood pressure and health outcomes in 8341 untreated people ( mean age , 50.8 years ; 46.6 % women ) randomly recruited from 12 populations .
label: result

string: We computed hazard ratios ( HRs ) using multivariable-adjusted Cox regression .
label: result

string: Over 11.2 years ( median ) , 927 ( 11.1 % ) participants died , 356 ( 4.3 % ) from cardiovascular causes , and 744 ( 8.9 % ) experienced a fatal or nonfatal cardiovascular event .
label: result

string: Isolated diastolic hypertension ( DBP2480 mmHg ) did not increase the risk of total mortality , cardiovascular mortality , or stroke ( HRs1 .54 ; P0 .18 ) , but was associated with a higher risk of fatal combined with nonfatal cardiovascular , cardiac , or coronary events ( HRs1 .75 ; P0 .0054 ) .
label: result

string: Isolated systolic hypertension ( SBP24130 mmHg ) and mixed diastolic plus systolic hypertension were associated with increased risks of all aforementioned end points ( P0 .0012 ) .
label: result

string: Below age 50 , DBP24 was the main driver of risk , reaching significance for total ( HR for 1-SD increase , 2.05 ; P = 0.0039 ) and cardiovascular mortality ( HR , 4.07 ; P = 0.0032 ) and for all cardiovascular end points combined ( HR , 1.74 ; P = 0.039 ) with a nonsignificant contribution of SBP24 ( HR0 .92 ; P0 .068 ) ; above age 50 , SBP24 predicted all end points ( HR1 .19 ; P0 .0002 ) with a nonsignificant contribution of DBP24 ( 0.96 HR1 .14 ; P0 .10 ) .
label: result

string: The interactions of age with SBP24 and DBP24 were significant for all cardiovascular and coronary events ( P0 .043 ) .
label: result

string: We performed a secondary analysis of a randomized , double-blind , placebo , controlled study conducted in twenty five overweight/obese ( BMI ~ 30kg/m ( 2 ) ) adults with impaired fasting glucose or untreated diabetes .
label: method

string: Participants were randomized to three months of pioglitazone ( 45mg per day ) plus metformin ( 1000mg twice per day , N = 12 participants ) or placebo ( N = 13 ) .
label: method

string: We measured insulin sensitivity by the euglycemic-hyperinsulinemic clamp and fasting concentrations of AA and AA metabolites using ultra-pressure liquid chromatography tandem mass spectrometry before and after the three-month intervention .
label: method

string: Insulin sensitizer therapy that significantly enhanced insulin sensitivity reduced 9 out of 33 AA and AA metabolites measured compared to placebo treatment .
label: result

string: Moreover , insulin sensitizer therapy significantly reduced three functionally clustered AA and metabolite pairs : i ) phenylalanine/tyrosine , ii ) citrulline/arginine , and iii ) lysine / - aminoadipic acid .
label: result

string: Totally 88 RA patients were randomly assigned to the treatment group [ 47 cases , YTR combined Methotrexate ( MTX ) + Leflunomide ( LEF ) treatment ] and the control group ( 41 cases , MTX + LEF therapy ) .
label: method

string: All patients received 12-week treatment .
label: method

string: Clinical symptoms and signs , laboratory tests [ erythrocyte sedimentation rate ( ESR ) , rheumatoid factor ( RF ) , and C reactive protein ( CRP ) ] , and adverse reactions were observed before and after treatment .
label: method

string: The total effective rate was 91.5 % ( 43/47 cases ) in the treatment group , and the total effective rate was 75.6 % ( 31/41 cases ) in the control group .
label: result

string: There was statistical difference between the two groups ( P < 0.05 ) .
label: result

string: The morning stiffness , the rest pain , the number of tender joints , the number of swollen joints , tender joint index , swollen joint index , ESR , RF , and CRP were significantly improved in the two groups after treatment ( P < 0.01 ) .
label: result

string: Besides , clinical symptoms and signs , ESR , RF , and CRP were more improved in the treatment group after treatment , when compared with those in the control group ( P < 0.05 ) .
label: result

string: Gastrointestinal discomfort was the main adverse reaction in the two groups , but the occurrence was lower in the treatment group than in the control group ( P > 0.05 ) .
label: result

string: The Bypass Angioplasty Revascularization Investigation in Type 2 Diabetes ( BARI 2D ) randomized controlled trial assigned participants to insulin-sensitizing ( IS ) therapy versus insulin-providing ( IP ) therapy .
label: method

string: A total of 1,479 participants with normal ankle-brachial index ( ABI ) at study entry were eligible for analysis .
label: method

string: PAD outcomes included new ABI 0.9 with decrease at least 0.1 from baseline , lower extremity revascularization , or lower extremity amputation .
label: method

string: Baseline risk factors within the overall cohort and time-varying risk factors within each assigned glycemic control arm were assessed using Cox proportional hazards models .
label: method

string: During an average 4.6 years of follow-up , 303 participants ( 20.5 % ) experienced an incident case of PAD .
label: result

string: Age , sex , race , and baseline smoking status were all significantly associated with incident PAD in the BARI 2D cohort .
label: result

string: Additional baseline risk factors included pulse pressure , HbA1c , and albumin-to-creatinine ratio ( P < 0.05 for each ) .
label: result

string: In stratified analyses of time-varying covariates , changes in BMI , LDL , HDL , systolic blood pressure , and pulse pressure were most predictive among IS patients , while change in HbA1c was most predictive among IP patients .
label: result

string: Human T cell lymphotropic virus type I-associated myelopathy/tropical spastic paraparesis ( HAM/TSP ) can impact the independence and motricity of patients .
label: background

string: The aims of this study were to estimate the effects of physiotherapy on the functionality of patients with HAM/TSP during the stable phase of the disease using proprioceptive neuromuscular facilitation ( PNF ) and to compare two methods of treatment delivery .
label: background

string: Fourteen patients with human T cell lymphotropic virus type I ( HTLV-I ) were randomly allocated into two groups .
label: method

string: In group I ( seven patients ) , PNF was applied by the therapist , facilitating the functional activities of rolling , sitting and standing , walking and climbing and descending stairs .
label: method

string: In group II ( seven patients ) , PNF was self-administered using an elastic tube , and the same activities were facilitated .
label: method

string: Experiments were conducted for 1h twice per week for 12 weeks .
label: method

string: Low-back pain , a modified Ashworth scale , the functional independence measure ( FIM ) and the timed up and go test ( TUG ) were assessed before and after the interventions .
label: method

string: In the within-group evaluation , low-back pain was significantly reduced in both groups , the FIM improved in group II , and the results of the TUG improved in group I.
label: result

string: In the inter-group analysis , only the tone was lower in group II than in group I.
label: result

string: The primary aim of the present study was to evaluate the short - and longer-term effects of a cycle training on children 's cycling skills .
label: background

string: A second aim of the study was to examine the effects of a cycle training , with and without parental involvement , on levels of cycling to school and on parental attitudes towards cycling .
label: background

string: Three participating schools were randomly assigned to the `` intervention '' ( 25 children ) , the `` intervention plus parent '' ( 34 children ) or `` control '' condition ( 35 children ) .
label: method

string: A cycle training ( four sessions of 45 min ) took place only in the intervention schools .
label: method

string: Parents in the `` intervention plus parent '' condition were asked to assist their child in completing weekly homework tasks .
label: method

string: Children 's cycling skills were assessed , using a practical cycling test .
label: method

string: All participating children also received a short parental questionnaire on cycling behavior and parental attitudes towards cycling .
label: method

string: Assessments took place at baseline , within 1 week after the last session and at 5-months follow-up .
label: method

string: Repeated measure analyses were conducted to evaluate the effects of the cycle training .
label: method

string: Children 's total cycling skill score increased significantly more from pre to post and from pre to 5-months follow-up in the intervention group than in the control group .
label: result

string: On walking with the bicycle ( F = 1.6 ) , cycling in a straight line ( F = 2.6 ) , cycling a slalom ( F = 1.9 ) , cycling over obstacles ( F = 2.1 ) , cycling on a sloping surface ( F = 1.7 ) and dismounting the bicycle ( F = 2.0 ) , the cycle training had no effect .
label: result

string: For all other cycling skills , significant improvements were observed on short - and longer-term .
label: result

string: No significant intervention effects were found on children 's cycling to school levels ( F = 1.9 ) and parental attitudes towards cycling .
label: result

string: Patients with no signs of pneumonia within 7 days of stroke onset and 48 hours of insertion of a nasogastric tube were recruited into a double-blind randomized placebo-controlled trial .
label: method

string: Participants received metoclopramide 10 mg or placebo 3 daily via the nasogastric tube for 21 days or until nasogastric feeds were discontinued .
label: method

string: Clinical signs of pneumonia were recorded daily .
label: method

string: Pneumonia was diagnosed if the patient had relevant clinical signs , high inflammatory markers , and new infiltrates on the chest radiograph .
label: method

string: Sixty patients ( mean age , 78 years ; 38 women ; mean National Institutes for Health Stroke Scale score , 19.25 ) were randomized in a 1:1 ratio .
label: result

string: There were significantly more episodes of pneumonia in the placebo group than in the metoclopramide group ( rate ratio , 5.24 ; P < 0.001 ) .
label: result

string: There were also significant differences in favor of metoclopramide in the rate of aspiration , oxygen saturation , highest inflammatory markers , and National Institutes for Health Stroke Scale .
label: result

string: There was no significant difference in mortality between the groups .
label: result

string: https://www.clinicaltrialsregister.eu .
label: background

string: EudraCT no : 2006-002570-22 , URL : http://www.controlled-trials.com/ISRCTN18034911/18034911 .
label: background

string: We conducted a randomized trial .
label: method

string: Self-identified black and Latina mothers early after delivery were assigned randomly to receive a behavioral educational intervention or enhanced usual care .
label: method

string: The 2-step intervention aimed to prepare and educate mothers about postpartum symptoms and experiences ( including tips on breastfeeding and breast/nipple pain ) and to bolster social support and self-management skills .
label: method

string: Enhanced usual care participants received a list of community resources and received a 2-week control call .
label: method

string: Intention-to-treat analyses examined breastfeeding duration ( measured in weeks ) for up to 6 months of observation .
label: method

string: This study was registered with clinicaltrial.gov ( NCT01312883 ) .
label: method

string: Five hundred forty mothers were assigned randomly to the intervention ( n = 270 ) vs control subjects ( n = 270 ) .
label: result

string: Mean age was 28 years ( range , 18-46 years ) ; 62 % of the women were Latina , and 38 % were black .
label: result

string: Baseline sociodemographic , clinical , psychosocial , and breastfeeding characteristics were similar among intervention vs control subjects .
label: result

string: Mothers in the intervention arm breastfed for a longer duration than did the control subjects ( median , 12.0 vs 6.5 weeks , respectively ; P = .02 ) Mothers in the intervention arm were less likely to quit breastfeeding over the first 6 months after delivery ( hazard ratio , 0.79 ; 95 % confidence interval , 0.65-0 .97 ) .
label: result

string: A prospective quasi-randomized patients-preference controlled trial was conducted in 74 head and neck cancer patients .
label: method

string: Subjects in study and control groups ( 37 each ) had similar baseline HRQOL and body mass index and undergone definitive radiotherapy ( 25-35 RT fractions , 5,000-7 ,000 cGy ) .
label: method

string: Only study group received a 200-ml box of Nutri-jelly as daily supplement throughout radiotherapy .
label: method

string: HRQOL was scored by validated questionnaires .
label: method

string: The use of tube feeding was collected from medical records .
label: method

string: From 11 to 35 RT fractions , the study group maintained higher overall HRQOL score than that of control group ( p < 0.0001 ) .
label: result

string: Multiple physiologic and psychological aspects of HRQOL especially swallowing difficulty and overall eating problems were significantly improved in study as compared to control group .
label: result

string: Promisingly , the percentage of tube feeding use in study group ( 13.5 % ) was dramatically lower than control group ( 48.6 % ) .
label: result

string: A prospective , single-center trial was performed in which 30 patients were randomly assigned to undergo SIRT with coil embolization or the use of an ARM .
label: method

string: The coil group underwent detachable coil embolization of nontarget vessels , and the ARM group underwent infusion of macroaggregated albumin with use of an ARM system , without coil embolization .
label: method

string: Single-photon emission computed tomography ( CT ) / CT was then performed to assess for nontarget distribution .
label: method

string: The primary endpoint was fluoroscopy time during planning angiography .
label: method

string: Secondary endpoints included deployment time , total procedure time , radiation dose-area product , contrast agent used , and adverse events .
label: method

string: Endpoints were evaluated during planning angiography and SIRT .
label: method

string: Over a 9-month period , 30 consecutive patients were randomized at a 1:1 ratio between coil embolization and ARM groups .
label: result

string: Technical success rates were 100 % in both groups .
label: result

string: Mean fluoroscopy time was significantly reduced in the ARM group versus the coil embolization group ( 1.8 min [ range , 0.4-4 .9 min ] vs 6.0 min [ range , 1.9-15 .7 min ] ; P = .002 ) .
label: result

string: The planning procedure time ( P < .001 ) , deployment time ( P < .001 ) , dose-area product ( P = .04 ) , and amount of contrast agent used ( P < .001 ) were also significantly less in the ARM group than in the coil embolization group .
label: result

string: No nontarget distribution was detected in either group .
label: result

string: There was no difference between groups in dose delivered on the day of SIRT ( P = .71 ) .
label: result

string: There were no major or minor adverse events at 30 days .
label: result

string: Medication nonadherence is a common problem , resulting in significant human and economic cost , which can be a challenge to identify and resolve in practice .
label: background

string: Adherence tools have been developed to assist health care providers with managing medication nonadherence ; however , there is a need to develop a literature base for using adherence tools effectively .
label: background

string: A practice-based study involving 6 primary care clinics and 4 community pharmacies in Iowa and Michigan was conducted .
label: method

string: Each adherence tool was administered approximately 20 times by pharmacists or student pharmacists to patients at each site , using a crossover design with randomization to the initial tool .
label: method

string: Sites determined how to incorporate tools into workflow and how to select patients .
label: method

string: Data from completed tools were analyzed descriptively .
label: method

string: Data from an online survey completed by tool administrators about their experiences and suggestions were analyzed thematically .
label: method

string: Sites submitted 209 AE and 179 DRAW tools .
label: result

string: Half of patients with a completed AE had at least 1 medication of medium or high risk of nonadherence , and 19 % had at least 1 medication of high risk .
label: result

string: For DRAW , 82 % of patients reported at least 1 yes answer for reasons for nonadherence , and 58 % reported 2 .
label: result

string: On average , the AE tool took 6.9 minutes , and the DRAW tool took 9.3 minutes .
label: result

string: Forty-four surveys were submitted ( 20 community and 24 clinic ) .
label: result

string: Two themes emerged from the open-ended responses : tool benefits and translating tools into practice .
label: result

string: While the tools were useful for identifying specific reasons for nonadherence and promoting dialogue , they required additional time and effort from both patients and pharmacists .
label: result

string: Health literacy , patient reluctance to discuss nonadherence , AE scaling , and DRAW length were voiced as concerns .
label: result

string: Topical applications of emollients such as sunflower seed oil and Aquaphor have been shown to reduce the incidence of bloodstream infections and mortality of preterm infants in resource-poor settings .
label: background

string: The causal mechanism for prevention of infection through cutaneous portals of entry is not well understood .
label: background

string: We examined the relationship between skin condition score as a measure of skin barrier integrity and risk for bloodstream infection , and the effect of emollients on that relationship .
label: method

string: Data for this study come from a randomized controlled trial of the impact of topical emollient therapy on nosocomial infections in 491 preterm infants < 33 weeks gestational age at Dhaka Shishu Hospital , Bangladesh .
label: method

string: Latent growth trajectory model with random-coefficient and multivariable logistic regression were utilized .
label: method

string: Rate of deterioration of skin condition was significantly lower ( P < 0.05 ) in both emollient arms compared with the untreated control group .
label: result

string: Adjusted odds ratio of skin score for infection was 1.32 ( 95 % confidence interval : 1.06-1 .65 ) .
label: result

string: Emollients reduced the incidence of infection only when the skin had no signs of deterioration [ Aquaphor incidence rate ratio : 0.43 ( 95 % confidence interval : 0.19-0 .97 ) and sunflower seed oil incidence rate ratio : 0.46 ( 95 % confidence interval : 0.21-0 .99 ) ] .
label: result

string: Four pediatric and four family medicine ( FM ) practices in Colorado with a common public health department ( PHD ) were randomized at the beginning of baseline year ( 10/2009 ) to Intervention ( joint community clinics and PHD nurses aiding in delivery at practices ) ; or control involving usual care without PHD .
label: method

string: Generalized estimating equations compared changes in rates over baseline between intervention and control practices at end of 2nd intervention year ( Y2 = 5/2011 ) .
label: method

string: Barriers to collaboration were examined using qualitative methods .
label: method

string: Overall , rates increased from baseline to Y2 by 9.2 % in intervention and 3.2 % in control ( p < .0001 ) , with significant increases in both pediatric and FM practices .
label: result

string: The largest increases were seen among school-aged and adolescent children ( p < .0001 for both ) , with differences for 6-month-old to 5-year-old children and for children with high-risk conditions not reaching significance .
label: result

string: Barriers to collaboration included uncertainty regarding the delivery of vaccine supplies , concerns about using up all purchased vaccine by practices , and concerns about documentation of vaccination if collaboration occurred .
label: result

string: Twenty primary care practices treating children ( range for n = 536-8183 ) were randomly assigned to Intervention and Control arms to test the effectiveness of an evidence-based practice improvement toolkit ( 4 Pillars Toolkit ) and early vaccine supplies for use among disadvantaged children on influenza vaccination rates among children 6 months-18 years .
label: method

string: Follow-up staff meetings and surveys were used to assess use and acceptability of the intervention strategies in the Intervention arm .
label: method

string: Rates for the 2010-2011 and 2011-2012 influenza seasons were compared .
label: method

string: Two-level generalized linear mixed modeling was used to evaluate outcomes .
label: method

string: Overall increases in influenza vaccination rates were significantly greater in the Intervention arm ( 7.9 percentage points ) compared with the Control arm ( 4.4 percentage points ; P < 0.034 ) .
label: result

string: These rate changes represent 4522 additional doses in the Intervention arm vs. 1390 additional doses in the Control arm .
label: result

string: This effect of the intervention was observed despite the fact that rates increased significantly in both arms - 8/10 Intervention ( all P < 0.001 ) and 7/10 Control sites ( P-values = 0.04 to < 0.001 ) .
label: result

string: Rates in two Intervention sites with pre-intervention vaccination rates > 58 % did not significantly increase .
label: result

string: In regression analyses , a child 's likelihood of being vaccinated was significantly higher with : younger age , white race ( Odds ratio [ OR ] = 1.29 ; 95 % confidence interval [ CI ] = 1.23-1 .34 ) , having commercial insurance ( OR = 1.30 ; 95 % CI = 1.25-1 .35 ) , higher pre-intervention practice vaccination rate ( OR = 1.25 ; 95 % CI = 1.16-1 .34 ) , and being in the Intervention arm ( OR = 1.23 ; 95 % CI = 1.01-1 .50 ) .
label: result

string: Early delivery of influenza vaccine was rated by Intervention practices as an effective strategy for raising rates .
label: result

string: Increased brain atrophy rates are common in older people with cognitive impairment , particularly in those who eventually convert to Alzheimer disease .
label: background

string: Plasma concentrations of omega-3 ( -3 ) fatty acids and homocysteine are associated with the development of brain atrophy and dementia .
label: background

string: This retrospective analysis included 168 elderly people ( 70 y ) with mild cognitive impairment , randomly assigned either to placebo ( n = 83 ) or to daily high-dose B vitamin supplementation ( folic acid , 0.8 mg ; vitamin B-6 , 20 mg ; vitamin B-12 , 0.5 mg ) ( n = 85 ) .
label: method

string: The subjects underwent cranial magnetic resonance imaging scans at baseline and 2 y later .
label: method

string: The effect of the intervention was analyzed according to tertiles of baseline -3 fatty acid concentrations .
label: method

string: There was a significant interaction ( P = 0.024 ) between B vitamin treatment and plasma combined -3 fatty acids ( eicosapentaenoic acid and docosahexaenoic acid ) on brain atrophy rates .
label: result

string: In subjects with high baseline -3 fatty acids ( > 590 mol/L ) , B vitamin treatment slowed the mean atrophy rate by 40.0 % compared with placebo ( P = 0.023 ) .
label: result

string: B vitamin treatment had no significant effect on the rate of atrophy among subjects with low baseline -3 fatty acids ( < 390 mol/L ) .
label: result

string: High baseline -3 fatty acids were associated with a slower rate of brain atrophy in the B vitamin group but not in the placebo group .
label: result

string: A randomized and single-blinded clinical trial in women infected with HIV/AIDS who had their treatment at the outpatient clinic of Pokdiksus AIDS RSCM and at the AIDS Comprehensive Diagnostic Unit of Dharmais Hospital was conducted between October 2011 and March 2012 .
label: method

string: A block randomization of 160 female subjects with AIDS was performed that resulted in a REBT-based treatment group ( n = 80 ) and a control group ( n = 80 ) .
label: method

string: The treatment group received REBT-based intervention of 8 sessions weekly including 6 individual-therapeutic sessions/week and 2 group-therapeutic sessions/week .
label: method

string: Instruments used in the study were questionnaires on demography , ART adherence ( measured by self report and pill count ) , and mental health ( SRQ-20 ) .
label: method

string: Data were analyzed using Chi-Square test , Generalized Linear Model , and Generalized Estimating Equations .
label: method

string: There were 148 respondents analyzed including in the REBT-based group ( n = 72 ) and in the control group ( n = 76 ) with mean age of 33-34 years .
label: result

string: After 8 weeks of REBT-based intervention , there was improved ( increased ) mean value of the self-reported adherence score ( self-report ) compared to control group ( 100 % ; CI 95 % ,83.3 -96.7 vs. 84 % ; CI 95 % ,77.5 -87.8 ) and improved ( decreased ) SRQ-20 mean score in REBT-based treatment group compared to control group ( 2.9 ; CI 95 % , 2.7-13 .0 vs. 5.4 ; CI 95 % : 5.0-13 .6 ) .
label: result

string: ART adherence based on viral load titer was not analyzed in both group since most of VL titer were undetected ( < 400 copies/mL ) .
label: result

string: GLM analysis showed decreased SRQ-20 mean score and increased mean value of self-reported ART adherence ( self-report ) in the REBT-based treatment group , which were more significant ( p < 0.000 ) than control group on the 8th week .
label: result

string: GEE analysis showed that 1 point decrement of SRQ-20 would increase self-reported ART adherence as much as 0.722 point and the correlation was statistically significant ( p < 0.00 ) .
label: result

string: Awake fiberoptic intubation is the gold standard for management of predicted difficult intubation .
label: background

string: The purpose of this study was to test whether Glide Scope video laryngoscopy ( GVL ) will provide significant advantages over fiberoptic bronchoscopy ( FOB ) for awake intubation in morbidly obese patients with predicted difficult intubation .
label: background

string: We therefore tested the hypothesis that intubation using GVL is faster than intubation with FOB .
label: background

string: 64 morbidly obese patients with predicted difficult intubation undergoing laparoscopic bariatric surgery were enrolled in this study .
label: method

string: Patients were randomly assigned to receive awake oral intubation by either GVL or FOB .
label: method

string: After airway topical anesthesia and sedation using target controlled remifentanil infusion to a Ramsay sedation scale of 3 , wee compared the two devices for time to intubate , successful intubation on first attempt , glottic view using Cormack and Lehane score system , response of the patient to scope , patients satisfaction and incidence of postoperative sore throat and hoarseness .
label: method

string: Intubation time was 84 + / - 37.9 seconds and 73.6 + / - 31.1 seconds for FOB and GVL respectively .
label: result

string: 75 % of patients were successfully intubated on the first attempt with FOB compared to 80.6 % with GVL .
label: result

string: Grade I/II glottic view was reported with GVL in 96.7 % of patients compared to 100 % with FOB .
label: result

string: The highest target concentration of remifentanil to maintain patients sedated during intubation was 2.4 + / - 0.6 ng/ml and 2.2 + / - 0.8 ng/ml in FOB and GVL respectively .
label: result

string: No significant differences regarding maximum patient response to intubation , adverse effects or patient satisfaction were recorded between groups .
label: result

string: ACTIVE is a longitudinal , randomized , single-blind clinical trial evaluating cognitive interventions in older adults ( aged 65-94 ) from six states in the United States .
label: method

string: Latent growth curve models indicated that initial training effects were maintained over 5 years and amplified by booster sessions .
label: result

string: A single booster session counteracted 4.92 months of age-related processing speed decline .
label: result

string: In Canada , cesarean delivery rates have increased substantially over the past decade .
label: background

string: Effective , safe strategies are needed to reduce these rates .
label: background

string: We conducted a cluster-randomized , controlled trial of a multifaceted 1.5-year intervention at 32 hospitals in Quebec .
label: method

string: The intervention involved audits of indications for cesarean delivery , provision of feedback to health professionals , and implementation of best practices .
label: method

string: The primary outcome was the cesarean delivery rate in the 1-year postintervention period .
label: method

string: Among the 184,952 participants , 53,086 women delivered in the year before the intervention and 52,265 women delivered in the year following the intervention .
label: result

string: There was a significant but small reduction in the rate of cesarean delivery from the preintervention period to the postintervention period in the intervention group as compared with the control group ( change , 22.5 % to 21.8 % in the intervention group and 23.2 % to 23.5 % in the control group ; odds ratio for incremental change over time , adjusted for hospital and patient characteristics , 0.90 ; 95 % confidence interval [ CI ] , 0.80 to 0.99 ; P = 0.04 ; adjusted risk difference , -1.8 % ; 95 % CI , -3.8 to -0.2 ) .
label: result

string: The cesarean delivery rate was significantly reduced among women with low-risk pregnancies ( adjusted risk difference , -1.7 % ; 95 % CI , -3.0 to -0.3 ; P = 0.03 ) but not among those with high-risk pregnancies ( P = 0.35 ; P = 0.03 for interaction ) .
label: result

string: The intervention group also had a reduction in major neonatal morbidity as compared with the control group ( adjusted risk difference , -0.7 % ; 95 % CI , -1.3 to -0.1 ; P = 0.03 ) and a smaller increase in minor neonatal morbidity ( adjusted risk difference , -1.7 % ; 95 % CI , -2.6 to -0.9 ; P < 0.001 ) .
label: result

string: Changes in minor and major maternal morbidity did not differ significantly between the groups .
label: result

string: To assess the efficacy and safety of LY500307 , a selective estrogen receptor beta agonist , on lower urinary tract symptoms ( LUTS ) in patients with enlarged prostate secondary to BPH .
label: background

string: In a randomized , double-blind , placebo-controlled , parallel phase 2 , efficacy and safety study , eligible patients with moderate to severe LUTS and prostatic enlargement ( 30ml ) were randomized to placebo or LY500307 at 1 , 3 , 10 and 25mg once daily for 24 weeks .
label: method

string: Primary efficacy end point was change in total International Prostate Symptoms Score ( IPSS ) after 24 weeks .
label: method

string: Secondary end points included changes in total prostate volume ( TPV ) that served as a proof of concept end point , as well as IPSS quality of life , maximum peak urine flow rate ( Qmax ) and PSA and safety ( adverse events , laboratory test ) .
label: method

string: A total of 414 patients were randomized when the study was terminated because of insufficient TPV reduction , based on a priori defined interim analysis .
label: result

string: The IPSS mean change from baseline to end point was -3.46.8 in the placebo group and -1.36.6 , -2.67.0 , -3.76.7 and -4.45.7 in the 1 , 3 , 10 and 25mg LY500307-treated groups , respectively ( P > 0.05 ) .
label: result

string: Similarly , no treatment effect was observed for any of the secondary efficacy measures .
label: result

string: Incidence of adverse events was comparable between treatment groups , and no clinically meaningful changes in laboratory tests were observed .
label: result

string: In this study , we compared the efficacy and safety of the oral fluoropyrimidine S-1 as monotherapy or in combination with leucovorin as the second-line treatment for patients with metastatic pancreatic cancer whose disease had progressed on gemcitabine treatment .
label: background

string: The study was a randomized , open-label , controlled study .
label: method

string: Patients randomly received S-1 or S-1 in combination with leucovorin ( SL arm ) in 21-day cycles .
label: method

string: The primary endpoint was the 6-month survival rate .
label: method

string: A total of 92 patients were randomized to S-1 ( n = 47 ) and SL ( n = 45 ) .
label: result

string: No statistically significant differences were observed between the two arms with regard to 6-month survival rates ( 40 % vs. 49 % ) , median overall survival ( 5.5 vs. 6.3 months ) , median progression-free survival ( 1.9 vs. 3.0 months ) , and overall response rate ( 4.7 % vs. 8.3 % ) .
label: result

string: The rate of major grade 3-4 adverse events of digestive toxicity was significantly higher in the SL arm than in the S-1 arm .
label: result

string: Task-specific locomotor training has been promoted to improve walking-related outcome after incomplete spinal cord injury ( iSCI ) .
label: background

string: However , there is also evidence that lower extremity strength training might lead to such improvements .
label: background

string: The aim of this randomized cross-over pilot study was to compare changes in a broad spectrum of walking-related outcome measures and pain between robot-assisted gait training ( RAGT ) and strength training in patients with chronic iSCI , who depended on walking assistance .
label: background

string: We hypothesized that task-specific locomotor training would result in better improvements compared to strength training .
label: background

string: Nine participants with a chronic iSCI were randomized to group 1 or 2 .
label: method

string: Group 1 received 16 sessions of RAGT ( 45min each ) within 4 weeks followed by 16 sessions of strength training ( 45min each ) within 4 weeks .
label: method

string: Group 2 received the same interventions in reversed order .
label: method

string: Main outcome measures were the 10m Walk Test ( 10MWT ) at preferred and maximal speed .
label: method

string: Furthermore , we assessed several measures such as walking speed under different conditions , balance , strength , and 2 questionnaires that evaluate risk of falling and pain .
label: method

string: Data were collected at baseline , between interventions after 4 weeks , directly after the interventions and at follow-up 6 months after the interventions .
label: method

string: Pain was assessed repeatedly throughout the study .
label: method

string: There were no significant differences in changes in scores between the 2 interventions , except for maximal walking speed ( 10MWT ) , which improved significantly more after strength training than after RAGT .
label: result

string: Pain reduced after both interventions .
label: result

string: This study was registered at Clinicaltrials.gov ( NCT01087918 ) .
label: background

string: The concentrations of HDL-associated serum amyloid A ( SAA ) and surfactant protein B ( SP-B ) were measured in 1152 patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus on hemodialysis participating in The German Diabetes Dialysis Study who were randomly assigned to double-blind treatment of 20 mg atorvastatin daily or matching placebo .
label: method

string: The association of SAA ( HDL ) and SP-B ( HDL ) with cardiovascular outcomes was assessed in multivariate regression models adjusted for known clinical risk factors .
label: method

string: High concentrations of SAA ( HDL ) were significantly and positively associated with the risk of cardiac events ( hazard ratio per 1 SD higher , 1.09 ; 95 % confidence interval , 1.01 to 1.19 ) .
label: result

string: High concentrations of SP-B ( HDL ) were significantly associated with all-cause mortality ( hazard ratio per 1 SD higher , 1.10 ; 95 % confidence interval , 1.02 to 1.19 ) .
label: result

string: Adjustment for HDL cholesterol did not affect these associations .
label: result

string: We conducted a group randomized controlled trial with counties as the unit of randomization that evaluated two interventions based on health priorities identified by the community : ( 1 ) promotion of healthy eating and physical activity ; and ( 2 ) promotion of breast and cervical cancer screening .
label: method

string: A total of 6 counties with 565 participants were enrolled in the study between November 2009 and October 2011 .
label: method

string: The overall retention rate at 24-month follow-up was 54.7 % .
label: result

string: Higher retention rate was observed in the `` healthy lifestyle '' arm ( 63.1 % ) as compared to the `` screening '' arm ( 45.3 % ) .
label: result

string: Participants in the `` healthy lifestyle '' arm showed significant positive changes compared to the `` screening '' arm at 12-month follow-up with regard to decrease in fried food consumption and an increase in both fruit/vegetable intake and physical activity .
label: result

string: At 24-month follow-up , these positive changes were maintained with healthy eating behaviors , but not engagement in physical activity .
label: result

string: Hundred and eighteen patients with dry eye disease were randomized to receive either LE and tCsA ( n = 61 ) or artificial tears ( AT ) and tCsA ( n = 57 ) .
label: method

string: Hundred and twelve patients completed the study ( LE : n = 57 , AT : n = 55 ) and are included in the data analysis .
label: method

string: Patients self-administered either LE or AT for 2 weeks 4 times per day , followed by tCsA twice per day accompanied by either LE twice per day or AT twice per day for an additional 6 weeks of treatment .
label: method

string: Primary outcome measures included the Ocular Surface Disease Index ( OSDI ) questionnaire , the Likert scale using standardized facial expressions , lissamine green staining , fluorescein staining , and the Schirmer test .
label: method

string: Additional measures included global self-assessment , and safety outcomes included slitlamp examination , intraocular pressure , and assessment of visual acuity .
label: method

string: Loteprednol etabonate pretreatment significantly reduced tCsA stinging ( P < 0.05 ) .
label: result

string: Both groups showed significantly improved OSDI scores at the 14 - , 30 - , and 60-day visits .
label: result

string: Loteprednol etabonate showed significantly more OSDI improvement than AT .
label: result

string: Both pretreatment strategies improved global self-assessment scores , Schirmer test , fluorescein staining , lissamine staining , and adjunctive AT use .
label: result

string: Loteprednol etabonate showed superior improvement in Schirmer test , fluorescein staining , and lissamine staining .

string: Copeptin , MR-proADM , and MR-proANP are emerging biomarkers of hemodynamic stress that have been associated with adverse cardiovascular ( CV ) outcomes in heart failure ( HF ) and stable ischemic disease .
label: background

string: We measured copeptin , MR-proADM , and MR-proANP concentrations in 4,432 patients with NSTE-ACS who were randomized to treatment with ranolazine or placebo in the MERLIN-TIMI 36 ( Metabolic Efficiency With Ranolazine for Less Ischemia in Non-ST-Elevation Acute Coronary Syndromes-Thrombolysis In Myocardial Infarction 36 ) trial and followed up for 1 year .
label: method

string: A high concentration ( quartile 4 vs. quartiles 1 to 3 ) of each biomarker identified an increased risk of CV death or HF ( copeptin : 13.2 % vs. 5.0 % , p < 0.001 ; MR-proADM : 15.8 % vs. 4.1 % , p < 0.001 ; MR-proANP : 17.7 % vs. 3.5 % , p < 0.001 ) as well as CV death , HF , and myocardial infarction individually ( all p 0.001 ) .
label: result

string: After adjustment for important covariates , each biomarker remained associated with CV death or HF at 1 year ( adjusted hazard ratio : copeptin , 1.71 ; MR-proADM , 1.96 ; MR-proANP , 2.20 ; all p 0.001 ) .
label: result

string: These biomarkers improved prognostic discrimination and patient re-classification for CV death or HF at 1 year ( all categorical NRI > 10 % , p < 0.001 ) , and maintained independent association with composite CV death or HF when concurrently assessed in a model with clinical indicators plus BNP , cTnI , ST2 , PAPP-A , and MPO ( each p0 .01 ) [ corrected ] .
label: result

string: The study was designed as a prospective , randomized , and controlled in vitro study and conducted in an academic research environment .
label: method

string: Reusable bipolar coagulation forceps ( BiClamp 200 C , ERBE Elektromedizin ) were used to apply sealing pressures of 300-1 ,100 mN/mm ( 2 ) to 239 renal arteries from commercially slaughtered female pigs ( Swabian-Hall Swine ) .
label: method

string: Forceps jaws were coated with porcine blood , blood and collagen , or blood , collagen , and fat to simulate instrument contamination with biological material during surgery .
label: method

string: Clinical wear was mimicked by sandpaper abrasion .
label: method

string: The main outcome measures were seal success ( resistance to 250 mmHg intraluminal pressure for 2 min ) and seal stability ( burst pressure ) .
label: method

string: Sealing pressure had a significant impact , with 800 mN/mm ( 2 ) producing the best sealing results .
label: result

string: Seal success increased with total energy applied to the tissue , a higher maximum temperature , and longer coagulation as indicated by desiccation time .
label: result

string: Experimental contamination had no significant impact on seal success and only a limited effect on seal stability .
label: result

string: Similarly , abrasive wear also had no significant effect on either seal quality or seal strength .
label: result

string: A single subanesthetic infusion of the N-methyl-D-aspartate ( NMDA ) receptor antagonist ketamine has rapid and potent antidepressant properties in treatment-resistant major depressive disorder ( TRD ) .
label: background

string: As a family history of an alcohol use disorder is a positive predictor of ketamine 's antidepressant response and the strength of the association increases over time , we hypothesized that depressed subjects with a family history of an alcohol use disorder would have greater antidepressant durability and that riluzole would augment and/or extend ketamine 's antidepressant efficacy .
label: background

string: Fifty-two TRD subjects received an open-label infusion of ketamine ( 0.5 mg/kg over 40 minutes ) , and , four to six hours post-infusion , were randomized to either flexible-dose ( 100-200mg / day ) riluzole or placebo in the following proportions : Family History Positive ( FHP ) riluzole ( n = 10 ) , FHP placebo ( n = 9 ) , Family History Negative ( FHN ) riluzole ( n = 16 ) , and FHN placebo ( n = 17 ) .
label: method

string: FHP subjects randomized to placebo had a greater antidepressant response than FHN subjects ; however , contrary to our initial hypothesis , there was no significant difference in antidepressant efficacy with riluzole .
label: result

string: Although potentially underpowered , there was no difference in overall time-to-relapse based on randomization status ( riluzole responders : n = 15 , placebo responders : n = 17 ) .
label: result

string: Yet , time-to-relapse was longer in FHP placebo responders ( n = 8 ) compared to FHN placebo responders ( n = 9 ) with , again , no significant difference in time-to-relapse in FHP riluzole responders ( n = 6 ) compared to FHN riluzole responders ( n = 9 ) .
label: result

string: Metabolic syndrome ( MetS ) comprises a spectrum of clinical phenotypes in which dyslipidemia , dysglycemia and hypertension are clustered and where all share a high level of oxidative stress and an increased risk of cardiovascular disease .
label: background

string: This study examines the effect of a nutritional supplement combining red yeast rice and olive fruit extract on the lipid profile and on oxidative stress in a population of patients with MetS .
label: background

string: In a double blind placebo controlled randomized trial , 50 persons with MetS , as defined by the ATPIII criteria , received the study product or placebo for 8 weeks .
label: method

string: The study product contained 10.82 mg of monacolins and 9,32 mg of hydroxytyrosol per capsule , and is commercialized as Cholesfytol plus .
label: method

string: The primary outcome measure was the difference in LDL reduction between intervention and control groups .
label: method

string: Furthermore , differences in changes of CH , HDL , ApoA1 , ApoB , HbA1c and oxLDL were measured , as well as side-effects , CK elevation , changes in clinical parameters and in cardiovascular risk .
label: method

string: In the intervention group , LDL cholesterol was lowered by 24 % whereas it increased by 1 % in the control group ( p < 0.001 ) .
label: result

string: Other effects observed were a change in total cholesterol ( -17 % in the intervention group vs +2 % in the control group , p < 0.001 ) , apolipoprotein B ( -15 % vs +6 % , p < 0.001 ) , and TG ( -9 % vs + 16 % , p = 0.02 ) .
label: result

string: Oxidized LDL decreased by 20 % vs an increase of 5 % in the control group ( p < 0.001 ) .
label: result

string: Systolic and diastolic arterial blood pressure decreased significantly by 10 mmHg ( vs 0 % in the control group , p = 0.001 ) and 7 mmHg ( vs 0 % in the control group , p = 0.05 ) respectively .
label: result

string: One person in the intervention group , who suffered from Segawa 's syndrome , dropped out because of severe muscle ache .
label: result

string: Clinicaltrials.gov NCT02065180 ( February 2014 ) .
label: background

string: Studies on protein requirements in vulnerable groups such as older adults are few , and results are conflicting .
label: background

string: Twelve subjects participated in the study , with protein intakes ranging from 0.2 to 2.0 g kg ( -1 ) d ( -1 ) for a total of 82 studies .
label: method

string: The diets provided energy at 1.5 times each subject 's resting energy expenditure and were isocaloric .
label: method

string: Protein was given as an amino acid mixture on the basis of the egg protein pattern , except for phenylalanine and tyrosine , which were maintained constant across the protein intake amounts .
label: method

string: All subjects were adapted for 2 d before the study day to a protein intake of 1.0 g kg ( -1 ) d ( -1 ) .
label: method

string: The mean protein requirement was determined by applying a mixed-effects change-point regression analysis to F ( 13 ) CO2 ( label tracer oxidation in ( 13 ) CO2 breath ) , which identified a breakpoint in the F ( 13 ) CO2 in response to graded amounts of protein .
label: method

string: The mean estimated average requirement ( EAR ) and upper 95 % CI ( approximating the RDA ) protein requirement of women > 65 y were 0.96 and 1.29 g kg ( -1 ) d ( -1 ) , respectively .
label: result

string: 30 children aged between 9-14yrs with a mild or moderate grade of fluorosis as classified according to Dean 's fluorosis index and who complained of objectionable esthetics were selected .
label: method

string: Split mouth study design was selected in our study .
label: method

string: Each subject had one of their maxillary central incisor randomly selected for Enamel microabrasion and the contra lateral maxillary central incisor for McInnes bleaching .
label: method

string: Esthetic improvement was assessed by comparing the pre and postoperative digital photographs .
label: method

string: During the evaluation session , the pre and postoperative photographs of 30 subjects were incorporated into a power point presentation and were projected side by side in a darkened room .
label: method

string: Four calibrated and blinded examiners , including a layman rated the photographs under standardized viewing conditions .
label: method

string: Esthetic improvement was assessed for both short and long term improvement .
label: method

string: The postoperative sensitivity was recorded for both the procedures immediately after treatment and at one , three and six months interval .
label: method

string: The results proved that both immediate and long term ( 6 month ) esthetic improvement achieved by McInnes bleaching were superior to enamel microabrasion .
label: result

string: There is a reduction in aesthetics of teeth in both the procedures after six months , which was very minimal in McInnes procedure and significant in enamel micro abrasion .
label: result

string: Postoperative sensitivity in both techniques were negligible .
label: result

string: The sensitivity observed were transient and subsided within an one-month post operatively .
label: result

string: None of the subjects reported sensitivity at one , three and six months intervals .
label: result

string: Avastin Biomarkers In lunG And 3D Innovative anaLysis ( ABIGAIL ) , which is a phase II , open-label , randomized study , investigated correlations between biomarkers and best overall response to bevacizumab plus platinum-doublet chemotherapy for patients with advanced/recurrent non-small-cell lung cancer .
label: background

string: Patients received bevacizumab ( 7.5 or 15 mg/kg , 3-weekly until disease progression/unacceptable toxicity ) plus carboplatin/gemcitabine or carboplatin/paclitaxel ( maximum six cycles ) .
label: method

string: Plasma samples ( baseline/throughout treatment ) were analyzed for vascular endothelial growth factor ( VEGF ) - A ( baseline only ) , VEGF receptors ( VEGFR-1 / VEGFR-2 ) , basic fibroblast growth factor , E-selectin , intercellular adhesion molecule-1 , and placental growth factor ( baseline only ) .
label: method

string: Tumor samples ( primary specimen ) were analyzed for VEGF-A , VEGFR-1 / VEGFR-2 , neuropilin ( NRP ) , and CD31 .
label: method

string: Response was evaluated at baseline and every 6 weeks ( Response Evaluation Criteria in Solid Tumors ) .
label: method

string: Patients were randomized to receive chemotherapy plus 7.5 mg/kg ( n = 154 ) or 15 mg/kg ( n = 149 ) bevacizumab .
label: result

string: For the primary analysis , none of the baseline plasma biomarkers correlated with best overall response .
label: result

string: Exploratory analyses showed that low VEGF-A levels were associated with longer progression-free survival ( 7.4 versus 6.1 months ; hazard ratio , 1.57 ; 95 % confidence intervals , 1.17 to 2.09 ; p = 0.002 ) and overall survival ( 19.8 versus 11.1 months ; hazard ratio , 1.57 ; 95 % confidence interval , 1.15-2 .13 ; p = 0.004 ) compared with these in high baseline plasma VEGF-A levels .
label: result

string: No plasma biomarkers changed significantly over time .
label: result

string: No significant correlations were observed between tumor biomarkers and clinical outcomes .
label: result

string: No new safety signals were observed .
label: result

string: Specific immunotherapy ( SIT ) with an ultrarush administration schedule with Purethal for tree pollen allergens has been evaluated to assess its efficacy and safety .
label: background

string: The study group consisted of 22 patients with symptoms of allergic rhinitis and confirmed allergy to tree pollens .

string: Patients were randomized and given an administration schedule of either ultrarush therapy or conventional preseasonal SIT .
