string: Treatment was performed during three consecutive years .
label: method

string: After three years of treatment , a similar reduction in nasal symptoms was observed ; according to the visual analog scale , there was a decrease from 3.991 0.804 points to 1.634 0.540 in the ultrarush group and from 3.845 0.265 to 1.501 0.418 in the group desensitized using the conventional method ( P > 0.05 ) .

string: There was also a comparable reduction in the use of relief drugs during pollen season and an increase in the serum concentration of IgG4 to tree pollens .
label: result

string: No significant differences in the safety profile were observed .
label: result

string: Clinical data and dose-volume histograms ( DVH ) were collected from 261 patients who received 3-dimensional conformal radiation therapy for prostate cancer with at least 5 years of follow-up .
label: method

string: The series was split 1000 times into training and validation cohorts .
label: method

string: A RF was trained to predict the risk of 5-year overall rectal toxicity and bleeding .
label: method

string: Parameters of the Lyman-Kutcher-Burman ( LKB ) model were identified and a logistic regression model was fit .
label: method

string: The performance of all the models was assessed by computing the area under the receiving operating characteristic curve ( AUC ) .
label: method

string: The 5-year grade 2 overall rectal toxicity and grade 1 and grade 2 rectal bleeding rates were 16 % , 25 % , and 10 % , respectively .
label: result

string: Predictive capabilities were obtained using the RF-NTCP model for all 3 toxicity endpoints , including both the training and validation cohorts .
label: result

string: The age and use of anticoagulants were found to be predictors of rectal bleeding .
label: result

string: The AUC for RF-NTCP ranged from 0.66 to 0.76 , depending on the toxicity endpoint .

string: The AUC values for the LKB-NTCP were statistically significantly inferior , ranging from 0.62 to 0.69 .

string: Idarucizumab is a monoclonal antibody fragment that binds dabigatran with high affinity in a 1:1 molar ratio .
label: background

string: We investigated the safety , tolerability , and efficacy of increasing doses of idarucizumab for the reversal of anticoagulant effects of dabigatran in a two-part phase 1 study ( rising-dose assessment and dose-finding , proof-of-concept investigation ) .
label: background

string: Here we present the results of the proof-of-concept part of the study .
label: background

string: In this randomised , placebo-controlled , double-blind , proof-of-concept phase 1 study , we enrolled healthy volunteers ( aged 18-45 years ) with a body-mass index of 185-299 kg/m ( 2 ) into one of four dose groups at SGS Life Sciences Clinical Research Services , Belgium .
label: method

string: Participants were randomly assigned within groups in a 3:1 ratio to idarucizumab or placebo using a pseudorandom number generator and a supplied seed number .
label: method

string: Participants and care providers were masked to treatment assignment .
label: method

string: All participants received oral dabigatran etexilate 220 mg twice daily for 3 days and a final dose on day 4 .
label: method

string: Idarucizumab ( 1 g , 2 g , or 4 g 5-min infusion , or 5 g plus 25 g in two 5-min infusions given 1 h apart ) was administered about 2 h after the final dabigatran etexilate dose .
label: method

string: The primary endpoint was incidence of drug-related adverse events , analysed in all randomly assigned participants who received at least one dose of dabigatran etexilate .
label: method

string: Reversal of diluted thrombin time ( dTT ) , ecarin clotting time ( ECT ) , activated partial thromboplastin time ( aPTT ) , and thrombin time ( TT ) were secondary endpoints assessed by measuring the area under the effect curve from 2 h to 12 h ( AUEC2-12 ) after dabigatran etexilate ingestion on days 3 and 4 .
label: method

string: This trial is registered with ClinicalTrials.gov , number NCT01688830 .
label: method

string: Between Feb 23 , and Nov 29 , 2013 , 47 men completed this part of the study .
label: result

string: 12 were enrolled into each of the 1 g , 2 g , or 5 g plus 25 g idarucizumab groups ( nine to idarucizumab and three to placebo in each group ) , and 11 were enrolled into the 4 g idarucizumab group ( eight to idarucizumab and three to placebo ) .
label: result

string: Drug-related adverse events were all of mild intensity and reported in seven participants : one in the 1 g idarucizumab group ( infusion site erythema and hot flushes ) , one in the 5 g plus 25 g idarucizumab group ( epistaxis ) ; one receiving placebo ( infusion site haematoma ) , and four during dabigatran etexilate pretreatment ( three haematuria and one epistaxis ) .
label: result

string: Idarucizumab immediately and completely reversed dabigatran-induced anticoagulation in a dose-dependent manner ; the mean ratio of day 4 AUEC2-12 to day 3 AUEC2-12 for dTT was 101 with placebo , 026 with 1 g idarucizumab ( 74 % reduction ) , 006 with 2 g idarucizumab ( 94 % reduction ) , 002 with 4 g idarucizumab ( 98 % reduction ) , and 001 with 5 g plus 25 g idarucizumab ( 99 % reduction ) .
label: result

string: No serious or severe adverse events were reported , no adverse event led to discontinuation of treatment , and no clinically relevant difference in incidence of adverse events was noted between treatment groups .
label: result

string: Boehringer Ingelheim Pharma GmbH & Co KG .

string: Tear fluid was sampled with microcapillary pipettes at seven time-points after drop instillation .

string: To evaluate the safety and immunogenicity of the thiomersal-free ( TF ) and thiomersal-containing ( TC ) formulations of Hepavax-Gene in healthy Vietnamese neonates .
label: background

string: A single-blind , randomized , controlled study in Ho Chi Minh City , Vietnam .
label: method

string: Healthy infants , born after a normal gestational period ( 37-42 weeks ) to hepatitis B surface antigen-negative mothers , participated in the study .
label: method

string: Subjects were randomly allocated in a 1:1 ratio to receive either Hepavax-Gene TC or Hepavax-Gene TF using a standard 0-1-6-month administration schedule .
label: method

string: Postvaccination blood samples were taken at months 1 , 6 and 7 .
label: method

string: Parents/legal guardians recorded solicited local and systemic adverse events up to 4 weeks after each vaccination .
label: method

string: Very high proportions of subjects were seroprotected .
label: result

string: Seroprotection rates at 1 , 6 and 7 months were all above 95 % using a 10 IU/L cutoff , and were mostly above 90 % using a 100 IU/L cutoff .
label: result

string: Seroprotection rates between the 2 formulations were equivalent within a 5 % margin for either cutoff titer both after 6 and 7 months .
label: result

string: There were no significant differences in the number of adverse events reported between the 2 formulations .
label: result

string: Safety results were in line with previous reports for Hepavax-Gene .
label: result

string: Both formulations of Hepavax-Gene were well tolerated .
label: result

string: There were no local adverse events reported in the TF group .
label: result

string: No serious adverse events were reported during the study .
label: result

string: Little is known about the incidence of prosthesis-patient mismatch ( PPM ) and its impact on outcomes after transcatheter aortic valve replacement ( TAVR ) .
label: background

string: The PARTNER Trial cohort A randomized patients 1:1 to TAVR or bioprosthetic SAVR .
label: method

string: Postoperative PPM was defined as absent if the indexed effective orifice area ( EOA ) was > 0.85 cm ( 2 ) / m ( 2 ) , moderate if the indexed EOA was 0.65 but 0.85 cm ( 2 ) / m ( 2 ) , or severe if the indexed EOA was < 0.65 cm ( 2 ) / m ( 2 ) .
label: method

string: LV mass regression and mortality were analyzed using the SAVR-RCT ( n = 270 ) , TAVR-RCT ( n = 304 ) , and TAVR-NRCA ( n = 1,637 ) cohorts .
label: method

string: The incidence of PPM was 60.0 % ( severe : 28.1 % ) in the SAVR-RCT cohort versus 46.4 % ( severe : 19.7 % ) in the TAVR-RCT cohort ( p < 0.001 ) and 43.8 % ( severe : 13.6 % ) in the TAVR-NRCA cohort .
label: result

string: In patients with an aortic annulus diameter < 20 mm , severe PPM developed in 33.7 % undergoing SAVR compared with 19.0 % undergoing TAVR ( p = 0.002 ) .
label: result

string: PPM was an independent predictor of less LV mass regression at 1 year in the SAVR-RCT ( p = 0.017 ) and TAVR-NRCA ( p = 0.012 ) cohorts but not in the TAVR-RCT cohort ( p = 0.35 ) .
label: result

string: Severe PPM was an independent predictor of 2-year mortality in the SAVR-RCT cohort ( hazard ratio [ HR ] : 1.78 ; p = 0.041 ) but not in the TAVR-RCT cohort ( HR : 0.58 ; p = 0.11 ) .
label: result

string: In the TAVR-NRCA cohort , severe PPM was not a predictor of 1-year mortality in all patients ( HR : 1.05 ; p = 0.60 ) but did independently predict mortality in the subset of patients with no post-procedural aortic regurgitation ( HR : 1.88 ; p = 0.02 ) .
label: result

string: Postoperative cognitive dysfunction ( POCD ) is well established in adults but has been underinvestigated in children .
label: background

string: As day-case procedures are increasingly common , it is important to establish whether children suffer significant POCD .
label: background

string: Pediatric POCD has been associated with several intravenous and inhalation anesthetics , but isoflurane has not been studied .
label: background

string: As evidence indicates superior recovery after propofol , the study compared POCD after propofol or isoflurane anesthesia .
label: background

string: Fifty-eight children aged 5-14 years were randomized to propofol ( total intravenous anesthesia ) or isoflurane for day-case dental procedures .
label: method

string: Reaction time ( RT ) , verbal and visual memory , psychomotor coordination , and attention were assessed preoperatively , prior to discharge and at 24 h.
label: method

string: Reaction time and psychomotor control were impaired postoperatively in both groups but recovered at 24 h. Delayed verbal recall was significantly impaired only after propofol .
label: result

string: Both groups had significant impairment of visual memory postoperatively and at 24 h , and of recognition memory postoperatively only .
label: result

string: Prospective observational study .
label: method

string: University hospital , private hospital , and clinic .
label: method

string: Uterine abnormalities were detected with the use of hysteroscopy in 18 ( 12.8 % ) of 141 women .

string: 3D-SIS was highly accurate ( 97.2 % ) , sensitive ( 97 % ) , and specific ( 100 % ) , with a positive predictive value of 100 % and a negative predictive value of 85 % .

string: The diagnostic values of hysteroscopy and 3D-SIS were not significantly different ( McNemar test ) .

string: 3D-SIS showed substantial interrater/intrarater agreement regarding overall uterine cavity evaluation ( = 0.79 and 0.78 , respectively ) .

string: In this randomized trial , 60 patients were allocated from September 2011 until March 2013 into one of the two groups : resistance training ( group A ) or passive physical therapy ( group B ) with thirty patients in each group during RT. .

string: Bone density in metastatic and non-metastatic vertebral bone was assessed at baseline , 3 and 6 months after RT. .

string: Clinical trial identifier NCT01409720 .
label: background

string: It was a randomized controlled trial with tandem colonoscopy .

string: We recruited patients who underwent colonoscopy for symptoms , screening , or surveillance .
label: method

string: Patients were randomized for the use of either 190-NBI or HD-WL on withdrawal .

label: result

string: The mean number of polyps detected per patient was higher in the 190-NBI group ( 1.49 % vs. 1.13 , P = 0.07 ) .
label: result

string: There was no significant difference in the adenoma miss rates between the two groups ( 21.8 % vs. 21.2 % ) .
label: result

string: Multivariate analysis showed that the use of 190-NBI ( odds ratio ( OR ) 1.85 ; 95 % confidence interval ( CI ) 1.10-3 .12 ) , withdrawal time ( OR 1.29 ; CI 1.19-1 .38 ) , patient 's age ( OR 1.04 ; CI 1.01-1 .06 ) , and male gender ( OR 2.38 ; CI 1.42-3 .99 ) were associated with adenoma detection .
label: result

string: We used high-end MS to quantify biomarkers predictive of acute kidney injury ( AKI ) and major adverse kidney events ( MAKE ) in 100 adult patients after open heart surgery ( n = 100 ) .
label: method

string: Early postoperatively measured LG3 ( a C-terminal fragment of perlecan ) , LTBP2 ( latent transforming growth factor binding protein-2 ) , Cathepsin L as well as two other renal biomarkers ( NGAL , Cystatin C ) had greater predictive value for AKI ( n = 23 ) and MAKE ( n = 24 ) compared with creatinine , urea and urine output .
label: result

string: A total of 120 patients with secondary non-consolidated kidney qi PE were randomly assigned to groups A ( aged [ 35.5 5.4 ] yr ) , B ( aged [ 36.2 5.7 ] yr ) , and C ( aged [ 35.2 5.3 ] yr ) in the ratio of 1:1:1 to receive Qilin Pills ( once 6 g , bid ) , sertraline ( once 50 mg , qd ) , and Qilin Pills plus sertraline , respectively , all for 4 weeks .
label: method

string: The intravaginal ejaculatory latency time ( IELT ) and PE diagnostic tool ( PEDT ) scores were obtained before and after medication and at 1 month after drug withdrawal , and comparative analyses were made among the three groups of patients .
label: method

string: The IELT was dramatically prolonged in groups A , B , and C after treatment ( [ 3.23 1.84 ] , [ 3.87 2.43 ] , and [ 5.92 3.11 ] min ) and at 1 month after drug withdrawal ( [ 1.85 1.27 ] , [ 1.52 1.06 ] , and [ 4.26 1.88 ] min ) as compared with the baseline ( [ 0.88 0.45 ] , [ 0.84 0.47 ] , and [ 0.85 0.50 ] min ) ( P < 0.01 ) , even longer in group C than in A and B ( P < 0.01 ) .
label: result

string: The PEDT scores of the three groups were 5.1 1.8 , 4.9 1.7 , and 3.8 1.2 after treatment and 8.2 2.4 , 8.1 2.4 , and 6.5 2.1 at 1 month after drug withdrawal , significantly improved in comparison with 13.2 3.2 , 12.8 3.1 , and 13.1 3.4 before treatment ( P < 0.01 ) , even more significantly in group C than in A and B ( P < 0.01 ) .
label: result

string: Untreated advanced hepatocellular carcinoma ( HCC ) is linked to poor prognosis .
label: background

string: While sorafenib is the current recommended treatment for advanced HCC , radioembolisation ( RE ; also called selective internal radiation therapy or SIRT ) with yttrium-90 microspheres has shown efficacy in cohort studies .
label: background

string: However , there are no head-to-head trials comparing radiation therapy with yttrium-90 microspheres and sorafenib in advanced HCC .
label: background

string: The SARAH trial has been designed to compare the efficacy and safety of sorafenib therapy and RE using yttrium-90 resin microspheres ( SIR-Spheres ; Sirtex Medical Limited , North Sydney , Australia ) in patients with advanced HCC .
label: background

string: Quality of life ( QoL ) and cost-effectiveness will also be compared between therapies .
label: background

string: SARAH is a prospective , randomised , controlled , open-label , multicentre trial comparing the efficacy of RE with sorafenib in the treatment of patients with advanced HCC .
label: method

string: The trial aims to recruit adults with a life expectancy of > 3 months , Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group ( ECOG ) performance status 1 , and : advanced HCC according to the Barcelona criteria ( stage C ) or recurrent HCC after surgical or thermoablative treatment who are not eligible for surgical resection , liver transplantation or thermal ablation ; or two rounds of failed chemoembolisation .
label: method

string: Patients will be randomised 1:1 to receive either RE or sorafenib 400 mg twice daily .
label: method

string: All patients will be monitored for between 12 and 48 months following start of treatment .
label: method

string: The primary endpoint of the SARAH trial is overall survival ( OS ) .
label: method

string: Secondary endpoints include : adverse events , progression-free survival at 6 months ; tumour response rate ; general or liver disease-specific QoL scores ; and cost of each treatment strategy .
label: method

string: Assuming an increase in median OS of 4 months with RE versus sorafenib therapy , randomising at least 400 patients ( 200 in each treatment arm ) will be sufficient for 80 % power and a bilateral alpha risk of 5 % ; therefore , 440 patients will be enrolled to allow for 10 % loss of patients due to ineligibility .
label: method

string: ClinicalTrials.gov identifier NCT01482442 , first received 28 November 2011 .
label: background

string: Data were pooled from three randomized , double-blind phase III studies of similar design that evaluated the efficacy and tolerability of tapentadol ER for the management of moderate to severe , chronic osteoarthritis knee pain ( NCT00421928 , NCT00486811 ) or low back pain ( NCT00449176 ) .
label: method

string: In the original trials , patients were recruited at primary , secondary , and tertiary care centers , institutional settings , and private practices in North America , Europe , Australia , and New Zealand .
label: method

string: Data were analyzed separately for groups of patients divided by baseline pain intensity , prior opioid experience , gender , and BMI .
label: method

string: Patients received twice-daily placebo , tapentadol ER ( 100-250 mg ) , or oxycodone HCl controlled release ( CR ; 20-50 mg ) for a 3-week titration and 12-week maintenance period .
label: method

string: Changes from baseline in average pain intensity ( 11-point numerical rating scale ) at week 12 of the maintenance period and for the overall maintenance period .
label: method

string: Efficacy and tolerability were evaluated in 2,968 and 2,974 patients , respectively .
label: result

string: The efficacy of tapentadol ER was shown in subpopulations divided by baseline pain intensity , prior opioid experience , gender , and BMI .
label: result

string: Tapentadol ER was also shown to be well tolerated and associated with better gastrointestinal tolerability than oxycodone CR in the evaluated subpopulations ( divided by prior opioid experience and gender ) .
label: result

string: Stress-relieving effects of balneotherapy compared to progressive muscle relaxation ( PMR ) and to resting were investigated by measuring subjective relaxation and salivary cortisol .
label: background

string: It was also examined whether participants with a high versus low stress level would have a different relaxation response .
label: background

string: A sample of healthy volunteers was randomized to balneotherapy , PMR , or a resting control group , each intervention lasting for 25 min .
label: method

string: Pre - and post-intervention salivary cortisol samples were collected , and participants rated their status of relaxation on a quantitative scale .
label: method

string: In addition , 3 questionnaires were applied to detect participants ' stress level and bodily complaints .
label: method

string: 49 healthy participants were recruited ( 65.3 % female ) .
label: result

string: In a pre-post comparison , salivary cortisol decreased ( F = 23.53 , p < 0.001 ) and subjective relaxation ratings increased ( F = 132.18 , p < 0.001 ) in all 3 groups .
label: result

string: Study participants in the balneotherapy group rated themselves as more relaxed after the intervention as compared to the other groups ( F = 5.22 , p < 0.009 ) .
label: result

string: Participants with a high versus low stress level differed in somatic symptoms and in morning cortisol levels , but showed a similar relaxation response .
label: result

string: Eighty patients aged 20 to 70 years scheduled for general anesthesia using the LMA Classic were included .
label: method

string: Before insertion , the cuff was partially filled with half the maximum inflation volume in the half volume group or the resting volume created by opening the pilot balloon valve to equalize with atmospheric pressure in the resting volume group .
label: method

string: Several parameters regarding insertion , intracuff pressure , airway leak pressure , and leakage volume/fraction were collected after LMA insertion .
label: method

string: The LMA Classic with a partially inflated cuff was successfully inserted in all enrolled patients .
label: result

string: Both groups had the same success rate of 95 % at the first insertion attempt .
label: result

string: The half volume group had a lower mean intracuff pressure compared with the resting volume group ( 54.5 16.1 cm H2O vs 61.8 16.1 cm H2O ; P = .047 ) .
label: result

string: There was no difference in airway leak pressure or leakage volume/fraction between the 2 groups under mechanical ventilation .
label: result

string: A total of 162 patients were included in this study .
label: method

string: Of the patients , 108 were randomized to receive 4 mg doxazosin XL ( group 1 ) , and 54 were randomized to receive 8 mg ( group 2 ) treatments .
label: method

string: After 1 month of treatment , 31 patients in group 1 whose quality of life ( QoL ) score was unchanged or had deteriorated were switched to 8 mg doxazosin XL treatment ( group 1b ) .
label: method

string: The mean age was 59.8 years .
label: result

string: After 1 month of treatment , the mean alteration in the International Prostate Symptom Score was 3.9 and 5.2 ( P = .028 ) , for the maximum urinary flow rate ( Q ( max ) ) , it was 3.0 and 3.6 mL/s ( P = .206 ) , and for the QoL score it was 1.3 and 1.7 ( P = .038 ) in groups 1 and 2 , respectively .
label: result

string: For group 1b , during the period in which the patients were receiving 4 and 8 mg doxazosin XL treatments ; the International Prostate Symptom Score changes were 1.3 and 3.6 ( P < .001 ) , the Q ( max ) changes were 1.6 and 3.2 mL/s ( P < .019 ) , and the QoL changes were 0.4 and 1.8 ( P < .001 ) in groups 1 and 2 , respectively .
label: result

string: Sixty patients aged between 15 and 70 years who applied to a polyclinic of Ear-Nose-Throat Department , Cerrahpasa Medical Faculty , Istanbul University , because of the complaint of tinnitus between January 2009 and July 2009 were selected using simple random sampling method .
label: method

string: The treatment group and the placebo group were separated randomly as to include 30 patients .
label: method

string: The tinnitus loudness , tinnitus frequency , tinnitus subjective score , and tinnitus handicap inventory results were compared before application of TMS and after 1 month .
label: method

string: It was found that the difference of tinnitus handicap inventory score within the TMS group ( before the treatment : mean , 52.76 ; SD , 15.8 ; after the treatment : mean , 44.4 ; SD , 13.57 ) was statistically significant ( P < 0.0001 ) and the difference of tinnitus handicap inventory score within the placebo group ( before the treatment : mean , 51.46 ; SD , 15.41 ; after the treatment : mean , 51.13 ; SD , 16.86 ) was significantly insignificant ( P = 0.848 ) .
label: result

string: When tinnitus severities determined at the beginning and end of the treatment were evaluated within each group , it was found that the difference of loudness within the group subjected to TMS was statistically significant ( P < 0.0001 ) but the difference of loudness within the placebo group was statistically insignificant ( P = 0.490 ) .
label: result

string: When tinnitus subjective scores were evaluated within each group before and after the treatment , the difference of subjective score within the group subjected to transcranial magnetic stimulation was statistically significant ( P < 0.0001 ) , and the difference of subjective score within the placebo group was statistically significant ( P = 0.168 ) .
label: result

string: Sclerostin is an osteocyte-derived inhibitor of osteoblast activity .
label: background

string: The monoclonal antibody romosozumab binds to sclerostin and increases bone formation .
label: background

string: In a phase 2 , multicenter , international , randomized , placebo-controlled , parallel-group , eight-group study , we evaluated the efficacy and safety of romosozumab over a 12-month period in 419 postmenopausal women , 55 to 85 years of age , who had low bone mineral density ( a T score of -2.0 or less at the lumbar spine , total hip , or femoral neck and -3.5 or more at each of the three sites ) .
label: method

string: Participants were randomly assigned to receive subcutaneous romosozumab monthly ( at a dose of 70 mg , 140 mg , or 210 mg ) or every 3 months ( 140 mg or 210 mg ) , subcutaneous placebo , or an open-label active comparator -- oral alendronate ( 70 mg weekly ) or subcutaneous teriparatide ( 20 g daily ) .
label: method

string: The primary end point was the percentage change from baseline in bone mineral density at the lumbar spine at 12 months .
label: method

string: Secondary end points included percentage changes in bone mineral density at other sites and in markers of bone turnover .
label: method

string: All dose levels of romosozumab were associated with significant increases in bone mineral density at the lumbar spine , including an increase of 11.3 % with the 210-mg monthly dose , as compared with a decrease of 0.1 % with placebo and increases of 4.1 % with alendronate and 7.1 % with teriparatide .
label: result

string: Romosozumab was also associated with large increases in bone mineral density at the total hip and femoral neck , as well as transitory increases in bone-formation markers and sustained decreases in a bone-resorption marker .
label: result

string: Except for mild , generally nonrecurring injection-site reactions with romosozumab , adverse events were similar among groups .
label: result

string: Exercise at altitude places additional physiological stress on the individual in comparison with sea-level performance .
label: background

string: This study examines the effect of a moderate hypoxic environment ( FiO2 = ~ 17 % ) on intermittent sprint exercise performance .
label: background

string: Nine male games players completed two consecutive sets of a 40 minute cycling intermittent sprint protocol ( CISP2 ) in a hypoxic ( HYP ; FiO2 = ~ 17 % ) and normoxic ( NORM ; FiO2 = ~ 21 % ) environment .
label: method

string: During each sprint peak power output ( PPO ; the highest power during each 5 s sprint ) , mean power output ( MPO ; the average power during the 3 s sprint ) were measured and total work done ( WD ; force applied from the highest 3 s period of power output ) was calculated .
label: method

string: Physiological responses were recorded throughout the testing procedure .
label: method

string: Reductions were found in PPO ( 944155 vs. 983167 W ) , MPO ( 900176 vs. 853177 W ) and WD ( 10220 vs. 10820 kJ ) during the CISP2 ( P < 0.05 ) at HYP compared to NORM .
label: result

string: Reductions in PPO , MPO and WD were also found between the 1st half and 2nd half CISP ( P < 0.05 ) and there was a greater decline from the 1st half CISP to the 2nd half CISP in PPO , MPO and WD at HYP .
label: result

string: Heart rate was higher and peripheral arterial oxygen saturation lower during HYP compared to NORM ( P < 0.05 ) .
label: result

string: Recent studies have shown that FDG-PET combined with CT is a reliable tool to visualize and quantify vascular inflammation .
label: background

string: Although pioglitazone significantly prevented the progression of coronary atherosclerosis and reduced the recurrence of myocardial infarction in patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus ( DM ) , it remains unclear whether pioglitazone could attenuate coronary artery inflammation .
label: background

string: Fifty atherosclerotic patients with impaired glucose tolerance or type 2 DM underwent determination of blood chemistries , anthropometric and inflammatory variables , and FDG-PET/CT angiography , and then were randomized to receive either pioglitazone or glimepiride for 16 weeks .
label: method

string: Effects of the treatments on vascular inflammation of the left main trunk were evaluated by FDG-PET/CT angiography at baseline and end of the study .
label: method

string: Vascular inflammation of the left main trunk was measured by blood-normalized standardized uptake value , known as a target-to-background ratio .
label: method

string: Three patients dropped out of the study during the assessment or treatment .
label: result

string: Finally , 25 pioglitazone-treated patients and 22 glimepiride-treated patients ( 37 men ; mean age : 68.1 8.3 years ; glycosylated hemoglobin : 6.72 0.70 % ) completed the study .
label: result

string: After 16-week treatments , fasting plasma glucose and glycosylated hemoglobin values were comparably reduced in both groups .
label: result

string: Changes in target-to-background ratio values from baseline were significantly greater in the pioglitazone group than in the glimepiride group ( -0.12 0.06 vs. 0.09 0.07 , p = 0.032 ) , as well as changes in high-sensitivity C-reactive protein ( pioglitazone vs. glimepiride group : median : -0.24 [ interquartile range ( IQR ) : -1.58 to -0.04 ] mg/l vs. 0.08 [ IQR : -0.07 to 0.79 ] mg/l , p = 0.031 ) .
label: result

string: While prior preliminary studies have broadened our understanding of how repetitive transcranial magnetic stimulation ( rTMS ) improves language outcomes in stroke patients with nonfluent aphasia , the evidence base of the effectiveness of this method remains inadequate .
label: background

string: Fifty-six stroke patients with nonfluent aphasia were randomly allocated to a real or a sham stimulation group : Group A ( n = 33 ) , who underwent 10 sessions of 1-Hz rTMS over the contralesional pars triangularis ( PTr ) , and Group B ( n = 23 ) , who received sham 1-Hz stimulation .
label: method

string: We performed the Picture Naming Test and the Concise Chinese Aphasia Test ( CCAT ) at the baseline , post-rTMS intervention , and at 3-month follow-up .
label: method

string: Group A showed significantly greater improvement than Group B in CCAT scoring ( P < .001 ) , object-naming accuracy ( P = .01 ) , and naming reaction time ( P = .004 ) .
label: result

string: The CCAT scoring and naming testing changes for Group A were persistent at 3 months following intervention ( P = .008 ) .
label: result

string: Patients who had a lower contralesional rest motor threshold ( rMT ) were predisposed to a favorable therapeutic outcome ( P = .006 ) , independent of aphasia type , severity , and duration .
label: result

string: Mind-wandering is thought to interfere with goal-directed thought .
label: background

string: It is likely , then , that when driving , mind-wandering might lead to impairments in critical aspects of driving performance .
label: background

string: In two experiments , we assess the extent to which mind-wandering interferes with responsiveness to sudden events , mean velocity , and headway distance .
label: background

string: Using a car-following procedure in a high-fidelity driving simulator , participants were probed at random times to indicate whether they were on-task at that moment or mind-wandering .
label: method

string: The dependent measures were analyzed based on the participant 's response to the probe .
label: method

string: Compared to when on-task , when mind-wandering participants showed longer response times to sudden events , drove at a higher velocity , and maintained a shorter headway distance .
label: result

string: Despite the widespread use and advancements of mobile technology that facilitate rich communication modes , there is little evidence demonstrating the value of smartphones for effective interclinician communication and knowledge processes .
label: background

string: The experiment was conducted from November 2011 to May 2012 at the University Hospital Basel ( Switzerland ) with 42 medical students in a master 's program .
label: method

string: All participants analyzed a standardized case ( a patient with a subcapital fracture of the fifth metacarpal bone ) based on a radiological image , photographs of the hand , and textual descriptions , and were asked to consult a remote surgical specialist via a smartphone .
label: method

string: Participants were randomly assigned to 3 experimental conditions/groups .
label: method

string: In group 1 , the specialist provided verbal explanations ( speech only ) .
label: method

string: In group 2 , the specialist provided verbal explanations and displayed the radiological image and the photographs to the participants ( speech and images ) .
label: method

string: In group 3 , the specialist provided verbal explanations , displayed the radiological image and the photographs , and annotated the radiological image by drawing structures/angle elements ( speech , images , and image annotation ) .
label: method

string: To assess knowledge recall , participants were asked to write brief summaries of the case ( verbally represented knowledge ) after the consultation and to re-analyze the diagnostic images ( visually represented knowledge ) .
label: method

string: To assess knowledge transfer , participants analyzed a similar case without specialist support .
label: method

string: Data analysis by ANOVA found that participants in groups 2 and 3 ( images used ) evaluated the support provided by the specialist as significantly more positive than group 1 , the speech-only group ( group 1 : mean 4.08 , SD 0.90 ; group 2 : mean 4.73 , SD 0.59 ; group 3 : mean 4.93 , SD 0.25 ; F2 ,39 = 6.76 , P = .003 ; partial ( 2 ) = 0.26 , 1 - = .90 ) .
label: result

string: However , significant positive effects on the recall and transfer of visually represented medical knowledge were only observed when the smartphone-based communication involved the combination of speech , images , and image annotation ( group 3 ) .
label: result

string: There were no significant positive effects on the recall and transfer of visually represented knowledge between group 1 ( speech only ) and group 2 ( speech and images ) .
label: result

string: No significant differences were observed between the groups regarding verbally represented medical knowledge .
label: result

string: In the SCD-HeFT ( Sudden Cardiac Death in Heart Failure Trial ) , a pre-specified subgroup analysis showed that patients with New York Heart Association functional class III symptoms did not benefit from implantable cardioverter-defibrillator ( ICD ) therapy and appeared to be harmed by amiodarone , whereas New York Heart Association functional class II patients obtained significant survival benefit from ICD .
label: background

string: We postulated that a more objective measure of functional capacity , such as 6-min walk ( 6MW ) distance , might provide a better tool for selecting these preventive therapies .
label: background

string: A 6MW test was performed before randomization in 2,397 patients .
label: method

string: Median follow-up was 45.5 months .
label: method

string: All-causemortality was the primary endpoint , with cause-specific mortality ( heart failure , arrhythmic ) examined insecondary analyses .
label: method

string: The hazard ratios ( HRs ) for ICD therapy compared to placebo were estimated within tertiles of baseline 6MW distance : HR : 0.42 ( 95 % confidence interval [ CI ] : 0.26 to 0.66 ) for 6MW distance > 386 m ( top tertile ) ; HR : 0.57 ( 95 % CI : 0.39 to 0.83 ) for 6MW distance 288 to 386 m ( middle tertile ) ; and HR : 1.02 ( 95 % CI : 0.75 to 1.39 ) for 6MW distance < 288 m ( bottom tertile ) .
label: result

string: The corresponding HRs for amiodarone compared to placebo were 0.68 ( 95 % CI : 0.46 to 1.02 ) for the top , 0.86 ( 95 % CI : 0.61 to 1.21 ) for the middle , and 1.56 ( 95 % CI : 1.17 to 2.09 ) for the bottom tertile .
label: result

string: The 6MW distance was inversely related to heart failure-related mortality but not to arrhythmic mortality .
label: result

string: ICD therapy reduced arrhythmic mortality in the top 2 tertiles of 6MW , but had no effect on heart failure mortality .
label: result

string: Using a randomized controlled design , 40 inpatients from two general hospital psychiatric units were recruited and randomly assigned to an intervention group ( n = 20 ) that received the TCM intervention that was delivered by a psychiatric nurse practitioner for 90 days posthospitalization , or a control group ( n = 20 ) that received usual care .
label: method

string: Outcomes were as follows : service utilization , health-related quality of life , and continuity of care .
label: method

string: The intervention group showed higher medical and psychiatric rehospitalization than the control group ( p = .054 ) .
label: result

string: Emergency room use was lower for intervention group but not statistically significant .
label: result

string: Continuity of care with primary care appointments were significantly higher for the intervention group ( p = .023 ) .
label: result

string: The intervention group 's general health improved but was not statistically significant compared with controls .
label: result

string: Vitiligo can be associated with high levels of distress , yet there are currently no self-help interventions available .
label: background

string: Participants ( n = 75 ) were randomized to one of three groups : cognitive behavioural self-help ( CBSH ) , CBSH augmented with implementation intentions ( CBSH + ) , or no intervention .
label: method

string: Participants were assessed at baseline and after 8weeks on measures of social anxiety , anxiety and depression , and appearance-related concern .
label: method

string: The two intervention groups also completed a questionnaire evaluating their use of , and satisfaction with , the intervention .
label: method

string: High levels of social anxiety and concern over appearance were reported .
label: result

string: Twenty-four per cent of participants in the CBSH + group experienced clinically significant change on the measure of social anxiety compared with 8 % in the CBSH group and 0 % in the control group .
label: result

string: In addition , 58 % of the control group deteriorated during the study period .
label: result

string: There were no significant differences between the conditions on the other outcome measures .
label: result

string: Participants reported that the self-help leaflets were helpful .
label: result

string: Transversal study and cohort nested in the Temprano ANRS 12136 randomized controlled trial assessing benefits of initiating ART earlier than currently recommended by World Health Organization , with or without a 6-month IPT .
label: method

string: Performance of QFT-GIT for detecting active TB at baseline in the first 50 % participants , and 12-month incidence of conversion/reversion in the first 25 % participants were assessed .
label: method

string: QFT-GIT threshold for positivity was 0.35 IU/ml .
label: method

string: Among the 975 first participants ( median baseline CD4 count 383/mm3 , positive QFT-GIT test 35 % ) , 2.7 % had active TB at baseline .
label: result

string: QFT-GIT sensitivity , specificity , positive and negative predictive value for active TB were 88.0 % , 66.6 % , 6.5 % and 99.5 % .
label: result

string: For the 444 patients with a second test at 12 months , rates for conversion and reversion were 9.3 % and 14 % .
label: result

string: Reversion was more frequent in patients without ART and younger patients .
label: result

string: IPT and early ART were not associated with reversion/conversion .
label: result

string: ClinicalTrials.gov NCT00495651 .
label: background

string: From the Sequenced Treatment Alternatives to Relieve Depression ( STAR * D ) trial , we analyzed complete data of 2280 adult MDD out-patients at entry/exit of each level of antidepressant treatments and after 12 months of entry to follow-up .
label: method

string: QOL was measured using the QOL Enjoyment and Satisfaction Questionnaire ( Q-LES-Q ) .
label: method

string: The proportions of patients scoring ` within-normal ' QOL ( within 10 % of Q-LES-Q community norms ) and those with ` severely impaired ' QOL ( > 2SD below Q-LES-Q community norms ) were analyzed .
label: method

string: Before treatment , no more than 3 % of MDD patients experienced ` within-normal ' QOL .
label: result

string: Following treatment , statistically significant improvements were detected ; however , the proportion of patients achieving ` within-normal ' QOL did not exceed 30 % , with > 50 % of patients experiencing ` severely impaired ' QOL .
label: result

string: Although remitted patients had greater improvements compared with non-remitters , 32-60 % continued to experience reduced QOL .
label: result

string: 12-month follow-up data revealed that the proportion of patients experiencing ` within-normal ' QOL show a statistically significant decrease in non-remitters .
label: result

string: The appropriate caloric goal for critically ill adults is unclear .
label: background

string: We evaluated the effect of restriction of nonprotein calories ( permissive underfeeding ) , as compared with standard enteral feeding , on 90-day mortality among critically ill adults , with maintenance of the full recommended amount of protein in both groups .
label: background

string: At seven centers , we randomly assigned 894 critically ill adults with a medical , surgical , or trauma admission category to permissive underfeeding ( 40 to 60 % of calculated caloric requirements ) or standard enteral feeding ( 70 to 100 % ) for up to 14 days while maintaining a similar protein intake in the two groups .
label: method

string: The primary outcome was 90-day mortality .
label: method

string: Baseline characteristics were similar in the two groups ; 96.8 % of the patients were receiving mechanical ventilation .
label: result

string: During the intervention period , the permissive-underfeeding group received fewer mean ( SD ) calories than did the standard-feeding group ( 835297 kcal per day vs. 1299467 kcal per day , P < 0.001 ; 4614 % vs. 7122 % of caloric requirements , P < 0.001 ) .
label: result

string: Protein intake was similar in the two groups ( 5724 g per day and 5925 g per day , respectively ; P = 0.29 ) .
label: result

string: The 90-day mortality was similar : 121 of 445 patients ( 27.2 % ) in the permissive-underfeeding group and 127 of 440 patients ( 28.9 % ) in the standard-feeding group died ( relative risk with permissive underfeeding , 0.94 ; 95 % confidence interval [ CI ] , 0.76 to 1.16 ; P = 0.58 ) .
label: result

string: No serious adverse events were reported ; there were no significant between-group differences with respect to feeding intolerance , diarrhea , infections acquired in the intensive care unit ( ICU ) , or ICU or hospital length of stay .
label: result

string: The 2007 American College of Cardiologists/American Heart Association Guidelines on Perioperative Cardiac Evaluation and Care for Noncardiac Surgery is the standard for perioperative cardiac evaluation .
label: background

string: Recent work has shown that residents and anesthesiologists do not apply these guidelines when tested .
label: background

string: This research hypothesized that a decision support tool would improve adherence to this consensus guideline .
label: background

string: Anesthesiology residents at four training programs participated in an unblinded , prospective , randomized , cross-over trial in which they completed two tests covering clinical scenarios .
label: method

string: One quiz was completed from memory and one with the aid of an electronic decision support tool .
label: method

string: Performance was evaluated by overall score ( % correct ) , number of incorrect answers with possibly increased cost or risk of care , and the amount of time required to complete the quizzes both with and without the cognitive aid .
label: method

string: The primary outcome was the proportion of correct responses attributable to the use of the decision support tool .
label: method

string: All anesthesiology residents at four institutions were recruited and 111 residents participated .
label: result

string: Use of the decision support tool resulted in a 25 % improvement in adherence to guidelines compared with memory alone ( P < 0.0001 ) , and participants made 77 % fewer incorrect responses that would have resulted in increased costs .
label: result

string: Use of the tool was associated with a 3.4-min increase in time to complete the test ( P < 0.001 ) .
label: result

string: Distal radius fractures are among the most common fractures and account for approximately one-sixth of all fractures diagnosed .
label: background

string: Therapy results after distal radius fracture , especially of elderly patients , are often suboptimal .
label: background

string: The inevitable immobilization for several weeks leads to reduction in range of motion , deterioration of muscle strength , malfunction of fine motor skills as well as changes of motor and sensory representations in the brain .
label: background

string: Currently , there are no strategies to counteract these immobilization problems .
label: background

string: The overall aim of the study is to investigate the therapeutic potential of motor-cognitive approaches ( mental practice or mirror therapy ) on hand function after wrist fracture .
label: background

string: This study is a controlled , randomized , longitudinal intervention study with three intervention groups .
label: method

string: One experimental group imagines movements of the fractured upper extremity without executing them ( mental practice ) .
label: method

string: Lysine requirements of well-nourished children from developing regions have been found to be similar to those of children from developed regions ( 33.5 mgkgd ) .
label: background

string: However , intestinal parasites have been shown to increase lysine requirements in undernourished adults , and it is not known if a similar phenomenon occurs in undernourished children from poor and unsanitary environments .
label: background

string: Twenty-one undernourished school-aged children ( 8 y of age ) with z scores between -2 SD and -3 SD for height-for-age or weight-for-age , who tested positive for intestinal parasites , were studied before and after successful antiparasite treatment .
label: method

string: Children were fed any 2 of 7 levels of lysine intakes ( 5 , 15 , 25 , 35 , 50 , 65 , and 80 mgkgd ) in random order .
label: method

string: The lysine requirement was determined by applying a 2-phase linear regression crossover analysis on the fractional oxidation rate of the tracer L - [ 1-C ] phenylalanine in response to the graded lysine intakes .
label: method

string: The lysine requirement of undernourished children with intestinal parasite infestations was determined to be 42.8 mgkgd ( 95 % CI : 32.6 , 53.1 mgkgd ) , and after successful antiparasitic treatment it was determined to be 35.5 mgkgd ( 95 % CI : 25.5 , 45.5 mgkgd ) .
label: result

string: The results were significantly different ( P < 0.05 ) , although the 95 % CIs overlapped .
label: result

string: Advanced colorectal cancer is treated with a combination of cytotoxic drugs and targeted treatments .
label: background

string: However , how best to minimise the time spent taking cytotoxic drugs and whether molecular selection can refine this further is unknown .
label: background

string: The primary aim of this study was to establish how cetuximab might be safely and effectively added to intermittent chemotherapy .
label: background

string: COIN-B was an open-label , multicentre , randomised , exploratory phase 2 trial done at 30 hospitals in the UK and one in Cyprus .
label: method

string: We enrolled patients with advanced colorectal cancer who had received no previous chemotherapy for metastases .
label: method

string: Randomisation was done centrally ( by telephone ) by the Medical Research Council Clinical Trials Unit using minimisation with a random element .
label: method

string: Treatment allocation was not masked .
label: method

string: Patients were assigned ( 1:1 ) to intermittent chemotherapy plus intermittent cetuximab or to intermittent chemotherapy plus continuous cetuximab .
label: method

string: Chemotherapy was FOLFOX ( folinic acid and oxaliplatin followed by bolus and infused fluorouracil ) .
label: method

string: Patients in both groups received FOLFOX and weekly cetuximab for 12 weeks , then either had a planned interruption ( those taking intermittent cetuximab ) or planned maintenance by continuing on weekly cetuximab ( continuous cetuximab ) .
label: method

string: On RECIST progression , FOLFOX plus cetuximab or FOLFOX was recommenced for 12 weeks followed by further interruption or maintenance cetuximab , respectively .
label: method

string: The primary outcome was failure-free survival at 10 months .
label: method

string: The primary analysis population consisted of patients who completed 12 weeks of treatment without progression , death , or leaving the trial .
label: method

string: We tested BRAF and NRAS status retrospectively .
label: method

string: The trial was registered , ISRCTN38375681 .
label: method

string: We registered 401 patients , 226 of whom were enrolled .
label: result

string: Results for 169 with KRAS wild-type are reported here , 78 ( 46 % ) assigned to intermittent cetuximab and 91 ( 54 % ) to continuous cetuximab .
label: result

string: 64 patients assigned to intermittent cetuximab and 66 of those assigned to continuous cetuximab were included in the primary analysis .
label: result

string: 10-month failure-free survival was 50 % ( lower bound of 95 % CI 39 ) in the intermittent group versus 52 % ( lower bound of 95 % CI 41 ) in the continuous group ; median failure-free survival was 12.2 months ( 95 % CI 8.8-15 .6 ) and 14.3 months ( 10.7-20 .4 ) , respectively .
label: result

string: The most common grade 3-4 adverse events were skin rash ( 21 [ 27 % ] of 77 patients vs 20 [ 22 % ] of 92 patients ) , neutropenia ( 22 [ 29 % ] vs 30 [ 33 % ] ) , diarrhoea ( 14 [ 18 % ] vs 23 [ 25 % ] ) , and lethargy ( 20 [ 26 % ] vs 19 [ 21 % ] ) .
label: result

string: We first calculate life tables , and then use clustered logistic regression to implement a discrete-time survival model .
label: method

string: We use splines and indicator variables to capture non-linear and group-specific variation over time in the hazard function .
label: method

string: As potential predictors , we consider study group , site , date of recruitment , age , sex , baseline substance dependence , baseline psychotic disorder , time homeless in life , community functioning , and education .
label: method

string: The study recruited 2,148 homeless people with mental illness .
label: result

string: Of these , 1,158 were randomized to the housing first intervention ( HF ) , and 990 to treatment as usual ( TAU ) .
label: result

string: Excluding 79 people known to have died , attrition was 14 % .
label: result

string: This proportion was higher in TAU than in HF ( 21 vs. 8 % , p < 0.01 ) .
label: result

string: Attrition was significantly lower in one site than elsewhere , and was also lower among those with substance dependence ( 13 vs. 18 % , p < 0.01 ) and among those enrolled earlier in the study .
label: result

string: The hazard varied over time in complex ways .
label: result

string: Unlike conventional hemodialysis treatments , which rely almost solely on diffusion-related mechanisms for solute removal , hemodiafiltration ( HDF ) allows more efficient removal of higher molecular weight toxins due to convective transport mechanisms .
label: background

string: To facilitate the removal of these toxins in HDF treatment modalities , dialyzers with highly efficient high-flux membranes are necessary .
label: background

string: This study assessed the large uremic toxin removal ability of a high-flux dialyzer ( FX CorDiax 60 ) specifically designed to facilitate convective therapies compared with a standard high-flux dialyzer ( FX 60 ) .
label: background

string: In an open , randomized , cross-over , single-center , controlled , prospective clinical study , 30 adult chronic hemodialysis patients were treated by post-dilution online HDF with the FX 60 or the FX CorDiax 60 dialyzer .
label: method

string: All other dialysis parameters were kept constant in both study arms .
label: method

string: The reduction rate ( RR ) of blood urea nitrogen , phosphate , 2-microglobulin ( 2-m ) , myoglobin , prolactin , 1-microglobulin , 1-acid glycoprotein , albumin and total protein as well as the elimination into dialysate was intraindividually compared for the two dialyzer types .
label: method

string: For FX CorDiax 60 versus FX 60 , the RR was significantly higher for blood urea nitrogen ( 86.23 4.14 vs. 84.89 4.59 % , p = 0.015 ) , 2-m ( 84.67 3.79 vs. 81.30 4.82 % , p < 0.0001 ) , myoglobin ( 75.23 10.48 vs. 58.60 12.1 % , p < 0.0001 ) , prolactin ( 72.96 9.68 vs. 56.91 13.01 % , p < 0.0001 ) and 1-microglobulin ( 20.89 18.27 vs. 13.60 12.50 % , p = 0.016 ) .
label: result

string: There were no significant differences in the RR for phosphate , 1-acid glycoprotein , albumin and total protein .
label: result

string: Mass removal was significantly higher with the FX CorDiax 60 than with the FX 60 for 2-m ( 0.26 0.09 vs. 0.24 0.09 g , p = 0.0006 ) , myoglobin ( 1.83 0.89 vs. 1.51 0.76 mg , p = 0.0017 ) , prolactin ( 0.17 0.13 vs. 0.14 0.08 mg , p = 0.02 ) and albumin ( 4.25 3.49 vs. 3.01 2.37 g , p = 0.03 ) .
label: result

string: Sixty patients of borderline hypertension were randomized into an observation group and a control group , 30 cases in each one .
label: method

string: In the observation group , acupuncture was applied to Fengchi ( GB 20 ) , Taichong ( LR 3 ) and the others , once a day , 5 treatments made one session .
label: method

string: There were 2 days at interval among the sessions .
label: method

string: Totally , 4 sessions were required .
label: method

string: Additionally , in combination , the anti-hypertensive plaster was prepared with the fine powder of Chuanxiong ( ligusticum wallichii ) and Wuzhuyu ( fructus evodiae ) at 1.1 and mixed with vinegar .
label: method

string: The plaster was applied to the umbilicus , once every two days , totally 15 times were required .

label: method

string: Before and after treatment , blood pressure and syndrome score were observed and the short-term and long-term efficacies were assessed in the two groups .
label: method

string: After treatment , the systolic pressure and diastolic pressure were reduced as compared with those before treatment in the two groups ( all P < 0.001 ) , and the differences were significant in comparison between the observation group and the control group ( P < 0.01 , P < 0.05 ) .
label: result

string: The syndrome score after treatment was reduced as compared with that before treatment in the two groups ( both P < 0.001 ) and the difference was not significant in comparison between the two groups ( P > 0.05 ) .
label: result

string: In follow-up of the effective cases and remarkably effective cases in 3 months , the total effective rate in the observation group was 89.3 % ( 25/28 ) and was 60.0 % ( 15/25 ) in the control group , indicating the significant difference in comparison ( P < 0.05 ) .
label: result

string: Prospective ` blinded ' controlled trial using block randomization .
label: method

string: Forty healthy Freiberger stallions .
label: method

string: The horses received either intravenous ( IV ) romifidine ( loading dose : 80gkg ( -1 ) ; infusion : 30gkg ( -1 ) hour ( -1 ) ) ( treatment R , n = 20 ) or romifidine combined with butorphanol ( romifidine loading : 80gkg ( -1 ) ; infusion : 29gkg ( -1 ) hour ( -1 ) , and butorphanol loading : 18gkg ( -1 ) ; infusion : 25gkg ( -1 ) hour ( -1 ) ) ( treatment RB , n = 20 ) .
label: method

string: Twenty-one horses underwent dentistry and ophthalmic procedures , while 19 horses underwent only ophthalmologic procedure and buccal examination .
label: method

string: During the procedure , physiologic parameters and occurrence of head/muzzle shaking or twitching and forward movement were recorded .
label: method

string: Whenever sedation was insufficient , additional romifidine ( 20gkg ( -1 ) ) was administered IV .
label: method

string: Recovery time was evaluated by assessing head height above ground .
label: method

string: At the end of the procedure , overall quality of sedation for the procedure was scored by the dentist and anaesthetist using a visual analogue scale .
label: method

string: Statistical analyses used two-way anova or linear mixed models as relevant .
label: method

string: Sedation quality scores as assessed by the anaesthetist were R : median 7.55 , range : 4.9-9 .0 cm , RB : 8.8 , 4.7-10 .0 cm , and by the dentist R : 6.6 , 3.0-8 .2 cm , RB : 7.9 , 6.6-8 .8 cm .
label: result

string: Horses receiving RB showed clinically more effective sedation as demonstrated by fewer poor scores and a tendency to reduced additional drug requirements .
label: result

string: More horses showed forward movement and head shaking in treatment RB than treatment R. Three horses ( two RB , one R ) had symptoms of colic following sedation .
label: result

string: Vasopressor administration is recommended to prevent hypotension during spinal anaesthesia ( SA ) for elective Caesarean delivery .
label: background

string: We aimed to test the superior efficacy and ensure safety of a hydroxyethyl starch ( HES ) vs a Ringer 's lactate ( RL ) preloading , when combined with a phenylephrine-based prophylaxis .
label: background

string: A total of 167 healthy parturients undergoing elective Caesarean delivery under SA were included in this multicentre , randomized , double-blind study .
label: method

string: Patients received 500 ml of 6 % HES ( 130/0 .4 ) +500 ml of RL ( HES group ) or 1000 ml of RL ( RL group ) i.v. before SA .
label: method

string: After SA , i.v. phenylephrine boluses were titrated when systolic arterial pressure ( SAP ) was below 95 % of baseline .
label: method

string: The primary outcome was the incidence of maternal hypotension ( SAP < 80 % of baseline ) .
label: method

string: The incidence of both hypotension and symptomatic hypotension ( i.e. with dizziness , nausea/vomiting , or both ) was significantly lower in the HES group vs the RL group : 36.6 % vs 55.3 % ( one-sided P = 0.025 ) and 3.7 % vs 14.1 % .
label: result

string: There was no significant difference in total phenylephrine requirements [ median ( range ) : 350 ( 50-1800 ) vs 350 ( 50-1250 ) g ] .
label: result

string: The decrease in maternal haemoglobin value the day after surgery was similar in the two groups [ 1.2 ( 1.0 ) vs 1.0 ( 0.9 ) g dl ( -1 ) ] .
label: result

string: There was no detectable placental transfer of HES in six umbilical cord blood samples analysed in the HES group .
label: result

string: Neonatal outcomes were comparable between the groups .
label: result

string: NCT00694343 ( http://clinicaltrials.gov ) .

string: All subjects in the Single Ventricle Reconstruction Trial who were alive without cardiac transplant were eligible for inclusion .

string: The Ages and Stages Questionnaire ( ASQ , n = 203 ) and other measures of behavior and quality of life were completed at age 3 years .

string: Scores on each ASQ domain were significantly lower than normal ( P < .001 ) .

string: ASQ domain scores at 3 years of age varied nonlinearly with 14-month BSID-II .
label: result

string: More complications , abnormal growth , and evidence of feeding , vision , or hearing problems were independently associated with lower ASQ scores , although models explained < 30 % of variation .

string: The study aimed to compare the efficacy and safety of nebulized steroid ( NS ) with systemic corticosteroids ( SC ) and to determine optimal NS dose in the treatment of patients with COPD exacerbations requiring hospitalization .
label: background

string: The study was a randomized , parallel design trial .
label: method

string: Eligible patients ( n = 86 ) were randomly allocated to 1 of the 3 treatment groups : parenteral corticosteroid ( PS ) ( n = 33 ) , 4 mg ( NB ) ( n = 27 ) , or 8 mg NB ( n = 26 ) .
label: method

string: Partial pressure of arterial oxygen ( PaO2 ) , carbon dioxide ( PaCO2 ) , pH , and oxygen saturation ( SaO2 ) were evaluated at baseline , 24 h , 48 h , and discharge .
label: method

string: Airway obstruction ( forced vital capacity [ FVC ] and forced expiratory volume 1 s [ FEV1 ] ) was evaluated at admission and discharge .
label: method

string: There were no significant differences between the groups for all parameters at all time periods , except for higher FEV1 value in the 8-mg NB group at baseline .
label: result

string: In groups , significant differences were determined for FVC , FEV1 , PaO2 , and SaO2 ( p < 0.001 ) , but not for PaCO2 and pH , in comparison to their baseline values .
label: result

string: As adverse events , hyperglycemia and oral moniliasis were observed in the PS group ( n = 4 ) and in the NB groups ( n = 5 ) , respectively , and treatment change was required in 9 patients ( 2 patients in the PS group and 7 patients in the NB groups ) ( p = 0.57 ) .
label: result

string: Randomized parallel group study with 1-year follow-up , conducted 2008 through 2011 at homes of low-income adults aged 18 to 65 years with uncontrolled asthma living in King County , Washington .
label: method

string: The CHWs provided a mean of 4.9 home visits during a 1-year period to assess asthma control , self-management , and home environment and to support asthma self-management practices .
label: method

string: Primary prespecified outcomes were symptom-free days ( number of 24-hour periods in prior 2 weeks without asthma symptoms ) , asthma-related quality of life ( Mini Asthma Quality of Life Questionnaire ) , and asthma-related unscheduled health care use .
label: method

string: Of 463 individuals who completed eligibility screening , 443 were eligible , 366 participated ( 177 in intervention and 189 in control groups ) , and 333 completed the study ( 91 % ) .
label: result

string: The intervention group had significantly greater increases in mean symptom-free days per 2 weeks ( 2.02 [ 95 % CI , 0.94-3 .09 ] ; P < .001 ) and quality of life ( 0.50 [ 95 % CI , 0.28-0 .71 ] points ; P < .001 ) relative to the control group , adjusted for age , sex , race/ethnicity , and education level .
label: result

string: The number needed to treat to increase symptom-free days by 2 days per 2 weeks was 7.4 and to improve quality of life by 0.5 points was 2.6 .
label: result

string: Mean urgent health care use episodes in the past 12 months decreased significantly and similarly in both groups , from a mean of 3.46 to 1.99 episodes in the intervention group ( mean change , -1.47 [ 95 % CI , -2.28 to -0.67 ] ; P < .001 ) and from a mean of 3.30 to 1.96 episodes in the control group ( mean change , -1.34 [ 95 % CI , -2.00 to -0.72 ] ; P < .001 ) ( P = .83 comparing groups ) .
label: result

string: clinicaltrials.gov Identifier : NCT01783028 .
label: background

string: Few clinical trials have evaluated the efficacy and safety of Tripterygium wilfordii Hook F ( TwHF ) compared with acitretin in psoriasis .
label: background

string: We aimed to compare the efficacy and safety of TwHF compared with acitretin in the treatment of moderate to severe psoriasis vulgaris .
label: background

string: Adults with Psoriasis Area Severity Index ( PASI ) score 10 and psoriasis-affected body surface area 10 % were randomized into a TwHF ( 20 mg , 3 times a day ) or acitretin group ( 30 mg , once a day ) .
label: method

string: The treatment course lasted for 8 weeks .
label: method

string: Patients were assessed at baseline and at 2 , 4 , and 8 weeks .
label: method

string: Laboratory tests were performed at baseline , week 4 , and week 8 .
label: method

string: The data were analyzed using paired samples t-test or analysis of variance ( ANOVA ) .
label: method

string: A total of 115 patients was enrolled ( 58 TwHF ; 57 acitretin ) .
label: result

string: The median PASI score improved in the TwHF group by 50.4 % and in the acitretin group by 42.7 % .
label: result

string: There was no significant difference in median PASI improvement between two groups at 2 , 4 , and 8 weeks .
label: result

string: There was also no significant difference in PASI 25 , PASI 50 , PASI 75 , and PASI 90 response between the two groups at 2 , 4 , and 8 weeks .
label: result

string: There was a significant increase in the level of aspartate transaminase and triglycerides in the TwHF group ( P = 0.026 and P = 0.011 , respectively ) .
label: result

string: In the acitretin group , there was a significant increase in the level of alanine transaminase , cholesterol , and high-density lipoprotein ( P = 0.030 , P < 0.01 , and P < 0.01 , respectively ) .
label: result

string: A double-blinded , randomized , controlled trial .

string: A cohort study of 369 ( 172 treated , 197 untreated ) Swedish women who in 1973-1993 were assessed for tall adolescent stature was designed .

string: Oxygen consumption may be impaired in critically ill patients .

string: Critically ill adults requiring mechanical ventilation were screened for enrollment .
label: method

string: Oxygen consumption ( [ Formula : see text ] o2 ) and cardiac index ( CI ) were recorded continuously for 9 hours .
label: method

label: method

string: The outcome was change in [ Formula : see text ] o2 after thiamine administration .
label: method

string: Twenty patients were enrolled and 3 were excluded because of incomplete [ Formula : see text ] o2 data , leaving 17 patients for analysis .

string: There was a trend toward increase in [ Formula : see text ] o2 after thiamine administration ( 16.3 ml/min , SE 8.5 ; P = 0.052 ) .

string: Secondary analyses of the ` Volunteering , Access to Outdoor Activities and Wellbeing in Older People ' ( VOW ) data ( ISRCTN56847832 ) .

string: There is a lack of knowledge about the patient 's experience of excess skin after bariatric surgery in patients with body mass index , ( BMI ) > 50 kg/m ( 2 ) .
label: background

string: The objective of this study was to evaluate experience of excess skin after laparoscopic biliopancreatic diversion with duodenal switch ( BPD/DS ) or laparoscopic Roux-en-Y gastric bypass ( LRYGB ) and explore possible gender differences .
label: background

string: Another aim was to analyze possible correlation between the reported experiences of excess skin with changes in weight , BMI , and hip and waist circumference after surgery .
label: background

string: One and/or 2 years after gastric bypass or duodenal switch surgery 57 patients responded to a specific questionnaire .
label: method

string: The questionnaire included questions about the amount of excess skin and how much discomfort it caused .
label: method

string: Furthermore , the patients were measured concerning weight and waist and hip circumference .
label: method

string: One year after surgery , a majority of the patients experienced excess skin scored as > 2 ( `` a lot of '' or `` very much '' ) .
label: result

string: The patients in the BPD/DS group experienced significantly more excess skin compared to patients in the LRYGB group .
label: result

string: Women experienced more excess skin and discomfort on several body parts than men .
label: result

string: The correlations between changes in BMI and the reported experience and discomfort of excess skin were low .
label: result

string: There was a low to moderate correlation between changes in waist and hip circumference measures and the experience of excess skin on stomach and buttocks .
label: result

string: Alcohol is responsible for a large and growing proportion of the global burden of disease , as well as being the cause of social problems .
label: background

string: Brief interventions are one component of comprehensive policy measures necessary to reduce these harms .
label: background

string: Brief interventions increasingly take advantage of the Internet to reach large numbers of high risk groups such as students .
label: background

string: The research literature on the efficacy and effectiveness of online interventions is developing rapidly .
label: background

string: Although many studies show benefits in the form of reduced consumption , other intervention studies show no effects , for reasons that are unclear .
label: background

string: Sweden became the first country in the world to implement a national system in which all university students are offered a brief online intervention via an e-mail .
label: background

string: This randomized controlled trial ( RCT ) aims to evaluate the effectiveness of this national system comprising a brief online intervention among university students who are hazardous and harmful drinkers .
label: method

string: This study employs a conventional RCT design in which screening to determine eligibility precedes random allocation to immediate or delayed access to online intervention .
label: method

string: The online intervention evaluated comprises three main components ; assessment , normative feedback and advice on reducing drinking .
label: method

string: Screening is confined to a single question in order to minimise assessment reactivity and to prevent contamination .
label: method

string: Outcomes will be evaluated after 2 months , with total weekly alcohol consumption being the primary outcome measure .
label: method

string: Invitations to participate are provided by e-mail to approximately 55,000 students in 9 Swedish universities .
label: method

string: ISRCTN02335307 .
label: background

string: The transient receptor potential vanilloid 1 has been implicated as a target mediator for heartburn perception and modulation of esophageal secondary peristalsis .
label: background

string: Our aim was to determine the effect of repeated esophageal infusion of capsaicin-contained red pepper sauce on heartburn perception and secondary peristalsis in healthy adults .
label: background

string: Secondary peristalsis was performed with mid-esophageal injections of air in 15 healthy adults .
label: method

string: Two separate protocols including esophageal infusion with saline and capsaicin-contained red pepper sauce and 2 consecutive sessions of capsaicin-contained red pepper sauce were randomly performed .
label: method

string: After repeated infusion of capsaicin-contained red pepper sauce , the threshold volume to activate secondary peristalsis was significantly increased during slow ( p < 0.001 ) and rapid air injections ( p = 0.004 ) .
label: result

string: Acute infusion of capsaicin-contained red pepper sauce enhanced heartburn perception ( p < 0.001 ) , but the intensity of heartburn perception was significantly reduced after repeated capsaicin-contained red pepper sauce infusion ( p = 0.007 ) .
label: result

string: Acute infusion of capsaicin-contained red pepper sauce significantly increased pressure wave amplitudes of distal esophagus during slow ( p = 0.003 ) and rapid air injections ( p = 0.01 ) , but repeated infusion of capsaicin-contained red pepper sauce significantly decreased pressure wave amplitude of distal esophagus during slow ( p = 0.0005 ) and rapid air injections ( p = 0.003 ) .
label: result

string: Diabetes self-care by patients has been shown to assist in the reduction of disease severity and associated medical costs .
label: background

string: We compared the effectiveness of two different diabetes self-care interventions on glycemic control in a racially/ethnically diverse population .
label: background

string: We also explored whether reductions in glycated hemoglobin ( HbA1c ) will be more marked in minority persons .
label: background

string: We conducted an open-label randomized controlled trial of 376 patients with type 2 diabetes aged 18years and whose last measured HbA1c was 7.5 % ( 58mmol/mol ) .
label: method

string: Participants were randomized to : 1 ) a Chronic Disease Self-Management Program ( CDSMP ; n = 101 ) ; 2 ) a diabetes self-care software on a personal digital assistant ( PDA ; n = 81 ) ; 3 ) a combination of interventions ( CDSMP + PDA ; n = 99 ) ; or 4 ) usual care ( control ; n = 95 ) .
label: method

string: Enrollment occurred January 2009-June 2011 at seven regional clinics of a university-affiliated multi-specialty group practice .
label: method

string: The primary outcome was change in HbA1c from randomization to 12months .
label: method

string: Data were analyzed using a multilevel statistical model .
label: method

string: Average baseline HbA1c in the CDSMP , PDA , CDSMP + PDA , and control arms were 9.4 % , 9.3 % , 9.2 % , and 9.2 % , respectively .
label: result

string: HbA1c reductions at 12months for the groups averaged 1.1 % , 0.7 % , 1.1 % , and 0.7 % , respectively and did not differ significantly from baseline based on the model ( P = .771 ) .
label: result

string: Besides the participants in the PDA group reporting eating more high-fat foods compared to their counterparts ( P < .004 ) , no other significant differences were observed in participants ' diabetes self-care activities .
label: result

string: Exploratory sub-analysis did not reveal any marked reductions in HbA1c for minority persons but rather modest reductions for all racial/ethnic groups .
label: result

string: Clinicaltrials.gov Identifier : NCT01221090 .
label: background

string: The impact of perioperative synbiotics on bacterial translocation and subsequent bacteraemia after oesophagectomy is unclear .
label: background

string: This study investigated the effect of perioperative synbiotic administration on the incidence of bacterial translocation to mesenteric lymph nodes ( MLNs ) and the occurrence of postoperative bacteraemia .
label: background

string: Patients with oesophageal cancer were randomized to receive perioperative synbiotics or no synbiotics ( control group ) .
label: method

string: MLNs were harvested from the jejunal mesentery before dissection ( MLN-1 ) and after the restoration of digestive tract continuity ( MLN-2 ) .
label: method

string: Blood and faeces samples were taken before and after operation .
label: method

string: Microorganisms in each sample were detected using a bacterium-specific ribosomal RNA-targeted reverse transcriptase-quantitative polymerase chain reaction ( RT-qPCR ) method .
label: method

string: Some 42 patients were included .
label: result

string: There was a significant difference between the two groups in detection levels of microorganisms in the MLN-1 samples .
label: result

string: Microorganisms were more frequently detected in MLN-2 samples in the control group than in the synbiotics group ( 10 of 18 versus 3 of 18 ; P = 0035 ) .
label: result

string: In addition , bacteraemia detected using RT-qPCR 1day after surgery was more prevalent in the control group than in the synbiotics group ( 12 of 21 versus 4 of 21 ; P = 0025 ) .
label: result

string: Neutrophil counts on postoperative days 1 , 2 and 7 after surgery were all significantly higher in the control group than in the synbiotics group .
label: result

string: ID 000003262 ( University Hospital Medical Information Network , http://www.umin.ac.jp ) .
label: background

string: Patients were randomly assigned to receive GS ( oral S-1 60mg/m ( 2 ) daily on days 1-15 every 3weeks and gemcitabine 1,000 mg/m ( 2 ) on days 8 and 15 ) or gemcitabine ( 1,000 mg/m ( 2 ) on days 1 , 8 , and 15 every 4weeks ) .
label: method

string: The primary endpoint was progression-free survival ( PFS ) .
label: method

string: One hundred and one patients were randomly assigned .
label: result

string: PFS was significantly longer in the GS arm with an estimated hazard ratio ( HR ) of 0.65 ( 95 % CI 0.43-0 .98 ; P = 0.039 ; median 5.3 vs 3.8 months ) .
label: result

string: Objective response rate ( ORR ) was also better in the GS arm ( 21.6 vs 6 % , P = 0.048 ) .
