string: Median survival was 8.6 months for GS and 8.6 months for GEM ( HR 0.93 ; 95 % CI 0.61-1 .41 ; P = 0.714 ) .
label: result

string: Grade 3-4 neutropenia ( 44 vs 19.6 % , P = 0.011 ) and thrombocytopenia ( 26 vs 8.7 % , P = 0.051 ) were more frequent in the GS arm .
label: result

string: This study was designed to prospectively evaluate the role of nebulized hyaluronic acid ( HA ) given for 10 days/mo over 3 months as adjunct treatment to minimize symptoms and preventing exacerbation of chronic rhinosinusitis ( CRS ) .
label: background

string: Thirty-nine eligible patients were randomized to receive nebulized 9-mg sodium hyaluronate nasal washes plus saline solution ( 21 patients ) or 5 mL of saline alone ( 18 patients ) , according to an open-label , parallel-group design , with blind observer assessment .
label: method

string: A questionnaire about main CRS discomfort and nasal endoscopy for mucous discharge and/or mucosal edema of nasal cavities was used to assess primary outcomes of treatments .
label: method

string: Secondary outcome measures included side effects and satisfaction .
label: method

string: HA significantly improved quality of life in CRS patients according to the CRS questionnaire ( 16 3.72 versus 11.52 4.28 ; p < 0.001 ) , contrary to saline group scores ( 18.92 3.09 versus 18.21 3.21 ; p = 0.55 ) .
label: result

string: The HA group showed significantly reduced osteomeatal edema ( 2.42 versus 1.52 ; p < 0.001 ) and secretions ( 0.95 versus 0.42 ; p < 0.001 ) , whereas there was no statistically significant difference in the saline group .
label: result

string: The compliance to the treatment was similar in both groups and no side effects were recorded .
label: result

string: Totally 354 AS patients of SDISOS and DHOS were randomly assigned to the treatment group and the control group using a multi-center randomized , positive drug parallel-controlled clinical trail .
label: method

string: Patients in treatment group were treated by BQD or QQD according to syndrome typing , while those in the control group took Sulfasalazine enteric-coated tablet ( SECT ) , 24 weeks as one therapeutic course .
label: method

string: After treatment , the clinical efficacy was evaluated by using ASAS20 standard ( set by Asessment in Ankylosing Spondylitis working group ) , Chinese medical efficacy evaluation standards , and BASDAI , BASFI , BASMI , night-pain index , spinal pain index , PGA , C-reactive protein ( CRP ) , and erythrocyte sedimentation rate ( ESR ) .
label: method

string: After 24 weeks of treatment by BQD or QQD , ASAS20 standard rate was 86.75 % in the treatment group , and the total effective rate of Chinese medical syndrome was 85.47 % .
label: result

string: They could significantly reduce patients ' integrals of Chinese medical syndrome , BASDAI , BASFI , BASMI , night-pain index , spinal pain index , and PGA ( all P < 0.01 ) .
label: result

string: Exercise training improves physical fitness , insulin resistance , and endothelial function in type 2 diabetes .
label: background

string: Hypoxia may further optimize these beneficial effects .
label: background

string: The aim of this study was to compare the effects of hypoxic versus normoxic exercise training on physical fitness , endothelial function , and insulin resistance in type 2 diabetes .
label: background

string: Peak oxygen consumption , flow mediated dilation ( endothelial function ) , and glucose homeostasis were assessed in 19 patients ( 557 years ) before and after an 8-week intervention .
label: method

string: Subjects were randomly allocated to normoxic ( 21 % O2 , n = 9 ) or hypoxic ( 16.5 % O2 , n = 10 ) exercise training .
label: method

string: Endothelium-independent dilation was examined using sublingual administration of glyceryl trinitrate , and used to calculate the ratio between endothelium-dependent and - independent dilation .
label: method

string: Exercise training improved physical fitness and brachial artery ratio between endothelium-dependent and - independent dilation ( both p < 0.05 ) , whilst these exercise training-induced changes were similar in both groups ( interaction-effects p > 0.05 ) .
label: result

string: Exercise training did not significantly change brachial artery flow-mediated dilation or glyceryl trinitrate-response , superficial femoral artery flow-mediated dilation , or glucose homeostasis , whilst hypoxia did not alter the impact of exercise training .
label: result

string: An open-label , multicentre , randomized trial .
label: method

string: Peripheral neuropathy was self-reported at 12-weekly clinic visits .
label: method

string: Cox regression models ( excluding participants reporting preexisting peripheral neuropathy at ART initiation ) , considered sex ; pre-ART WHO stage , age and CD4 ( + ) cell count ; CD4 ( + ) cell count versus no CD4 ( + ) cell count monitoring ; and time-updated CD4 ( + ) cell count , weight and use of stavudine , isoniazid and didanosine .
label: method

string: Four hundred and twenty-one out of 3316 ( 13 % ) patients reported preexisting peripheral neuropathy at ART initiation .
label: result

string: Median ( interquartile range , IQR ) follow-up in 2895 participants without preexisting peripheral neuropathy was 4.9 ( 4.7-5 .4 ) years .
label: result

string: Three hundred and fifty-four ( 12 % ) took stavudine as first-line substitution and 518 ( 18 % ) took isoniazid during follow-up .
label: result

string: Two hundred and ninety ( 11 % ) participants developed a new peripheral neuropathy episode , an incidence of 2.12 per 100 person-years .
label: result

string: Eighteen ( 0.1 % ) had a grade 3/4 episode .
label: result

string: Independent predictors of peripheral neuropathy were current stavudine use [ adjusted hazard ratio ( a ) HR 4.16 ( 95 % confidence interval , 95 % CI 3.06-5 .66 ] , current isoniazid use [ aHR 1.59 ( 95 % CI 1.02-2 .47 ) ] and current didanosine use [ aHR 1.60 ( 95 % CI 1.19-2 .14 ) ] .
label: result

string: Higher risks were independently associated with higher pre-ART weight [ aHR ( per +5 kg ) 1.07 ( 95 % CI 1.01-1 .13 ) ] and older age aHR ( per 10 years older ) 1.29 ( 95 % CI 1.12-1 .49 ) , but there was no significant effect of sex ( P = 0.13 ) , pre-ART CD4 ( + ) cell count ( P = 0.91 ) or CD4 ( + ) cell count monitoring ( P = 0.73 ) .
label: result

string: We introduced an initial large dose of modified St. Thomas ' Hospital cardioplegic solution with the aim of providing both myocardial protection as well as a smooth intraoperative process .

string: In 90 cases of isolated aortic valve replacement , we used the modified technique of cardioplegia in 45 ( group S ) and conventional administration of glucose-insulin-potassium solution in 45 ( group G ) .

string: The patients were selected at random .

string: In group S , we added 4 mEq of potassium to the original St. Thomas ' Hospital solution and administered 30mLkg ( -1 ) as an initial dose .

string: The temperature was decreased to 2 .

string: The mean of reperfusion time after declamping in group S was significantly shorter ( 16.7 6.4 vs. 21.5 10.0 min ; p = 0.007 ) .

string: The average of postoperative maximum creatine kinase-MB was significantly lower in group S ( 25.6 9.5 vs. 40.6 37.2 IUL ( -1 ) ; p = 0.014 ) .

string: The study was a single-center , open-label , phase I/II trial enrolling six participants with bilateral GA treated with intravitreal sirolimus in only one randomly assigned eye , with the fellow eye as control .
label: method

string: The primary efficacy outcome measure was the change in total GA area from baseline on color fundus photography ( CFP ) ; secondary outcomes included changes in GA area on fundus autofluorescence ( FAF ) , visual acuity , central retinal thickness ( CRT ) , and macular sensitivity from baseline .
label: method

string: Although no systemic adverse events were attributed to treatment , two of six participants had ocular adverse events that were possibly associated .

string: The treated eye of one participant developed abnormal paralesional changes on FAF that were associated with accelerated retinal thinning .
label: result

string: This accelerated retinal thinning was also seen in the treated eye of a second participant .

string: Because of concern that these events were associated with treatment , treatment was suspended .

string: Asthma exacerbations lead to frequent emergency visits and hospitalizations , and are associated with high morbidity and occasionally mortality .
label: background

string: New therapeutic strategies are needed .
label: background

string: We sought to investigate whether the addition of high-dose inhaled budesonide to standard therapy would shorten the length of stay ( LOS ) in hospital of children admitted for asthma exacerbations .
label: background

string: The study was designed as a single-center , double-blind , placebo-controlled and parallel-group trial .
label: method

string: Children aged 7-72 months and admitted with an asthma exacerbation clinical asthma score ( CAS ) of between 3 and 9 were allocated to either the budesonide ( n = 50 ) or the placebo ( n = 50 ) group .
label: method

string: Hospital LOS was compared between children who received 2 mg/day of budesonide versus placebo in addition to standard management of asthma exacerbation involving oxygen inhalation and 2-agonist , anticholinergic and oral corticosteroid therapy .
label: method

string: All patients were assessed every 4 h. Children with a CAS < 3 , a peripheral oxygen saturation > 95 % and normal pulmonary function , and those with a symptom-free period of at least 4 h after salbutamol treatment were discharged .
label: method

string: Total hospital LOS was significantly shorter in the budesonide group than in the placebo group ( median : 44 vs. 80 h , respectively ; p = 0.01 ) .
label: result

string: When compared with placebo , the number of inpatients was significantly less in the budesonide group at all the assessed end points ( Kaplan-Meier ; p = 0.022 ) .
label: result

string: Additionally , nebulized budesonide was found to reduce the overall cost of treatment .
label: result

string: We randomized 306 women recruited from community supervision settings to receive either : ( 1 ) a four-session traditional group-based HIV/STI prevention intervention ( traditional WORTH ) ; ( 2 ) a four-session multimedia group-based HIV/STI prevention intervention that covered the same content as traditional WORTH but was delivered in a computerized format ; or ( 3 ) a four-session group-based Wellness Promotion intervention that served as an attention control condition .
label: method

string: The study examined whether the traditional or multimedia WORTH intervention was more efficacious in reducing risks when compared to Wellness Promotion ; and whether multimedia WORTH was more efficacious in reducing risks when compared to traditional WORTH .
label: method

string: Primary outcomes were assessed over the 12-month post-intervention period and included the number of unprotected sex acts , the proportion of protected sex acts , and consistent condom use .
label: method

string: At baseline , 77 % of participants reported unprotected vaginal or anal sex ( n = 237 ) and 63 % ( n = 194 ) had multiple sex partners .
label: method

string: Women assigned to traditional or multimedia WORTH were significantly more likely than women assigned to the control condition to report an increase in the proportion of protected sex acts ( = 0.10 ; 95 % CI = 0.02-0 .18 ) and a decrease in the number of unprotected sex acts ( IRR = 0.72 ; 95 % CI = 0.57-0 .90 ) .
label: result

string: ClinicalTrials.gov NCT01784809 .

string: Older participants completed baseline measures of memory and executive function , health , and baseline and post-treatment Hamilton Depression Scales ( HAM-D ) in a 12-week trial comparing psychotherapies ( problem-solving vs. supportive ; N = 46 ) .

string: We examined cognitive predictors to identify treatment responders ( i.e. , HAM-D scores reduced by50 % ) and remitters ( i.e. , post-treatment HAM-D score10 ) .

string: Adherence to pre-exposure prophylaxis ( PrEP ) is critical for efficacy .
label: background

string: Antiretroviral concentrations are an objective measure of PrEP use and correlate with efficacy .
label: background

string: Understanding patterns and correlates of drug detection can identify populations at risk for nonadherence and inform design of PrEP adherence interventions .
label: background

string: Blood antiretroviral concentrations were assessed among active arm participants in iPrEx , a randomized placebo-controlled trial of emtricitabine/tenofovir in men who have sex with men and transgender women in 6 countries .
label: method

string: We evaluated rates and correlates of drug detection among a random sample of 470 participants at week 8 and a longitudinal cohort of 303 participants through 72 weeks of follow-up .
label: method

string: Overall , 55 % of participants ( 95 % confidence interval : 49 to 60 ) tested at week 8 had drug detected .
label: result

string: Drug detection was associated with older age and varied by study site .
label: result

string: In longitudinal analysis , 31 % never had drug detected , 30 % always had drug detected , and 39 % had an inconsistent pattern .
label: result

string: Overall detection rates declined over time .
label: result

string: Drug detection at some or all visits was associated with older age , indices of sexual risk , including condomless receptive anal sex , and responding `` do n't know '' to a question about belief of PrEP efficacy ( 0-10 scale ) .
label: result

string: Doppler echocardiography and CV events were recorded during a median of 4.0 years in 979 men and 632 women aged 28-86 ( mean 6710 ) years in the Simvastatin Ezetimibe in Aortic Stenosis ( SEAS ) study .
label: method

string: LV systolic function was assessed by EF and midwall shortening ( MWS ) .
label: method

string: Study outcomes were AS-related events , ischaemic CV events and total mortality .
label: method

string: The annular cumulative incidence of AS events , ischaemic CV events and death was 8.1 % , 3.4 % and 2.8 % in women , and 8.9 % , 4.4 % and 2.4 % in men , respectively .
label: result

string: Women and men had similar AS progression rate whether measured by peak jet velocity , mean gradient or valve area .
label: result

string: In multivariate analyses , female sex independently predicted less reduction in LV MWS and EF during follow-up ( both p < 0.05 ) .
label: result

string: In time-varying Cox analyses , women had a 40 % lower rate of ischaemic CV events ( 95 % CI 21 % to 54 % ) , in particular , more than 50 % lower rate of stroke and coronary artery bypass grafting , and a 31 % lower all-cause mortality ( 95 % CI 1 % to 51 % ) , independent of active study treatment , age and hypertension , as well as time-varying valve area , low systolic function and abnormal LV geometry .
label: result

string: AS event rate did not differ by sex .
label: result

string: ClinicalTrials.gov identifier : NCT00092677 .

string: Thirty-two African American rural adults with type 2 diabetes were recruited and 25 adults were retained and participated in an interventional study designed to test the effectiveness of the `` Taking Care of Sugar '' DSME program for the 2-year follow-up .

string: In this prospective randomized study 278 radiographs of the knee in follow-up of total-knee arthroplasty were performed with standard and 37 % reduced radiation dose .
label: method

string: The evaluation of the plain-radiographs was conducted using the following criteria : bone-implant interface , implant-surface character , implant-implant discrimination and periarticular heterotopic ossification .

string: Two radiologists evaluated these criteria using a score ranging from 1 ( definitely assessable ) to 4 ( not assessable ) .
label: method

label: method

string: The study was designed as non-inferiority-trial .
label: method

string: 100 % of examined radiographs were scored as assessable , hence no statistical inferiority between the examinations with standard and reduced dose could be observed .
label: result

string: Singular assessment of the defined criteria was likewise dose-independent .
label: result

string: Global gene expression profiles from ER-positive breast carcinomas before and during presurgical treatment with fulvestrant ( n = 22 ) or anastrozole ( n = 81 ) , and corresponding in vitro models , were compared .

string: Cores of human enamel ( four per group ) were soaked in pooled human saliva , and then treated with a 1:3 slurry ( dentifrice : saliva ) using a standardised in vitro erosion model ( 5-day cycling ) that includes 10-minute challenges with 1 % citric acid applied 60 minutes after each dentifrice treatment .

string: Inflammation plays a key role in the development of benign prostatic hyperplasia .
label: background

string: Prostaglandin E2 ( PGE2 ) is an important inflammation factor found in enlarged prostatic tissue that can be the main cause of inflammatory pain .
label: background

string: The aim of this study was to investigate whether epidural anesthesia can block the negative effects of prostaglandin mediators during prostate surgery .
label: background

string: The study included 60 patients who underwent open prostatectomy .
label: method

string: All patients were randomly allocated to one of two study groups .
label: method

string: The first group received general anesthesia and the second group a combination of general and epidural anesthesia .
label: method

string: Main outcome measures were plasma concentration of PGE2 , adrenaline , noradrenaline , and dopamine , before induction of anesthesia and at the time of enucleation .
label: method

string: Preoperative serum concentrations of PGE2 were high in both groups .
label: result

string: During enucleation , serum concentrations of adrenaline , noradrenaline , and dopamine increased , followed by a rise of systolic and diastolic blood pressure in the group of patients that received only general anesthesia .
label: result

string: Serum concentration of PGE2 was at the same level as before induction of anesthesia in both groups .
label: result

string: Post-visit `` booster '' sessions have been recommended to augment the impact of brief interventions delivered in the emergency department ( ED ) .

string: This paper , which focuses on implementation issues , presents descriptive information and interventionists ' qualitative perspectives on providing brief interventions over the phone , challenges , `` lessons learned '' , and recommendations for others attempting to implement adjunctive booster calls .
label: background

string: Attempts were made to complete two 20-minute telephone `` booster '' calls within a week following a patient 's ED discharge with 425 patients who screened positive for and had recent problematic substance use other than alcohol or nicotine .
label: method

string: Over half ( 56.2 % ) of participants completed the initial call ; 66.9 % of those who received the initial call also completed the second call .
label: result

string: Median number of attempts to successfully contact participants for the first and second calls were 4 and 3 , respectively .
label: result

string: Each completed call lasted an average of about 22 minutes .
label: result

string: Common challenges/barriers identified by booster callers included unstable housing , limited phone access , unavailability due to additional treatment , lack of compensation for booster calls , and booster calls coming from an area code different than the participants ' locale and from someone other than ED staff .
label: result

string: Co-trimoxazole ( fixed-dose trimethoprim-sulfamethoxazole ) prophylaxis administered before antiretroviral therapy ( ART ) reduces morbidity in children infected with the human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) .

string: A total of 758 participants were randomly assigned to stop or continue co-trimoxazole ( 382 and 376 participants , respectively ) , after receiving ART for a median of 2.1 years ( interquartile range , 1.8 to 2.3 ) .

string: The median age was 7.9 years ( interquartile range , 4.6 to 11.1 ) , and the median CD4 T-cell percentage was 33 % ( interquartile range , 26 to 39 ) .

string: Participants who stopped co-trimoxazole had higher rates of hospitalization or death than those who continued ( 72 participants [ 19 % ] vs. 48 [ 13 % ] ; hazard ratio , 1.64 ; 95 % confidence interval [ CI ] , 1.14 to 2.37 ; P = 0.007 ; noninferiority not shown ) .

string: Depression is common in primary care and is often unrecognized and untreated .
label: background

string: Studies are needed to demonstrate the feasibility of implementing evidence-based depression care provided by primary health care workers ( PHCWs ) in sub-Saharan Africa .
label: background

string: We carried out a pilot two-parallel arm cluster randomized controlled trial of a package of care for depression in primary care .
label: background

string: Six primary health care centers ( PHCC ) in two Local Government Areas of Oyo State , South West Nigeria were randomized into 3 intervention and 3 control clinics .
label: method

string: Three PHCWs were selected for training from each of the participating clinics .
label: method

string: The PHCWs from the intervention clinics were trained to deliver a manualized multicomponent stepped care intervention package for depression consisting of psychoeducation , activity scheduling , problem solving treatment and medication for severe depression .
label: method

string: Providers from the control clinics delivered care as usual , enhanced by a refresher training on depression diagnosis and management .
label: method

string: Outcome measures Patient 's Health Questionnaire ( PHQ-9 ) , WHO quality of Life instrument ( WHOQOL-Bref ) and the WHO disability assessment schedule ( WHODAS ) were administered in the participants ' home at baseline , 3 and 6months .
label: method

string: About 98 % of the consecutive attendees to the clinics agreed to have the screening interview .
label: result

string: Of those screened , 284 ( 22.7 % ) were positive ( PHQ-9 score8 ) and 234 gave consent for inclusion in the study : 165 from intervention and 69 from control clinics .
label: result

string: The rates of eligible and consenting participants were similar in the control and intervention arms .
label: result

string: In all 85.9 % ( 92.8 % in intervention and 83 % in control ) of the participants were successfully administered outcome assessments at 6months .
label: result

string: The PHCWs had little difficulty in delivering the intervention package .
label: result

string: At 6months follow up , depression symptoms had improved in 73.0 % from the intervention arm compared to 51.6 % control .
label: result

string: Compared to the mean scores at baseline , there was improvement in the mean scores on all outcome measures in both arms at six months .
label: result

string: ISRCTN46754188 ( ISRTCN registry at isrtcn.com ) ; registered 23 September 2013 , details of the pilot study added 12/02/2015 .

string: This paper presents the prevalence of health promotion in workplaces in Poland .

label: method

label: method

label: result

string: At the same time , more than 80 % of the companies have been introducing various modifications and health-oriented actions without definite health intentions .
label: result

string: Most companies improve their physical working environment , organise/sponsor medical services , sports activities and try to reduce stress and smoking .
label: result

string: Managers have increased their awareness of business benefits re ceived from health promotion .
label: result

label: result

string: About six percent of pregnant women suffer from severe fear of childbirth .

string: This study used a pretest , posttest , crossover design .

string: Anaemia in pregnancy is a major public health problem especially in the low-income countries where it is highly prevalent .

string: We assessed Hb levels of 2436 pregnant women at 28 + weeks of gestation at six health facilities , who were approached to participate in a stepped-wedge cluster-randomised trial of antenatal distribution of misoprostol ( for self-administration after home birth or when oxytocin is not available ) .

label: result

string: After adjusting for measured confounders , factors associated with increased risk of anaemia in pregnancy were malaria infection ( OR : 1.32 , 95 % CI : 1.11 , 1.58 ) , Human Immuno-deficiency Virus infection ( OR : 2.13 , 95 % CI : 1.36 , 2.90 ) and lack of iron supplementation ( OR : 1.66 , 95 % CI : 1.36 , 2.03 ) .

label: result

string: To compare surgical pleth index ( SPI ) - guided analgesia with conventional analgesia by evaluating intraoperative analgesic requirements , postoperative pain , and emergence agitation in children .

string: Human papillomavirus ( HPV ) is one of the most common sexually transmitted infections and is the cause of several different diseases in men and women .

string: Melasma is distressing for patients and challenging for physicians to treat .

string: Patients with mixed hyperlipidemia usually are in need of combination therapy to achieve low-density lipoprotein cholesterol ( LDL-C ) and triglyceride ( TG ) target values for reduction of cardiovascular risk .
label: background

string: This study investigated the efficacy and safety of adding a new hypolipidemic agent , coenzyme A ( CoA ) to stable statin therapy in patients with mixed hyperlipidemia .
label: background

string: In this multi-center , 8-week , double-blind study , adults who had received 8 weeks of stable statin therapy and had hypertriglyceridemia ( TG level at 2.3-6 .5 mmol/L ) were randomized to receive CoA 400 U/d or placebo plus stable dosage of statin .
label: method

string: Efficacy was assessed by the changes in the levels and patterns of lipoproteins .
label: method

string: Tolerability was assessed by the incidence and severity of adverse events ( AEs ) .
label: method

string: A total of 304 patients with mixed hyperlipidemia were randomized to receive CoA 400 U/d plus statin or placebo plus statin ( n = 152 , each group ) .
label: result

string: After treatment for 8 weeks , the mean percent change in TG was significantly greater with CoA plus statin compared with placebo plus statin ( -25.9 % vs -4.9 % , respectively ; p = 0.0003 ) .
label: result

string: CoA plus statin was associated with significant reductions in TC ( -9.1 % vs -3.1 % ; p = 0.0033 ) , LDL-C ( -9.9 % vs 0.1 % ; p = 0.003 ) , and non - high-density lipoprotein cholesterol ( -13.5 % vs -5.7 % ; p = 0.0039 ) .
label: result

string: There was no significant difference in the frequency of AEs between groups .
label: result

string: No serious AEs were considered treatment related .
label: result

string: Mortality following hip hemiarthroplasty is in the range of 10-40 % in the first year , with much attributed to post-operative complications .

label: background

string: Compared to SSI rates of elective hip surgery , at less than 1 % , this figure is elevated .
label: background

string: The aim of this quasi randomised controlled trial ( RCT ) is to determine if high dose antibiotic impregnated cement can reduce the SSI in patients at 12-months after hemiarthroplasty for intracapsular fractured neck of femur .
label: background

string: 848 patients with an intracapsular fractured neck of femur requiring a hip hemiarthroplasty are been recruited into this two-centre double-blind quasi RCT .

label: method

label: result

string: Lapis judaicus did not affect BUN , creatinine , ALT , or AST .

string: In line with a rapidly ageing global population , the rise in the frequency of falls will lead to increased healthcare and social care costs .

string: This study will be one of the few randomized controlled trials evaluating a multifaceted falls intervention in a low-middle income , culturally-diverse older Asian community .

string: The primary objective of our paper is to evaluate whether individually tailored multifactorial interventions will successfully reduce the number of falls among older adults .

string: Three hundred community-dwelling older Malaysian adults with a history of ( i ) two or more falls , or ( ii ) one injurious fall in the past 12 months will be recruited .

string: Baseline assessment will include cardiovascular , frailty , fracture risk , psychological factors , gait and balance , activities of daily living and visual assessments .

string: Fallers will be randomized into 2 groups : to receive tailored multifactorial interventions ( intervention group ) ; or given lifestyle advice with continued conventional care ( control group ) .

string: clinicaltrials.gov Identifier : NCT02015260 .
label: background

string: Atherosclerotic peripheral artery disease ( PAD ) is common and results in limitations in quality of life and potential progression to limb loss .
label: background

string: Options for therapy include medical therapy , supervised exercise , surgical revascularization , and , more recently , endovascular therapies to restore arterial perfusion to the limb .
label: background

string: Endovascular revascularization has evolved over the past 2 decades , from percutaneous transluminal angioplasty ( PTA ) to self-expanding stents , atherectomy , laser angioplasty , and drug-eluting stents .
label: background

string: Despite impressive technologic advances , PTA remains the standard of care at many institutions and is the recommended primary treatment modality for femoral-popliteal PAD according to current American College of Cardiology Foundation/American Heart Association guidelines .
label: background

string: However , restenosis after PTA is common .
label: background

string: Therefore , a significant clinical need remains for a device that is able to achieve more durable patency than PTA but does not require a permanent implant .
label: background

string: Drug-coated balloons ( DCBs ) have the potential to address this need .
label: background

string: Several randomized controlled clinical trials of PTA balloons coated with different formulations of paclitaxel have been conducted in Europe ( N Engl J Med 2008 ; 358:689 -699 ) ( Circulation 2008 ; 118:1358 -1365 ) ( Circ Cardiovasc Interv 2012 ; 5:831 -840 ) ( JACC Cardiovas Interv 2014 ; 7:10 -19 ) and demonstrated more durable efficacy than PTA with comparable safety .
label: background

string: These studies were limited by small sample sizes and powered solely for an angiographic primary end point .
label: background

string: The pivotal LEVANT 2 trial was designed in collaboration with the US Food and Drug Administration to demonstrate safety and efficacy in a large population and to obtain US Food and Drug Administration approval .
label: background

string: A prospective , multicenter , single-blind trial comparing the Lutonix DCB ( Bard Lutonix ; New Hope , MN ) versus PTA for treatment of femoropopliteal PAD ( LEVANT 2 ) is the first US-based 2:1 randomized controlled trial of 476 patients with femoral-popliteal PAD designed to demonstrate superior efficacy and noninferior safety of a novel paclitaxel DCB compared with PTA .
label: method

string: The primary efficacy end point is primary patency at 12 months .
label: method

string: The primary safety end point is composite freedom at 12 months from perioperative death , index limb amputation , reintervention , and limb-related mortality .
label: method

string: A series of important secondary end points include physical functioning , quality of life , revascularizations , and alternative measures of patency .
label: method

string: To minimize bias potential for confounding variables , LEVANT 2 ( 1 ) excluded patients stented after predilation before randomization , ( 2 ) incorporated very stringent criteria for bailout stenting , ( 3 ) did not count bailout stenting as a target lesion revascularization or failure of any end point , ( 4 ) required a blinded clinician to perform clinical evaluations at follow-up , and ( 5 ) required clinical assessment before review of duplex ultrasound results .
label: method

string: In this prospective , randomized , controlled study we compared intraocular pressure in patients undergoing robot-assisted laparoscopic radical prostatectomy while in the Trendelenburg position or the modified Z Trendelenburg position .
label: method

string: In group 1 intraocular pressure , blood pressure and endotracheal CO2 were measured in the patient at anesthesia induction ( time 1 ) , before positioning ( time 2 ) , and while in the Trendelenburg position ( time 3 ) and in the modified Z Trendelenburg position ( time 4 ) .

string: They were also measured after pneumoperitoneum ( time 5 ) , every 30 minutes ( times 6 to 16 ) , while supine at the end of pneumoperitoneum ( time 17 ) and before awakening ( time 18 ) .

string: Group 1 included 29 patients in the modified Z Trendelenburg position .
label: result

string: Group 2 included 21 patients in the Trendelenburg position .
label: result

string: No difference was found in patient demographics or surgical outcomes .
label: result

string: Median intraocular pressure was in the low normal range at times 1 and 2 , and increased in time 3 in each group .
label: result

string: From time 4 intraocular pressure decreased and at all time points it was significantly lower in group 1 by a mean of 4.61 mm Hg ( 95 % CI -6.90 -2.30 , p < 0.001 ) .
label: result

string: At time 17 mean intraocular pressure decreased to normal ( 19.6 mm Hg ) in group 1 but remained in the hypertensive range ( 24.9 mm Hg ) in group 2 .
label: result

string: At time 18 mean intraocular pressure was 17 mm Hg in each group .

string: Blood pressure was significantly lower in group 1 with a mean reduction in systolic and diastolic pressure of 6.3 and 4.3 mm Hg , respectively .

string: Fewer alpacas displayed physical response to surgical stimulus with bupivacaine .

string: No significant differences were found between groups for timing of events , need for additional anesthesia , ease of surgery , or postoperative assessment .
label: result

string: Polymorphisms of the HLA-DP gene are associated with the natural clearance of the hepatitis B virus in Asian patients .
label: background

string: We studied 262 Caucasian chronic hepatitis B patients infected with HBV genotype A or D , treated with PEG-IFN for 1 year in two randomised controlled trials ( HBV 99-01 and PARC study ) .
label: method

string: Response was defined as an HBV DNA < 2000 IU/mL at 6 months post-treatment .
label: method

string: Variations at HLA-DPA1 and HLA-DPB1 were genotyped .
label: method

string: Of the 262 patients , 58 % was HBeAg-positive and HBV genotype A and D was observed in 32 % and 68 % , respectively .
label: result

string: At 6 months post-treatment , 57 ( 22 % ) patients had achieved an HBV DNA < 2000 IU/mL .
label: result

string: HLA-DPB1 was independently associated with virological response [ adjusted odds ratio ( OR ) 1.8 , 95 % confidence interval ( CI ) :1.1 -3.0 , P = 0.025 ] , and with an undetectable HBV DNA ( adjusted OR 2.4 95 % CI : 1.2-4 .7 , P = 0.015 ) when adjusted for HBeAg status and other known response modifiers .
label: result

string: In HBeAg-positive patients , combined HBeAg seroconversion with HBV DNA < 2000 IU/mL was increasingly observed with each addition of an HLA-DPB1 G-allele ( adjusted OR 2.7 , 95 % CI : 1.2-5 .9 , P = 0.012 ) .
label: result

string: Furthermore , HLA-DPA1 and HLA-DPB1 haplotype block GG showed comparable results for virological and combined response .
label: result

string: English-speaking women aged 18-45 years receiving care at an urban academic center obstetrics and gynecology clinic were included and randomized to a trial of standard contraceptive education and pamphlet ( n = 74 ) compared with standard contraceptive education and Facebook ( n = 69 ) information for contraception counseling .
label: method

string: Contraceptive knowledge was evaluated preintervention and postintervention by the Contraceptive Knowledge Inventory .
label: method

string: We evaluated the effect of the intervention by raw score and percent increase in Contraceptive Knowledge Inventory score , participant satisfaction with counseling method , and contraceptive preference postintervention .
label: method

string: All analyses were stratified by age group .
label: method

string: The median raw postintervention Contraceptive Knowledge Inventory score was significantly higher in the Facebook compared with the pamphlet group ( 15 compared with 12 , P < .001 ) as was percentage increase in the Contraceptive Knowledge Inventory score ( 36 % compared with 12 % , P < .001 ) .
label: result

string: Participant satisfaction with counseling method was significantly higher in the Facebook group ( median 10 compared with 6 , P < .001 ) .
label: result

string: Participant contraceptive preference for long-acting reversible contraceptives ( LARCs ; intrauterine device or implant ) postintervention was significantly greater in the Facebook compared with the pamphlet group ( 57 % compared with 35 % , P = .01 ) .
label: result

string: Among women currently using none or barrier contraception , contraceptive preference for implants was significantly greater in the Facebook compared with the pamphlet group ( 26 % compared with 5 % , P = .02 ) , although , when analysis was extended to include implant or intrauterine device , LARCs were not significantly higher in the Facebook compared with the pamphlet group ( 48 % compared with 33 % , P = .19 ) .
label: result

string: ClinicalTrials.gov , www.clinicaltrials.gov , NCT5327714500 .

string: We carried out a prospective , randomized , double blind controlled trial involving 63 consecutive consenting male patients admitted with diagnosis of uncomplicated alcohol withdrawal .

string: The patients were randomized into two groups based on the type of lorazepam dosage : symptom-triggered ( n = 33 ) and fixed tapering dose regimens ( n = 30 ) .

label: result

string: A total of 68 women undergoing FET were randomised to receive TEAS or mock TEAS at acupuncture points CV3 , CV4 and SP6 and Zigong bilaterally .

string: Both groups had six sessions per cycle for three menstrual cycles prior to the scheduled FET .
label: method

string: Each session lasted 30min and was repeated every other day .
label: method

string: 3D power Doppler ultrasound parameters , HOXA10 protein expression and rates of embryo implantation , clinical pregnancy and live birth were compared .
label: method

string: There were no significant differences between the two groups in endometrial thickness or endometrial volume .
label: result

string: The ultrasonographic endometrial triple-line pattern was present more often in the TEAS group ( p = 0.002 ) .
label: result

string: The TEAS group had a greater endometrial and subendometrial vascularisation index ( VI ) than the mock TEAS group ( p = 0.001 and p < 0.001 , respectively ) on 3D ultrasound and increased endometrial HOXA10 expression ( p = 0.001 ) immediately prior to FET .
label: result

string: Subsequently , the rates of embryo implantation , clinical pregnancy and live birth rates were all higher in the TEAS group than in the mock TEAS group ( p = 0.024 , p = 0.038 and p = 0.033 , respectively ) .

string: ChiCTR-TRC-14004448 .
label: background

string: Photodynamic therapy ( PDT ) with methyl aminolevulinate ( MAL ) is effective for treating multiple actinic keratoses ( AKs ) .
label: background

string: Ablative fractional laser ( FL ) creates vertical channels that may facilitate MAL delivery and improve PDT response .
label: background

string: A prospective randomized non-blinded trial initially evaluated 271 facial AKs in 45 patients .
label: method

string: All patients underwent one session of MAL-PDT using a red light-emitting diode lamp at 37J/cm ( 2 ) , and 23 patients with 135 AK lesions were randomly assigned to pre-treatment with a 2940-nm ablative fractional erbium : Yag laser .
label: method

string: Patients were followed up at 1 , 2 and 4weeks and every month until 6 and 12months post-treatment .
label: method

string: Response , adverse events , cosmetic outcome and patient satisfaction were documented .
label: method

string: Finally , a total of 236 facial AKs in 40 patients were enrolled and analysed in this study .
label: method

string: FL-PDT was significantly more effective than MAL-PDT at treating all AK grades ( 86.9 % vs. 61.2 % ; P < 0.001 ) .
label: result

string: The efficacy of FL-PDT was most pronounced in treating Olsen grade III AKs ( 69.4 % vs. 32.5 % ; P = 0.001 ) .
label: result

string: FL-PDT also showed a lower lesion recurrence rate than MAL-PDT ( 9.7 % vs. 26.6 % ; P = 0.004 ) .
label: result

string: Excellent or good cosmetic outcome was reported in > 90 % cases .
label: result

string: Erythema and hyperpigmentation intensities were higher in the FL-PDT group ( P > 0.05 ) .
label: result

string: Side-effects were more frequent in the FL-PDT group , but these were mild and well tolerated ( P > 0.05 ) .
label: result

string: The role of human chorionic gonadotropin ( hCG ) supplementation on the intrafollicular steroid milieu has been studied .

string: This was a prospective randomized dose-response study conducted at Copenhagen University Hospital , Rigshospitalet , Denmark .
label: method

string: From 62 in vitro fertilization patients , 334 FFs were selected for analyses .
label: method

string: Patients were treated using a GnRH agonist protocol with recombinant FSH 150 IU/d and randomized from stimulation day 1 to supplementation with hCG : D0 , 0 IU/d ; D50 , 50 IU/d ; D100 , 100 IU/d ; and D150 , 150 IU/d .
label: method

string: Intrafollicular hormone concentrations in relation to treatment groups , follicular sizes , and embryo quality were measured .
label: method

string: In large follicles , hCG supplementation induced a nearly 3-fold increase of estradiol ( nanomoles per liter ) [ D0 : 1496 ; D50 : 3138 ; D100 : 4338 ; D150 : 4009 ( P < .001 ) ] , a significant 3-fold increase of androstenedione , and a 5-fold increase of T ( nanomoles per liter ) [ D0 : 15 ; D50 : 38 ; D100 : 72 ; D150 : 56 ( P < .001 ) ] .
label: result

string: The estradiol to T ratio decreased significantly , with the lowest ratio in D100 and the highest in D0 .
label: result

string: Large follicles giving rise to good-quality embryos had significantly higher estradiol and progesterone levels and estradiol to T , estradiol to androstenedione , and progesterone to estradiol ratios , compared with small follicles , leading to poor-quality embryos .
label: result

string: Randomized controlled study .

string: Fifty-one participants aged mean ( SD ) 25.6 ( 5.7 ) years were randomly divided into three groups : Hatha Yoga Group , Resistance Exercise Group and Control Group .
label: method

string: The Hatha Yoga Group and Resistance Exercise Group participated in sessions three days per week for 7 weeks and the Control Group did not participate in any sessions .

string: Olive oil ( OO ) consumption is associated with cardiovascular disease prevention because of both its oleic acid and phenolic contents .
label: background

string: The capacity of OO phenolics to protect against low-density lipoprotein ( LDL ) oxidation is the basis for a health claim by the European Food Safety Authority .
label: background

string: Proteomic biomarkers enable an early , presymptomatic diagnosis of disease , which makes them important and effective , but understudied , tools for primary prevention .
label: background

string: Self-reported healthy participants ( n = 69 ) were randomly allocated ( stratified block random assignment ) according to age and body mass index to supplementation with a daily 20-mL dose of OO either low or high in phenolics ( 18 compared with 286 mg caffeic acid equivalents per kg , respectively ) for 6 wk .

string: Urinary proteomic biomarkers were measured at baseline and 3 and 6 wk alongside blood lipids , the antioxidant capacity , and glycation markers .

string: The consumption of both OOs improved the proteomic CAD score at endpoint compared with baseline ( mean improvement : -0.3 for low-phenolic OO and -0.2 for high-phenolic OO ; P < 0.01 ) but not CKD or diabetes proteomic biomarkers .
label: result

string: However , there was no difference between groups for changes in proteomic biomarkers or any secondary outcomes including plasma triacylglycerols , oxidized LDL , and LDL cholesterol .
label: result

string: A total of 720 H. pylori positive patients with duodenal ulcer disease were enrolled at 10 different hospitals in Jiangxi province in China .
label: method

string: The patients were randomly assigned to four treatment groups as follows : patients in Groups 1 and 3 received rabeprazole ( 10 mg ) , amoxicillin ( 1000 mg ) and furazolidone ( 100 mg ) twice daily for 7 and 10 d , respectively ; patients in Groups 2 and 4 received rabeprazole ( 10 mg ) , bismuth ( 220 mg ) , amoxicillin ( 1000 mg ) and furazolidone ( 100 mg ) twice daily for 7 and 10 d , respectively .
label: method

string: The primary outcome measure was H. pylori eradication rate 4 wk after treatment by intention-to-treat and per protocol analysis , while the secondary outcome measures were symptom and sign changes at the end of treatment and 4 wk after the end of treatment , as well as the proportion of patients who developed adverse events .

string: The demographic data of the four groups were not significantly different .
label: result

string: Overall , 666 patients completed the scheme and were re-assessed with the ( 13 ) C-urea breath test .
label: result

string: The intention-to-treat analysis of the H. pylori eradication rates in Groups 1 , 2 , 3 and 4 were 74.44 % , 82.78 % , 78.89 % and 86.11 % , respectively .
label: result

string: The H. pylori eradication rate in Group 4 was significantly higher than that in Group 1 .
label: result

string: According to the per protocol analysis , the H. pylori eradication rates in Groups 1 , 2 , 3 and 4 were 81.21 % , 89.22 % , 85.54 % and 92.26 % , respectively .
label: result

string: The H. pylori eradication rate in Group 4 was significantly higher than that in Group 1 .
label: result

string: The number of adverse events was 15 ( 8.3 % ) , 16 ( 8.9 % ) , 15 ( 8.3 % ) and 17 ( 9.4 % ) in Groups 1 , 2 , 3 and 4 , respectively , including dizziness , vomiting , diarrhea , nausea , skin rash , itchy skin , and malaise .

string: The symptoms were relieved without special treatment in all of the patients .

string: Emotional eating in children has been related to the consumption of energy-dense foods and obesity , but the development of emotional eating in young children is poorly understood .
label: background

string: Forty-one parent-child dyads were recruited to participate in this longitudinal study , which involved parents and children being observed consuming a standard lunch , completing questionnaire measures of parental feeding practices , participating in a research procedure to induce child emotion ( or a control procedure ) , and observing children 's consumption of snack foods .
label: method

string: Children at ages 5-7 y who were exposed to a mild emotional stressor consumed significantly more calories from snack foods in the absence of hunger than did children in a control group .
label: result

string: Parents who reported the use of more food as a reward and restriction of food for health reasons with their children at ages 3-5 y were more likely to have children who ate more under conditions of negative emotion at ages 5-7 y.
label: result

string: Uptake of chlamydia screening by men in England has been substantially lower than by women .
label: background

string: Non-traditional settings such as sports clubs offer opportunities to widen access .
label: background

string: Involving people who are not medically trained to promote screening could optimise acceptability .
label: background

string: We developed two interventions to explore the acceptability and feasibility of urine-based sexually transmitted infection ( STI ) screening interventions targeting men in football clubs .
label: method

string: We tested these interventions in a pilot cluster randomised control trial .
label: method

string: Six clubs were randomly allocated , two to each of three trial arms : team captain-led and poster STI screening promotion ; sexual health adviser-led and poster STI screening promotion ; and poster-only STI screening promotion ( control/comparator ) .
label: method

string: Primary outcome was test uptake .
label: method

string: Across the three arms , 153 men participated in the trial and 90 accepted the offer of screening ( 59 % , 95 % CI 35 % to 79 % ) .
label: result

string: Acceptance rates were broadly comparable across the arms : captain-led : 28/56 ( 50 % ) ; health professional-led : 31/46 ( 67 % ) ; and control : 31/51 ( 61 % ) .
label: result

string: However , rates varied appreciably by club , precluding formal comparison of arms .
label: result

string: No infections were identified .
label: result

string: Process evaluation confirmed that interventions were delivered in a standardised way but the control arm was unintentionally ` enhanced ' by some team captains actively publicising screening events .
label: result

string: A non-equivalent control group pre-post-test design was used with 43 preschool children diagnosed with asthma and required to be hospitalized for inhalation therapy .

label: result

string: Dacomitinib is an irreversible pan-EGFR family tyrosine kinase inhibitor .
label: background

string: Findings from a phase 2 study in non-small cell lung cancer showed favourable efficacy for dacomitinib compared with erlotinib .
label: background

string: We aimed to compare dacomitinib with erlotinib in a phase 3 study .
label: background

string: In a randomised , multicentre , double-blind phase 3 trial in 134 centres in 23 countries , we enrolled patients who had locally advanced or metastatic non-small-cell lung cancer , progression after one or two previous regimens of chemotherapy , Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group ( ECOG ) performance status of 0-2 , and presence of measurable disease .
label: method

string: We randomly assigned patients in a 1:1 ratio to dacomitinib ( 45 mg/day ) or erlotinib ( 150 mg/day ) with matching placebo .
label: method

string: Treatment allocation was masked to the investigator , patient , and study funder .
label: method

string: Randomisation was stratified by histology ( adenocarcinoma vs non-adenocarcinoma ) , ethnic origin ( Asian vs non-Asian and Indian sub-continent ) , performance status ( 0-1 vs 2 ) , and smoking status ( never-smoker vs ever-smoker ) .
label: method

string: The coprimary endpoints were progression-free survival per independent review for all randomly assigned patients , and for all randomly assigned patients with KRAS wild-type tumours .
label: method

string: The study has completed accrual and is registered with ClinicalTrials.gov , number NCT01360554 .
label: method

string: Between June 22 , 2011 , and March 12 , 2013 , we enrolled 878 patients and randomly assigned 439 to dacomitinib ( 256 KRAS wild type ) and 439 ( 263 KRAS wild type ) to erlotinib .
label: result

string: Median progression-free survival was 26 months ( 95 % CI 19-28 ) in both the dacomitinib group and the erlotinib group ( stratified hazard ratio [ HR ] 0941 , 95 % CI 0802-1104 , one-sided log-rank p = 0229 ) .
label: result

string: For patients with wild-type KRAS , median progression-free survival was 26 months for dacomitinib ( 95 % CI 19-29 ) and erlotinib ( 95 % CI 19-30 ; stratified HR 1022 , 95 % CI 0834-1253 , one-sided p = 0587 ) .
label: result

string: In patients who received at least one dose of study drug , the most frequent grade 3-4 adverse events were diarrhoea ( 47 [ 11 % ] patients in the dacomitinib group vs ten [ 2 % ] patients in the erlotinib group ) , rash ( 29 [ 7 % ] vs 12 [ 3 % ] ) , and stomatitis ( 15 [ 3 % ] vs two [ < 1 % ] ) .
label: result

string: Serious adverse events were reported in 52 ( 12 % ) patients receiving dacomitinib and 40 ( 9 % ) patients receiving erlotinib .
label: result

string: Pfizer .

string: Randomised controlled trial .

string: University hospital .

string: Two hundred and eighty women with miscarriage .

string: Women were randomised to receive supportive counselling from a nurse ( at diagnosis and 2 weeks later ) or routine care .
label: method

string: Psychological wellbeing was measured with the General Health Questionnaire ( GHQ-12 ) and Beck Depression Inventory ( BDI ) .
label: method

string: Primary outcome measured the proportion of women suffering psychological distress ( GHQ-12 score 4 ) at 3 months after miscarriage .

string: Secondary outcomes were GHQ-12 and BDI scores at 6 weeks , 3 and 6 months .

string: However , for the subgroup of women ( n = 152 ) with high baseline GHQ-12 scores , the median GHQ-12 score in the counselling group was significantly lower than the control group at 6 weeks ( median score 3 versus 4.5 in counselling and control groups ; P = 0.04 ) and 3 months ( median score 1 versus 2.5 in counselling and control groups ; P = 0.03 ) .
label: result

string: Similarly , for women with high baseline BDI scores ( BDI > 12 ) , the proportion for women continuing to score high was significantly lower in the counselling group 6 weeks after miscarriage ( 33.3 versus 61.1 % in counselling group and control group ; P = 0.03 ) .

string: A factorial design was employed to examine the two factors of moxibustion frequency and number of cones .
label: method

string: The two tested frequencies were three or six moxibustion sessions per week , and the two tested doses were one or two cones per treatment .
label: method

string: A total of 166 D-IBS patients were randomly divided into four treatment groups , which included each combination of the examined frequencies and doses .
label: method

string: The bilateral Tianshu acupoints ( ST25 ) and the Qihai acupoint ( RN6 ) were selected for aconite cake-separated moxibustion .

string: Each patient received two courses of treatment , and each course had a duration of 2 wk .
label: method

string: For each group , the scores on the Birmingham irritable bowel syndrome ( IBS ) symptom questionnaire , the IBS Quality of Life scale , the Self-Rating Depression Scale ( SDS ) , the Self-Rating Anxiety Scale ( SAS ) , the Hamilton Depression ( HAMD ) scale , and the Hamilton Anxiety ( HAMA ) scale were determined before treatment , after the first course of treatment , and after the second course of treatment .
label: method

string: The symptom , quality of life , SDS , SAS , HAMD , and HAMA scores of the patients in all 4 aconite cake-separated moxibustion groups were significantly lower after the first and second courses of treatment than before treatment ( P < 0.001 for all ) .
label: result

string: The symptom , quality of life , SDS , SAS , HAMD , and HAMA scores of the patients in all four aconite cake-separated moxibustion groups were significantly lower after the second course of treatment than after the first course of treatment ( P < 0.001 for all ) .
label: result

string: Between-group comparisons after the second course of treatment revealed that the symptom scores for group 1 ( 1 cone , 3 treatments/wk ) and group 3 ( 2 cones , 3 treatments/wk ) were significantly lower than that for group 2 ( 1 cone , 6 treatments/wk ) ( 5.55 5.05 vs 10.45 6.61 , P < 0.001 ; 5.65 4.00 vs 10.45 6.61 , P < 0.001 ) .
label: result

string: Regarding the two levels of the two examined factors for aconite cake-separated moxibustion , after the first course of treatment , the changes in HAMA scores were significantly different for the two tested moxibustion frequencies ( P = 0.011 ) , with greater changes for the `` 6 treatments/wk '' groups than for the `` 3 treatments/wk '' groups ; in addition , there were interaction effects between the number of cones and moxibustion frequency ( P = 0.028 ) .
label: result

string: After the second course of treatment , changes in symptom scores for the 2 tested moxibustion frequencies were significantly different ( P = 0.002 ) , with greater changes for the `` 3 treatments/wk '' groups than for the `` 6 treatments/wk '' groups .
label: result

string: Among 448 CLI patients treated from December 2009 to March 2011 , 48 patients ( 39 men ; mean age 72.77.8 years ) with chronic SFA in-stent occlusion were randomly assigned to treatment using LD+DEB ( n = 24 ) or DEB angioplasty alone ( n = 24 ) .

string: Three hundred eighty-one women with pT1N0 breast cancer were randomly assigned to sector resection with ( XRT group ) or without ( non-XRT group ) postoperative radiotherapy to the breast .
label: method

string: With follow-up through 2010 , we estimated cumulative proportion of recurrence , breast cancer death , and all-cause mortality .
label: method

string: The cumulative probability of a first breast cancer event of any type after 20 years was 30.9 % in the XRT group and 45.1 % in the non-XRT group ( hazard ratio [ HR ] , 0.58 ; 95 % CI , 0.41 to 0.82 ) .

string: The benefit of radiotherapy was achieved within the first 5 years .

string: After 20 years , 50.4 % of the women in the XRT group died compared with 54.0 % in the non-XRT group ( HR , 0.92 ; 95 % CI , 0.71 to 1.19 ) .

string: The cumulative probability of contralateral cancer or death as a result of cancer other than breast cancer was 27.1 % in the XRT group and 24.9 % in the non-XRT group ( HR , 1.17 ; 95 % CI , 0.77 to 1.77 ) .
label: result

string: In an anticipated low-risk group , the cumulative incidence of first breast cancer of any type was 24.8 % in the XRT group and 36.1 % in the non-XRT group ( HR , 0.61 ; 95 % CI , 0.35 to 1.07 ) .
label: result

string: Within-person randomized cross-over trial .
label: method

string: Comparison of a 24h on-call shift ( OCD ) compared to a routine working-day ( non on call , NOC ) in hospital .

string: 30 residents and senior physicians of the Department of Internal Medicine , Neurology and Otorhinolaryngology at the University Hospital Innsbruck .
label: method

string: Sleep variables , cognitive performance ( Concentration-Endurance d2 test ) , emotional status ( Eigenschaftswoerterliste 60S ) , serum-cortisol , urinary cortisol and noradrenaline , heart-rate variability , and saccadic eye movements were determined before and after OCD and NOC respectively .
label: method

string: Concentration-endurance performance was significantly reduced after OCD as compared to NOC by 16.4 % ( p < 0.001 ) .
label: result

string: Changes in emotional status consisted in a reduction of subjective concentration and performance related activation after OCD by 17.4 % ( p < 0.001 ) and 16.0 % ( p < 0.001 ) respectively together with a 21.8 % increase of general deactivation ( p < 0.001 ) and a 29.2 % rise of fatigue ( p < 0.001 ) .
label: result

string: On the contrary , subjective activation and raised mood showed an 18.3 % and 21.7 % increase after OCD ( p < 0.01 ) .
label: result

string: Urinary noradrenaline excretion ( 46 g/24 h , 19-97 ) was greater during OCD when compared to NOC ( 36 g/24 h , 10-54 , p < 0.01 ) .
label: result

string: Sympathetic activity measured by heart rate variability was significantly higher during OCD in contrast to NOC ( p < 0.05 ) .
label: result

string: Serum-cortisol was lower in the morning after ( 132 ng/l , 60-273 ) than the morning before OCD ( p < 0.01 ) .
