string: Finally , the number of short saccadic latencies was reduced after OCD ( p < 0.05 ) compared to NOC .
label: result

string: Chronic hemodynamically relevant pulmonary regurgitation ( PR ) resulting in important right ventricular dilation and ventricular dysfunction is commonly seen after tetralogy of Fallot ( TOF ) repair .
label: background

string: Late adverse clinical outcomes , including exercise intolerance , arrhythmias , heart failure and/or death accelerate in the third decade of life and are cause for considerable concern .
label: background

string: Timing of pulmonary valve replacement ( PVR ) to address chronic PR is controversial , particularly in asymptomatic individuals , and effect of PVR on clinical measures has not been determined .
label: background

string: Canadian Outcomes Registry Late After Tetralogy of Fallot Repair ( CORRELATE ) is a prospective , multicentre , Canada-wide cohort study .
label: method

string: Candidates will be included if they are 12 years of age , have had surgically repaired TOF resulting in moderate or severe PR , and are able to undergo cardiovascular magnetic resonance imaging .
label: method

string: Enrollment of > 1000 individuals from 15 participating centres ( Toronto , Montreal , Quebec City , Sherbrooke , Halifax , Calgary , Edmonton , and Vancouver ) is anticipated .
label: method

string: Clinical data , health-related quality of life metrics , and adverse outcomes will be entered into a web-based database .
label: method

string: A central core lab will analyze all cardiovascular magnetic resonance studies ( PR severity , right ventricular volumes , and ventricular function ) .
label: method

string: Major adverse outcomes ( sustained ventricular tachycardia and cardiovascular cause of death ) will be centrally adjudicated .
label: method

string: To the best of our knowledge , CORRELATE will be the first prospective pan-Canadian cohort study of congenital heart disease in children and adults .
label: result

string: Elevated fibrinogen ( Fg ) level is a known risk factor for ischemic stroke .
label: background

string: There are few clinical trials on oral fibrinogen-depleting therapies for secondary ischemic stroke prevention .
label: background

string: We aimed to assess the effects of one-year therapy with oral lumbrokinase enteric-coated capsules on secondary ischemic stroke prevention .
label: background

string: This is a multicenter , randomized , parallel group and controlled study that began treatment in hospitalized patients with ischemic stroke and continued for 12 months .
label: method

string: Patients were randomized to either the control group that received the standard stroke treatment or the fibrinogen-depleting group that received the standard stroke treatment plus enteric-coated lumbrokinase capsules .
label: method

string: The NIH Stroke Scale scores ( NIHSSs ) and plasma Fg level were recorded .
label: method

string: The carotid artery intima-media thickness ( IMT ) and status of plaques were examined through carotid ultrasound examination .
label: method

string: Primary outcomes included all-cause mortality , any event of recurrent ischemic stroke/transient ischemic attack ( TIA ) , hemorrhagic stroke , myocardial infarction and angina , and other noncerebral ischemia or hemorrhage .
label: method

string: Kaplan-Meier survival analysis and the Long-rank test were used to compare total vascular end point incidence between the two groups .
label: method

string: Comparison of median values between two groups was done by the Student t test , one-way analysis of variance ( ANOVA ) , or non-parametric rank sum test .
label: method

string: A total of 310 patients were enrolled , 192 patients in the treatment group and 118 patients in the control group .
label: result

string: Compared to the control group , the treatment group showed favorable outcomes in the Fg level , carotid IMT , the detection rate of vulnerable plaques , the volume of carotid plaques , NIHSS scores , and incidence of total vascular ( 6.78 % and 2.08 % , respectively ) and cerebral vascular events ( 5.93 % and 1.04 % , respectively ) ( P < 0.05 ) .
label: result

string: In the treatment group , the volume of carotid plaques was significantly related to the carotid IMT , the plaque diameter , width and number ( P = 0.000 , 0.000 , 0.000 , 0.022 ; F = 13.51 , 2.52 , 11.33 , -3.29 , but there was a weak correlation with the Fg level ( P = 0.056 ) .
label: result

string: After 1-year therapy , the incidence of overall vascular end points was reduced by 4.7 % .
label: result

string: The administration of uterotonic agents during cesarean delivery is highly variable .
label: background

string: The authors hypothesized a `` rule of threes '' algorithm , featuring oxytocin 3 IU , timed uterine tone evaluations , and a systematic approach to alternative uterotonic agents , would reduce the oxytocin dose required to obtain adequate uterine tone .
label: background

string: Sixty women undergoing elective cesarean delivery were randomized to receive a low-dose bolus or continuous infusion of oxytocin .
label: method

string: To blind participants , the rule group simultaneously received intravenous oxytocin ( 3 IU/3 ml ) and a `` wide-open '' infusion of 0.9 % normal saline ( 500 ml ) ; the standard care group received intravenous 0.9 % normal saline ( 3 ml ) and a `` wide-open '' infusion of oxytocin ( 30 IU in 0.9 % normal saline/500 ml ) .
label: method

string: Uterine tone was assessed at 3 , 6 , 9 , and 12 min , and if inadequate , additional uterotonic agents were administered .
label: method

string: Uterine tone , total dose and timing of uterotonic agent use , maternal hemodynamics , side effects , and blood loss were recorded .
label: method

string: Adequate uterine tone was achieved with lower oxytocin doses in the rule versus standard care group ( mean , 4.0 vs. 8.4 IU ; point estimate of the difference , 4.4 1.0 IU ; 95 % CI , 2.60 to 6.15 ; P < 0.0001 ) .
label: result

string: No additional oxytocin or alternative uterotonic agents were needed in either group after 6 min .
label: result

string: No differences in the uterine tone , maternal hemodynamics , side effects , or blood loss were observed .
label: result

string: Patients with untreated , operable stage II-IVb HNSCC were randomized 5:5:3 to erlotinib , erlotinib-sulindac , or placebo .
label: method

string: Tumor specimens were collected before and after seven to 14 days of treatment .
label: method

string: The primary endpoint was change in Ki67 proliferation index .
label: method

string: We hypothesized an ordering effect in Ki67 reduction : erlotinib-sulindac > erlotinib > placebo .
label: method

string: We evaluated tissue microarrays by immunohistochemistry for pharmacodynamic modulation of EGFR and COX2 signaling intermediates .
label: method

string: From 2005-2009 , 47 patients were randomized for the target 39 evaluable patients .
label: result

string: Thirty-four tumor pairs were of sufficient quality to assess biomarker modulation .
label: result

string: Ki67 was significantly decreased by erlotinib or erlotinib-sulindac ( omnibus comparison , two-sided Kruskal-Wallis , P = 0.04 ) .
label: result

string: Wilcoxon pairwise contrasts confirmed greater Ki67 effect in both erlotinib groups ( erlotinib-sulindac vs. placebo , P = 0.043 ; erlotinib vs. placebo , P = 0.027 ) .
label: result

string: There was a significant trend in ordering of Ki67 reduction : erlotinib-sulindac > erlotinib > placebo ( two-sided exact Jonckheere-Terpstra , P = 0.0185 ) .
label: result

string: Low baseline pSrc correlated with greater Ki67 reduction ( R ( 2 ) = 0.312 , P = 0.024 ) .
label: result

string: Some smokers may benefit from a therapy that combines different nicotine replacement therapies ( NRT ) or drugs with different mechanisms of action.The aim of this study was to determine the efficacy of the combined therapy of varenicline and nicotine patches versus varenicline monotherapy .
label: background

string: Three hundred forty-one smokers who smoked 20 or more cigarettes per day were recruited from a smoking cessation clinic between February 2012 and June 2013 .
label: method

string: The participants were randomized to receive a varenicline plus nicotine patch of 21 mg every 24 hours ( 170 ) or varenicline plus a placebo patch ( 171 ) .
label: method

string: All of the smokers received a standard 12-week course of varenicline and an 11-week course of either the placebo patch or the active patch after the target quit day .
label: method

string: Both groups received behavioral support .
label: method

string: The primary outcome was continuous abstinence for weeks 2 through 12 confirmed by exhaled levels of carbon monoxide .
label: method

string: Post hoc subgroup analyses were performed to evaluate the treatment effects for a specific endpoint in subgroups of smokers .
label: method

string: The combination of the nicotine patch with varenicline was not associated with higher rates of continuous abstinence at 12 weeks ( 39.1 % versus 31.8 % ; odds ratio ( OR ) 1.24 ; 95 % confidence interval ( CI ) 0.8 to 2.6 ) and 24 weeks ( 32.8 % versus 28.2 % ; OR 1.17 ; 95 % CI 0.4 to 1.9 ) .
label: result

string: When participants were analyzed by subgroups according to cigarette consumption , the abstinence rates among smokers who smoked more than 29 cigarettes per day at 12 weeks ( OR 1.39 ; 95 % CI 1.2 to 2.5 ) and 24 weeks ( OR 1.46 ; 95 % CI 1.2 to 2.8 ) were significantly higher in the combination group .
label: result

string: Other post hoc analyses based on level of dependence and previous quit attempts did not show subgroup differences .
label: result

string: No differences between the groups for the reported adverse events were observed ( 2 value 0.07 ; P 0.79 ) .
label: result

string: This study is registered at clinicaltrial.gov ( NCT01538394 ) .
label: background

string: Back pain is a common and disabling condition for people in rural and remote areas .
label: background

string: In these areas , access to rehabilitation services is limited by service availability .
label: background

string: Telerehabilitation is suggested as a solution for providing physical therapy services ; however , the validity of clinical assessment is largely unproven .
label: background

string: The aim of this study was to establish the validity of clinically pragmatic remote assessment of spinal posture , active movements of the lumbar spine , and the passive straight leg raise ( SLR ) test .
label: background

string: Face-to-face physical therapist assessment was compared with telerehabilitation assessment of spinal posture , active movements of the lumbar spine , and the SLR test .
label: method

string: Twenty-six participants recruited from a rural population with current or recent low back pain ( LBP ) were assessed by a face-to-face physical therapist and a remote physical therapist .
label: method

string: Pain , disability , and clinical measurements were assessed .
label: method

string: Outcomes were compared to establish agreement .
label: method

string: High levels of agreement were found with detecting pain with specific lumbar movements , eliciting symptoms , and sensitizing the SLR test .
label: result

string: Moderate agreement occurred with identifying the worst lumbar spine movement direction , SLR range of motion , and active lumbar spine range of motion .
label: result

string: Poor agreement occurred with postural analysis and identifying reasons for limitations to lumbar movements .
label: result

string: Airway hyperresponsiveness ( AHR ) to indirect agents like mannitol is thought to be dependent on concurrent airway inflammation as these stimuli exert their effects via the release of bronchoconstricting mediators from inflammatory cells .
label: background

string: Airway inflammation correlates negatively with deep inhalation bronchoprotection against direct stimuli like methacholine .
label: background

string: We hypothesised that deep inhalation bronchoprotection to methacholine would be absent and airway inflammation would be present in individuals with AHR to inhaled mannitol .
label: background

string: Twenty asthmatic , otherwise healthy individuals , either gender , aged 18-65 years , with a Visit 1 ( screening ) methacholine two-minute tidal breathing PC20 of 16 mg/mL or less completed the study .
label: method

string: Visits 2 and 3 consisted of either mannitol or deep inhalation methacholine challenge in random order , at least 24 h apart .
label: method

string: All visits were completed within a period of two weeks .
label: method

string: Eleven of the twenty participants had AHR to mannitol ( PD15 635 mg , the `` responders '' ) and nine did not ( the `` non-responders '' ) .
label: result

string: Responders did not bronchoprotect to methacholine via deep inhalation ( doubling dose shift = 0.7 ; p = 0.13 ) and had high levels of exhaled nitric oxide ( geometric mean 49 ppb ; range 16-109 ppb ) .
label: result

string: Conversely , significant deep inhalation bronchoprotection to methacholine occurred in the non-responder group ( doubling dose shift = 1.6 ; p = 0.013 ) .
label: result

string: This group also had significantly lower levels of exhaled nitric oxide ( geometric mean 23 ppb ( range 16-45 ppb ; p = 0.015 ) .
label: result

string: FMD and NMD were measured using the UNEXEF18G before and after 4-week treatment of rosuvastatin ( 5 mg/day ) with or without atenolol ( 25 mg/day ) in 44 hypercholesterolemic patients ( 708 years old , LDL-C > 140 mg/dL ) with hypertension .
label: method

string: Patients were randomly allocated to two treatment arms : rosuvastatin alone ( R-group , N. = 22 ) and rosuvastatin with atenolol ( RA-group , N. = 22 ) .
label: method

string: Baseline FMD was not different between the two treatment arms , and both groups showed improvement in FMD ( R-group , 3.481.9 % to 4.652.41 % , P < 0.05 ; RA-group , 3.421.48 % to 5.461.79 % , P < 0.05 ) , while there were no differences in NMD .
label: result

string: The effects on lipid profiles were identical in the two groups .
label: result

string: In addition , FMD improvement was greater in the RA-group than in the R-group ( change 2.151.29 % vs. 1.161.15 % , P < 0.05 ) .
label: result

string: The design of the study was a two armed cluster randomized controlled trial .
label: method

string: In total 43 primary care practices in the Netherlands participated in the study .
label: method

string: Eventually , 180 patients were included ( 114 collaborative stepped care , 66 care as usual ) .
label: method

string: Baseline measures and follow-up measures ( 3 , 6 , 9 and 12 months ) were assessed using questionnaires .
label: method

string: We applied the TiC-P , the SF-HQL and the EQ-5D respectively measuring health care utilization , production losses and health related quality of life .
label: method

string: The average annual direct medical costs in the collaborative stepped care group were 1854 Euro ( 95 % C.I. , 1726 to 1986 ) compared to 1503 ( 95 % C.I. , 1374 to 1664 ) in the care as usual group .
label: result

string: The average quality of life years ( QALYs ) gained was 0.05 higher in the collaborative stepped care group , leading to an incremental cost effectiveness ratio ( ICER ) of 6965 Euro per QALY .
label: result

string: Inclusion of the productivity costs , consequently reflecting the full societal costs , decreased the ratio even more .
label: result

string: trialregister.nl , Netherlands Trial Register NTR107 .
label: background

string: A within-trial cost-utility analysis with a 2-year time horizon , based on a multicentre factorial , non-inferiority randomised controlled trial .
label: method

string: 23 hospital ophthalmology clinics .
label: method

string: 610 patients aged 50years with untreated nAMD in the study eye .
label: method

string: 0.5 mg ranibizumab or 1.25 mg bevacizumab given continuously ( monthly ) or discontinuously ( as-needed ) for 2years .
label: method

string: Quality-adjusted life-years ( QALYs ) .
label: method

string: Total 2-year costs ranged from 3002/patient ( $ 4700 ; 95 % CI 2601 to 3403 ) for discontinuous bevacizumab to 18590/patient ( $ 29106 ; 95 % CI 18258 to 18922 ) for continuous ranibizumab .
label: result

string: Ranibizumab was significantly more costly than bevacizumab for both continuous ( +14989 / patient ( $ 23468 ) ; 95 % CI 14522 to 15456 ; p < 0.001 ) and discontinuous treatment ( +8498 ( $ 13305 ) ; 95 % CI 7700 to 9295 ; p < 0.001 ) , with negligible difference in QALYs .
label: result

string: Continuous ranibizumab would only be cost-effective compared with continuous bevacizumab if the NHS were willing to pay 3.5 million ( $ 5.5 million ) per additional QALY gained .
label: result

string: Patients receiving continuous bevacizumab accrued higher total costs ( +599 ( $ 938 ) ; 95 % CI 91 to 1107 ; p = 0.021 ) than those receiving discontinuous bevacizumab , but also accrued non-significantly more QALYs ( +0.020 ; 95 % CI -0.032 to 0.071 ; p = 0.452 ) .
label: result

string: Continuous bevacizumab therefore cost 30220 ( $ 47316 ) per QALY gained versus discontinuous bevacizumab .
label: result

string: However , bootstrapping demonstrated that if the NHS is willing to pay 20000/QALY gained , there is a 37 % chance that continuous bevacizumab is cost-effective versus discontinuous bevacizumab .
label: result

string: ISRCTN92166560 .
label: background

string: Nasal packing is usually performed to control bleeding after endoscopic sinus surgery ( ESS ) .
label: background

string: Although new packing materials have been developed , they still cause pain .
label: background

string: This study was designed to evaluate the effect of lidocaine-soaked packs on pain after ESS .
label: background

string: A prospective , randomized , double-blind controlled trial was conducted in 63 patients with CRS undergoing ESS .
label: method

string: At the conclusion of the operation , 2 % lidocaine-soaked biodegradable synthetic polyurethane foam and saline-soaked polyurethane foam were inserted in both nasal cavities of 31 patients and 32 control patients , respectively .
label: method

string: The same lidocaine or saline was reapplied into the nasal packs at postoperative 8 hours .
label: method

string: Pain was evaluated using a visual analog scale at postoperative 1 , 4 , 8 , 16 , 20 , and 24 hour ( s ) .
label: method

string: The number of gauze that cleaned the blood around the nose was counted .
label: method

string: Heart rate , rhythm , and blood pressures were checked preoperatively and postoperatively to evaluate the influence of lidocaine on vital signs .
label: method

string: Postoperative pain decreased in lidocaine group at all of the postoperative time periods ( p < 0.05 ) .
label: result

string: Lidocaine reduced postoperative bleeding at postoperative 8 and 24 hours .
label: result

string: Changes of blood pressure from preoperative values in the lidocaine group were not different from those in the control group ( p > 0.05 ) .
label: result

string: Heart rate in the lidocaine group was more stable than that in the control group ( p < 0.05 ) .
label: result

string: Hypertension is poorly controlled .
label: background

string: Team-based care and changes in the process of care have been proposed to address these quality problems .
label: background

string: However , assessing care processes is difficult because they are often confounded even in randomized behavioral studies by unmeasured confounders based on discretion of health care providers .
label: background

string: Data were obtained from two prospective , cluster randomized controlled clinical trials ( Trial A and B ) implementing physician-pharmacist collaborative interventions compared with usual care over six months in community-based medical offices in the Midwest .
label: method

string: Multivariate linear regression models with both instrumental variable methods and as-treated methods were utilized .
label: method

string: Instruments were indicators for trial and study arms .
label: method

string: Models of blood pressure change and costs included both process measures , demographic variables , and clinical variables .
label: method

string: The analysis included 496 subjects .
label: result

string: As-treated methods showed no significant associations between process and outcomes .
label: result

string: The instruments used in the study were insufficient to simultaneously identify distinct process effects .
label: result

string: However , the post-hoc instrumental variable models including one process measure at a time while controlling for the other process demonstrated significant associations between the processes and outcomes with estimates considerably larger than as-treated estimates .
label: result

string: Corticosteroids are widely used for treatment of Bell 's palsy in patients with diabetes mellitus but may induce complications like hyperglycemia , which calls for an alternative therapy .
label: background

string: This study aimed to ascertain the effect of SGB on Bell 's palsy in patients with diabetes mellitus .
label: background

string: This randomized and single-blinded clinical trial involved 96 diabetic patients with Bell 's palsy that were randomly divided into a control group ( n = 48 ) and a treatment group ( SGB group , n = 48 ) .
label: method

string: The House-Brackmann scale and facial disability index ( FDI , including FDIP and FDIS ) were observed before treatment and at 1 and 3 months after treatment for assessment of the outcome .
label: method

string: No statistically significant difference was found between the two groups before treatment as regards the House-Brackmann scale and FDI .
label: result

string: There was a statistically significant difference in FDIP score in the two groups after treatment in comparison with before treatment .
label: result

string: The FDIS score showed a statistical difference between the two groups after treatment .
label: result

string: Infections with soil-transmitted helminths ( Ascaris lumbricoides , hookworm , and Trichuris trichiura ) are widespread and often occur concomitantly .
label: background

string: These parasitic-worm infections are typically treated with albendazole or mebendazole , but both drugs show low efficacy against T. trichiura .
label: background

string: Albendazole is the drug of choice against hookworm .
label: background

string: In this double-blind trial conducted on Pemba Island , Tanzania , we randomly assigned children , 6 to 14 years of age , to receive one of four treatments : oxantel pamoate at a dose of 20 mg per kilogram of body weight , plus 400 mg of albendazole , administered on consecutive days ; oxantel pamoate at a single dose of 20 mg per kilogram ; albendazole at a single dose of 400 mg ; or mebendazole at a single dose of 500 mg .
label: method

string: We assessed the efficacy and safety profile of oxantel pamoate-albendazole when used in the treatment of T. trichiura infection ( primary outcome ) and concomitant soil-transmitted helminth infection ( secondary outcome ) .
label: method

string: Efficacy was determined by means of assessment of the cure rate and egg-reduction rate .
label: method

string: Adverse events were assessed four times after treatment .
label: method

string: Complete data were available for 458 children , of whom 450 were infected with T. trichiura , 443 with hookworm , and 293 with A. lumbricoides .
label: result

string: The cure rate of T. trichiura infection was significantly higher with oxantel pamoate-albendazole than with mebendazole ( 31.2 % vs. 11.8 % , P = 0.001 ) , as was the egg-reduction rate ( 96.0 % [ 95 % confidence interval { CI } , 93.5 to 97.6 ] vs. 75.0 % [ 95 % CI , 64.2 to 82.0 ] ) .
label: result

string: The cure rate with albendazole ( 2.6 % ) and the egg-reduction rate with albendazole ( 45.0 % ; 95 % CI , 32.0 to 56.4 ) were significantly lower than the rates with mebendazole ( P = 0.02 for the comparison of cure rates ) .
label: result

string: Oxantel pamoate had low efficacy against hookworm and A. lumbricoides .
label: result

string: Adverse events ( mainly mild ) were reported by 30.9 % of all children .
label: result

string: A number of studies have described influenza vaccination coverage during pregnancy but few publications have described rates of other vaccinations .
label: background

string: Pregnancies ending in 2002 through 2009 and vaccinations administered during these pregnancies were identified in the VSD .
label: method

string: Vaccination rates per 1000 pregnancies during the study period were calculated by vaccine type , recommendation category , pregnancy year , maternal age , and trimester .
label: method

string: Analyses were conducted in 2012-2013 .
label: method

string: In the VSD , 669,695 pregnancies and 141,389 vaccinations were identified .
label: result

string: Trivalent inactivated influenza ( TIV ) was the most commonly administered vaccination ( 174.1 doses per 1000 pregnancies ) and was most often administered during the 2nd and 3rd trimesters .
label: result

string: The most common vaccines in the `` consider if indicated '' category were tetanus-diphtheria ( 6.1 per 1000 ) and hepatitis B ( 3.7 per 1000 ) .
label: result

string: Contraindicated vaccination was infrequent , and the majority of these were measles-mumps-rubella ( MMR ) ( 1.2 per 1000 ) ; varicella ( 1.0 per 1000 ) ; and live-attenuated influenza vaccine ( LAIV ) ( 0.3 per 1000 ) .
label: result

string: Both `` consider if indicated '' and contraindicated vaccines were more frequently administered during early pregnancy .
label: result

string: The role of lipid-lowering treatments in renoprotection for patients with diabetes is debated .
label: background

string: We studied the renal effects of two statins in patients with diabetes who had proteinuria .
label: background

string: PLANET I was a randomised , double-blind , parallel-group trial done in 147 research centres in Argentina , Brazil , Bulgaria , Canada , Denmark , France , Hungary , Italy , Mexico , Romania , and the USA .
label: method

string: We enrolled patients with type 1 or type 2 diabetes aged 18 years or older with proteinuria ( urine protein : creatinine ratio [ UPCR ] 500-5000 mg/g ) and taking stable angiotensin-converting enzyme inhibitors , angiotensin receptor blockers , or both .
label: method

string: We randomly assigned participants to atorvastatin 80 mg , rosuvastatin 10 mg , or rosuvastatin 40 mg for 52 weeks .
label: method

string: The primary endpoint was change from baseline to week 52 of mean UPCR in each treatment group .
label: method

string: The study is registered with ClinicalTrials.gov , number NCT00296374 .
label: method

string: We enrolled 353 patients : 118 were assigned to rosuvastatin 10 mg , 124 to rosuvastatin 40 mg , and 111 to atorvastatin 80 mg ; of these , 325 were included in the intention-to-treat population .
label: result

string: UPCR baseline : week 52 ratio was 087 ( 95 % CI 077-099 ; p = 0033 ) with atorvastatin 80 mg , 102 ( 088-118 ; p = 083 ) with rosuvastatin 10 mg , and 096 ( 083-111 ; p = 053 ) with rosuvastatin 40 mg .
label: result

string: In a post-hoc analysis to compare statins , we combined data from PLANET I with those from PLANET II ( a similar randomised parallel study of 237 patients with proteinuria but without diabetes ; registered with ClinicalTrials.gov , NCT00296400 ) .
label: result

string: In this analysis , atorvastatin 80 mg lowered UPCR significantly more than did rosuvastatin 10 mg ( -156 % , 95 % CI -283 to -05 ; p = 0043 ) and rosuvastatin 40 mg ( -182 % , -302 to -42 ; p = 0013 ) .
label: result

string: Adverse events occurred in 69 ( 60 % ) of 116 patients in the rosuvastatin 10 mg group versus 79 ( 64 % ) of 123 patients in the rosuvastatin 40 mg group versus 63 ( 57 % ) of 110 patients in the atorvastatin 80 mg group ; renal events occurred in nine ( 78 % ) versus 12 ( 98 % ) versus five ( 45 % ) .
label: result

string: Single-blinded parallel-group interventional randomised controlled trial .
label: method

string: Tertiary care centre in southern India .
label: method

string: Randomised at 2 weeks postnatal age to EI and LI groups and evaluated at 2 , 6 and 12 weeks postnatal age .
label: method

string: The primary outcome was serum ferritin level at 12 weeks , and the secondary outcomes were the incidence of neonatal morbidities , haemoglobin level , anthropometric parameters and blood transfusion requirements .
label: result

string: Of the 104 babies randomised , outcomes were analysed in 46 and 47 babies in EI and LI groups , respectively .
label: result

string: Serum ferritin level was significantly higher ( p < 0.001 ) at 12 weeks ( 825 vs 633 ng/mL ) in the EI group .
label: result

string: Haemoglobin ( 10.10.4 vs 9.20.4 g/dL ) and mean corpuscular haemoglobin concentration ( 310.5 vs 29.40.5 g/dL ) were also significantly ( p < 0.001 ) higher at 12 weeks in the EI group .
label: result

string: There was a significant decrease of ferritin in the LI group and significant increase in ferritin in the EI group at 6 weeks compared with 2 weeks .
label: result

string: There were no significant differences in the incidences of neonatal morbidities ( necrotising enterocolitis , periventricular leukomalacia , retinopathy of prematurity ) , anthropometric parameters and blood transfusion requirements between the two groups .
label: result

string: This was a 76-week , prospective , open-label , randomized study in patients aged 50 to 85 years .
label: method

string: Primary outcomes included incidence of , and discontinuation due to , predefined adverse events ( AEs ) potentially arising from worsening of Parkinson disease motor symptoms with capsules .
label: method

string: Secondary outcomes included frequency of AEs/serious AEs .
label: method

string: Efficacy outcomes included Alzheimer 's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living ( ADCS-ADL ) , Neuropsychiatric Inventory ( NPI-10 ) , and Mattis Dementia Rating Scale ( MDRS ) .
label: method

string: Five hundred eighty-three patients were randomized to rivastigmine capsules ( n = 295 ) or patch ( n = 288 ) .
label: result

string: Incidence of predefined AEs was 36.1 % for capsules , 31.9 % for patch ; discontinuation due to worsening of motor symptoms was 4.4 % and 2.4 % , respectively .
label: result

string: Most common AEs were nausea ( capsules , 40.5 % ; patch , 8.3 % ) , tremor ( 24.5 % ; 9.7 % ) , fall ( 17.0 % ; 20.1 % ) , vomiting ( 15.3 % ; 2.8 % ) , and application site erythema ( 0 % ; 13.9 % ) .
label: result

string: Significant efficacy in favor of capsules was observed at weeks 24 to 76 on MDRS ; 24 and 76 on NPI-10 ; weeks 52 and 76 on ADCS-ADL .
label: result

string: In patients with Mini-Mental State Examination ( MMSE ) greater than 21 , no differences in efficacy on MDRS and ADCS-ADL were observed at any time point ; significant differences in favor of capsules were maintained in patients with MMSE less than or equal to 21 .
label: result

string: This prospective , single-centre , non-inferiority randomised BuMA-OCT trial enrolled patients with de novo coronary artery lesions , treated with either the BuMA or the EXCEL stent .
label: result

string: The study primary endpoint was OCT-evaluated stent strut coverage at three months .
label: result

string: Secondary endpoints were neointimal thickness of stent struts , and incomplete stent apposition evaluated with OCT. .
label: result

string: A total of 80 patients were randomly assigned to receive the BuMA ( n = 40 ) or the EXCEL ( n = 40 ) stent .
label: result

string: In OCT follow-up ( achieved in 86.3 % of cases : BuMA , n = 33 ; EXCEL , n = 36 ) , the percentage of stent strut coverage was significantly higher in the BuMA vs. the EXCEL group ( strut level : 94.2 % vs. 90.0 % , p < 0.01 ; p ( non-inferiority ) < 0.0001 ; p ( superiority ) < 0.0001 ) , while the proportion of malapposed struts ( strut level : 1.28 % vs. 1.80 % , p = 0.51 ) and the mean neointimal thickness ( strut level : 0.070.03 mm vs. 0.060.02 mm , p = 0.31 ) were similar .
label: result

string: Rates of myocardial infarction ( periprocedural non-Q-wave , 7.5 % vs. 7.5 % , p = 1.00 ) and target lesion failure ( 7.5 % vs. 7.5 % , p = 1.00 ) were similar between groups , with no cardiac death or stent thrombosis .
label: result

string: Randomized controlled trial .
label: method

string: Level III neonatal unit from Mumbai , India .
label: method

string: 50 very-low-birthweight ( birth weight between 1000 to 1500 grams ) preterm ( gestational age between 28 to 32 weeks ) neonates randomized to glycerine suppository ( n = 25 ) or no intervention ( n = 26 ) .
label: method

string: Glycerin suppository ( 1g ) once a day from day-2 to day-14 of life or no suppository , along with intermittent oral feeds and standardized care .
label: method

string: Time required to achieve full enteral feeds ( 180 mL/kg/d ) .
label: method

string: Baseline characteristics of neonates like gestational age , birthweight , gender and age at the time of introduction of feeds were comparable in both groups .
label: result

string: The mean ( SD ) duration to reach full enteral feed was 11.90 ( 3.1 ) days in glycerin suppository group and was not significantly different ( P = 0.58 ) from control group , [ 11.33 ( 3.57 ) days ] .
label: result

string: Glycerin suppository group regained birth weight 2 days earlier than control group but this difference was not significant ( P = 0.16 ) .
label: result

string: There was no significant difference in duration of hospital stay or occurrence of necrotizing enterocolitis amongst the two study groups .
label: result

string: Eligible patients had high-risk International Federation of Gynecology and Obstetrics stage I or stage II to IV epithelial ovarian , primary peritoneal , or fallopian tube cancer and were not selected for EGFR expression .
label: method

string: All patients underwent first-line platinum-based chemotherapy ( CT ) and showed no signs of progression at the end of CT. .
label: method

string: Patients were randomly assigned to maintenance erlotinib 150 mg orally daily for 2 years or to observation .
label: method

string: EGFR immunohistochemistry ( IHC ) , fluorescent in situ hybridization ( FISH ) , and mutation analyses were performed in 318 patients .
label: method

string: Between October 2005 and February 2008 , 835 patients were randomly assigned ( median follow-up , 51 months ) .
label: result

string: Twenty-six percent of the patients stopped erlotinib as a result of adverse effects ( of these , 67 % were due to rash ) .
label: result

string: For erlotinib and observation , respectively , the median progression-free survival was 12.7 and 12.4 months ( hazard ratio [ HR ] , 1.05 ; 95 % CI , 0.90 to 1.23 ) , and the median overall survival was 50.8 and 59.1 months ( HR , 0.99 ; 95 % CI , 0.81 to 1.20 months ) , respectively .
label: result

string: No subgroup could be identified with improved effect of erlotinib , based on IHC or FISH for EGFR , or mutations in genes related to the EGFR pathway , or on rash during erlotinib therapy .
label: result

string: However , patients with a positive FISH EGFR score had a worse overall survival ( 46.1 months ) than those with a negative score ( 67.0 months ; HR , 1.56 ; 95 % CI , 1.01 to 2.40 ; P = .044 ) .
label: result

string: Global health/quality-of-life scores showed a significant difference during the first year ( P = .0102 ) in favor of the observation arm .
label: result

string: A total of 122 hypercholesterolemic subjects were given 160 mg of anthocyanins twice daily or placebo ( n = 61 of each group ) for 24 weeks in a double-blind , randomized , placebo-controlled trial .
label: method

string: Participants and investigators were masked to treatment allocation .
label: method

string: Anthocyanin consumption significantly increased HDL cholesterol and decreased low - density lipoprotein cholesterol concentrations compared with placebo ( P < .018 and P < .001 , respectively ) .
label: result

string: Anthocyanin supplementation also increased the activity of HDL-PON1 compared with placebo ( P < .001 ) .
label: result

string: Furthermore , cholesterol efflux capacity was increased more in the anthocyanin group ( 20.0 % increase ) than in the placebo group ( 0.2 % increase ) ( P < .001 ) .
label: result

string: The negative correlations established between HDL-PON1 activity and the levels of lipid hydroperoxides associated with HDL confirm the relationship between PON1 activity and lipid peroxidation of lipoproteins .
label: result

string: Furthermore , a strong positive correlation was noted between increased HDL-PON1 activity and improved cholesterol efflux capacity both before and after adjustment for HDL cholesterol and apolipoprotein AI in anthocyanin-treated subjects ( both P < .001 ) .
label: result

string: Inhibition of HDL-PON1 activity strongly prevented the antioxidant ability of HDL and attenuated the cholesterol efflux capacity of subjects from anthocyanin group .
label: result

string: Studies in animals and in vitro and phase 2 studies in humans suggest that statins may be beneficial in the treatment of the acute respiratory distress syndrome ( ARDS ) .
label: background

string: This study tested the hypothesis that treatment with simvastatin would improve clinical outcomes in patients with ARDS .
label: background

string: In this multicenter , double-blind clinical trial , we randomly assigned ( in a 1:1 ratio ) patients with an onset of ARDS within the previous 48 hours to receive enteral simvastatin at a dose of 80 mg or placebo once daily for a maximum of 28 days .
label: method

string: The primary outcome was the number of ventilator-free days to day 28 .
label: method

string: Secondary outcomes included the number of days free of nonpulmonary organ failure to day 28 , mortality at 28 days , and safety .
label: method

string: The study recruited 540 patients , with 259 patients assigned to simvastatin and 281 to placebo .
label: result

string: The groups were well matched with respect to demographic and baseline physiological variables .
label: result

string: There was no significant difference between the study groups in the mean ( SD ) number of ventilator-free days ( 12.69.9 with simvastatin and 11.510.4 with placebo , P = 0.21 ) or days free of nonpulmonary organ failure ( 19.411.1 and 17.811.7 , respectively ; P = 0.11 ) or in mortality at 28 days ( 22.0 % and 26.8 % , respectively ; P = 0.23 ) .
label: result

string: There was no significant difference between the two groups in the incidence of serious adverse events related to the study drug .
label: result

string: Two hundred patients received warm needling treatment were collected from January to December 2011 and were randomized into an observation group and a control group , 100 cases veceived ten hundreds of treatment in each group .
label: method

string: In the control group , the routine nursing was applied in warm needling moxibustion .
label: method

string: In the observation group , on the basic method as the control group , the nursing intervention was used .
label: method

string: The burns incidence and the satisfaction of patients in warm needling moxibustion were recorded in the patients of the two groups .
label: method

string: The burns incidence was 0.6 % ( 6/1000 ) in the observation group , which was lower apparently than 1.5 % ( 15/1000 ) in the control group ( P < 0.05 ) .
label: result

string: The satisfaction of patients in warm needling moxibustion was 99.0 % ( 99/100 ) in the observation group , which was higher obviously than 88.0 % ( 88/100 ) in the control group ( P < 0.01 ) .
label: result

string: Parallel-group randomized trial .
label: method

string: Chronic care geriatric facility .
label: method

string: Residents aged 65 and older prescribed with at least one medication ( N = 359 ) were randomized to receive usual pharmaceutical care or undergo medication intervention .
label: method

string: Screening medications with STOPP/START criteria followed up with recommendations to the chief physician .
label: method

string: The outcome measures assessed at the initiation of the intervention and 1year later were number of hospitalizations and falls , Functional Independence Measure ( FIM ) , quality of life ( measured using the Medical Outcomes Study 12-item Short-Form Health Survey ) , and costs of medications .
label: method

string: The average number of drugs prescribed was significantly lower in the intervention than in the control group after 1year ( P < .001 ) .
label: result

string: The average drug costs in the intervention group decreased by 103 shekels ( US$ 29 ) per participant per month ( P < .001 ) .
label: result

string: The average number of falls in the intervention group dropped significantly ( P = .006 ) .
label: result

string: Rates of hospitalization , FIM scores , and quality of life measurements were similar for both groups .
label: result

string: A total of 101 CHD patients were randomized into two groups : treatment group ( n = 45 ) receiving standard treatment for CHD plus Liandouqingmai recipe , and control group ( n = 56 ) receiving standard treatment only .
label: method

string: The control group contained 16 normal healthy subjects .
label: method

string: Changes in hs-C-reactive protein ( CRP ) , peripheral blood leucocytes ( PBL ) , and interleukin ( IL ) -6 and IL-10 levels were measured .
label: method

string: The Seattle Angina Questionnaire ( SAQ ) was used to determine patient QOL before and after treatment for 2 weeks .
label: method

string: Before treatment , SAQ scores [ physical limitation ( PL ) , angina stability ( AS ) , angina frequency ( AF ) , treatment satisfaction ( TS ) , and disease perception ( DP ) ] were not statistically different between groups .
label: result

string: After treatment , AS and DP levels of controls were significantly increased compared with the other groups , while PL , AS , AF , TS , and DP levels of the treatment group were significantly increased compared with controls .
label: result

string: Treatment group SAQ scores ( PL , AS , AF , TS , and DP ) were significantly higher than for controls .
label: result

string: CHD patient IL-6 and IL-10 levels were significantly higher than controls .
label: result

string: Before treatment , mean levels of IL-6 , hs-CRP and PBL of the two groups were not statistically different .
label: result

string: After treatment , mean levels of IL-6 , IL-10 , hs-CRP and PBL of the two groups were significantly decreased compared with their before treatment values , and levels of IL-6 , hs-CRP , and PBL of the treatment group were lower than controls .
label: result

string: Although mean IL-10 levels of both groups decreased , there was no significant difference in between-group and in-roup comparisons before and after treatment .
label: result

string: Mean levels of IL-6 and IL-10 in the normal group were lower than in CHD patients .
label: result

string: SAQ scores of QOL were negatively associated with the inflammatory index ( IL-6 / IL-10 ) , and there was a significant negative association of IL-10 with AS ( r = - 0.15 , P < 0.05 ) .
label: result

string: In adult patients who are critically ill and mechanically ventilated , daily interruption of sedation ( DSI ) is an effective method of improving sedation management , resulting in a decrease of the duration of mechanical ventilation , the length of stay in the intensive care unit ( ICU ) and the length of stay in the hospital .
label: background

string: It is a safe and effective approach and is common practice in adult ICUs .
label: background

string: For critically ill children it is unknown if DSI is effective and feasible .
label: background

string: The aim of this multicenter randomized controlled trial is to evaluate the safety and efficacy of daily sedation interruption in critically ill children .
label: background

string: Children between 0 and 18 years of age who require mechanical ventilation , with an expected duration of at least 48 h and need for sedative infusion , will be included .
label: method

string: After enrollment patients will be randomly assigned to DSI in combination with protocolized sedation ( intervention group ) or protocolized continuous sedation ( control group ) .
label: method

string: A sedation protocol that contains an algorithm for increasing and weaning of sedatives and analgesics will be used .
label: method

string: The sedative infusion will be restarted if the patient becomes uncomfortable or agitated according to the sedation protocol .
label: method

string: The primary endpoint is the number of ventilator-free days at 28 days .
label: method

string: A small literature suggests that pharmacotherapy may be useful in the prophylaxis of posttraumatic stress disorder in patients presenting with major trauma .
label: background

string: There is relatively little data , however , on the use of selective serotonin reuptake inhibitors ( SSRIs ) in this context .
label: background

string: 24 week , double-blind placebo controlled study .
label: method

string: 31 participants presenting immediately after trauma , and meeting diagnostic criteria for full or partial acute stress disorder were randomized to treatment with 10-20 mg of escitalopram or placebo daily for 24 weeks .
label: method

string: 2 participants were excluded from the analysis due to early drop out , leaving 29 participants ( escitalopram = 12 , placebo = 17 ) for inclusion in an intent - to - treat analysis .
label: method

string: Participants were followed up until 56 weeks , and assessed with the Clinician Administered PTSD Scale ( CAPS ) .
label: method

string: A mixed model repeated measures analysis of variance ( RMANOVA ) was undertaken to determine the efficacy of the intervention on the CAPS score .
label: method

string: There was a significant reduction in CAPS score over the course of treatment ( F ( 7 , 142 ) = 41.58 , p < 0.001 ) in both the escitalopram and placebo groups , with a greater reduction in CAPS score in the placebo group F ( 7 , 142 ) = 2.12 , p = 0.045 .
label: result

string: There were improvements on all secondary measures , including the Clinical Global Impressions scale , and scales assessing depression , anxiety and disability .
label: result

string: Only functional disability outcomes ( F ( 7 , 141 ) = 2.13 , p = .04 ) , were significantly different between treatment and placebo groups .
label: result

string: In the sample as a whole , improvement in scores were maintained at the 52 week follow-up .
label: result

string: Side effects were comparable between the groups .
label: result

string: Clinical Trials NCT00300313 .
label: background

string: Participants ( n = 17190 ) were divided into three groups according to achieved blood pressure ( BP ) : controlled ( BP < 140/90 mmHg on three or fewer drugs ) ; uncontrolled ( BP 40/90 mmHg on two or fewer drugs ) ; or resistant ( BP 40/90 mmHg on three drugs or any patient on at least four drugs ) .
label: method

string: The prevalence of res-HTN was 38 % : significant predictors of res-HTN included heart failure [ odds ratio ( OR ) 1.73 ] , diabetes ( OR 1.63 ) , Black race ( OR 1.50 ) , and US residence ( OR 1.50 ) .
label: result

string: Compared with controlled HTN , res-HTN had multivariate-adjusted association with higher risk of adverse outcomes { first occurrence of all-cause death , nonfatal myocardial infarction , or nonfatal stroke [ hazard ratio 1.27 , 95 % confidence interval ( CI ) 1.13-1 .43 ] , and individual outcomes of all-cause death ( hazard ratio 1.29 , 95 % CI 1.13-1 .48 ) , cardiovascular mortality ( hazard ratio 1.47 , 95 % CI 1.21-1 .78 ) , and nonfatal stroke ( hazard ratio 1.61 , 95 % CI 1.17-2 .22 ) , but not nonfatal myocardial infarction ( hazard ratio 0.98 , 95 % CI 0.72-1 .34 ) } .
label: result

string: Adverse outcomes , except nonfatal stroke , did not differ in patients with res-HTN compared to uncontrolled HTN .
label: result

string: Patients with a recent myocardial infarction ( MI ) present a reduction in functional capacity expressed as a decrease in peak oxygen consumption ( Vo2 peak ) .
label: background

string: The impact of a Tai Chi Chuan ( TCC ) cardiac rehabilitation program for patients recovering from recent MI has yet to be assessed .
label: background

string: Our goal is to evaluate functional capacity after a TCC-based cardiac rehabilitation program in patients with recent MI .
label: background

string: A single-blind randomized clinical trial was conducted .
label: method

string: The researchers who performed the tests were blinded to group allocation .
label: method

string: Between the 14th and 21st days after hospital discharge , all patients performed a cardiopulmonary exercise testing and a laboratory blood workup .
label: method

string: Mean age was similar ( 569 years in the TCC group and 609 years in the control group ) .
label: method

string: Patients allocated to the intervention group performed 3 weekly sessions of TCC Beijin style for 12 weeks ( n = 31 ) .
label: method

string: The control group participated in 3 weekly sessions of full-body stretching exercises ( n = 30 ) .
label: method

string: After the 12-week study period , participants in the TCC group experienced a significant 14 % increase in Vo2 peak from baseline ( 21.6 5.2 to 24.6 5.2 mL/kg per minute ) , whereas control participants had a nonsignificant 5 % decline in Vo2 peak ( 20.4 5.1 to 19.4 4.4 mL/kg per minute ) .
label: result

string: There was a significant difference between the 2 groups ( P < .0001 ) .
label: result

string: The - aminobutyric acid type B-receptor agonist lesogaberan ( AZD3355 ) has been developed for use in patients with gastroesophageal reflux disease ( GERD ) symptoms despite proton pump inhibitor ( PPI ) therapy ( partial responders ) .
label: background

string: This study aimed to explore the dose-response effect of lesogaberan on reflux episodes in partial responders .
label: background

string: In this randomized , single-centre , double-blind , crossover , placebo-controlled study , partial responders taking optimised PPI therapy were given 30 , 90 , 120 and 240mg doses of lesogaberan .
label: method

string: Each dose was given twice ( 12h apart ) during a 24-h period , during which impedance-pH measurements were taken .
label: method

string: Twenty-five patients were included in the efficacy analysis and 27 in the safety analysis .
label: result

string: The effect of lesogaberan on the mean number of reflux episodes was dose-dependent , and all doses significantly reduced the mean number of reflux episodes relative to placebo .
label: result

string: Lesogaberan also dose-dependently reduced the mean number of acid reflux episodes ( except the 30mg dose ) and weakly acid reflux episodes ( all doses ) significantly , relative to placebo .
label: result

string: Regardless of dose , lesogaberan had a similar effect on the percentage of time with esophageal pH < 4 [ mean reduction : 68.5 % ( 30mg ) , 54.2 % ( 90mg ) , 65.9 % ( 120mg ) , 72.1 % ( 240mg ) ; p < 0.05 except 90mg dose ] .
label: result

string: No adverse events led to discontinuation and no serious adverse events occurred during active treatment .
label: result

string: ClinicalTrials.gov identifier : NCT01043185 .
label: background

string: Seventy aged edentulous patients with severe residual alveolar ridge resorption were recruited in this study and randomly assigned into two groups , thirty-five each .
label: method

string: In Group A , patients received complete denture with lingualized occlusion , and in Group B , patients received complete denture with anatomic occlusion .

string: The condition of TMD was examined and recorded by the same TMD specialist at baseline , 3 months and 6 months following denture delivery .

string: The recovery effect of TMD was evaluated according to Fricton Index .

string: Related data were analyzed statistically with t-test and rank sum test .
label: method

string: Three months following denture delivery , the craniomandibular index ( CMI ) decrease value was ( 0.064 0.022 ) in group A , and was significantly higher than that in group B ( 0.043 0.018 ) ( P < 0.01 ) .
label: result

string: Six months following denture delivery , the CMI decrease value was ( 0.084 0.020 ) in group A , and was significantly higher than that in group B ( 0.070 0.021 ) ( P = 0.011 < 0.05 ) .

string: This randomized controlled trial at two university medical centers enrolled 227 overweight or obese adults with type 2 diabetes and assigned them to parallel in-person diet and exercise counseling , with prepackaged foods in a planned menu during the initial phase , or to usual care ( UC ; two weight loss counseling sessions and monthly contacts ) .
label: method

string: Relative weight loss was 7.4 % ( 95 % CI 5.7-9 .2 % ) , 9.0 % ( 7.1-10 .9 % ) , and 2.5 % ( 1.3-3 .8 % ) for the lower fat , lower carbohydrate , and UC groups ( P < 0.001 intervention effect ) .
label: result

string: Glycemic control markers and triglyceride levels were lower in the intervention groups compared with UC group at 1 year ( fasting glucose 141 [ 95 % CI 133-149 ] vs. 159 [ 144-174 ] mg/dL , P = 0.023 ; hemoglobin A1c 6.9 % [ 6.6-7 .1 % ] vs. 7.5 % [ 7.1-7 .9 % ] or 52 [ 49-54 ] vs. 58 [ 54-63 ] mmol/mol , P = 0.001 ; triglycerides 148 [ 134-163 ] vs. 204 [ 173-234 ] mg/dL , P < 0.001 ) .
label: result

string: The lower versus higher carbohydrate groups maintained lower hemoglobin A1c ( 6.6 % [ 95 % CI 6.3-6 .8 % ] vs. 7.2 % [ 6.8-7 .5 % ] or 49 [ 45-51 ] vs. 55 [ 51-58 ] mmol/mol ) at 1 year ( P = 0.008 ) .
label: result

string: Chronic ischemia related occult systolic dysfunction of the right ventricle is difficult to detect using traditional echocardiography .
label: background

string: The aim of this study was to verify the diagnostic value of speckle-tracking echocardiography in proximal right coronary artery ( pRCA ) lesion-induced right ventricular ( RV ) occult dysfunction .
label: background

string: One hundred forty-two patients undergoing elective coronary angiography for suspected coronary artery disease were divided into two groups according to involvement of the right coronary artery .
label: method

string: In further analysis , significant stenosis before the acute marginal branch was defined as pRCA involvement and compared with a control group .
label: method

string: Global longitudinal strain and RV free wall longitudinal train ( RVLS-FW ) were measured using speckle-tracking echocardiography .
label: method

string: Other traditional parameters to evaluate RV function were also measured .
label: method

string: Eighty-seven patients in the right coronary artery group ( 61.2 % ) displayed significant decreases in the magnitudes of both global longitudinal strain ( -13.65 3.83 % vs -15.69 4.37 % , P = .04 ) and RVLS-FW ( -16.04 5.4 % vs -21.18 4.6 % , P = .04 ) , independent of other parameters .
label: result

string: Conversely , when focusing on pRCA involvement , only RVLS-FW showed significant attenuation in the group with pRCA involvement ( -14.26 4.32 % vs -19.96 4.8 % , P = .001 ) .
label: result

string: On multivariate analysis , RVLS-FW was still independently lower in the group with pRCA involvement ( odds ratio , 1.07 ; 95 % confidence interval , 1.01-1 .14 ; P = .02 ) .
label: result

string: Despite efforts to identify effective interventions to implement evidence-based practice ( EBP ) , uncertainty remains .
label: background

string: Few existing studies involve occupational therapists or resource-constrained contexts .
label: background

string: This study aimed to determine whether an interactive educational intervention ( IE ) was more effective than a didactic educational intervention ( DE ) in improving EBP knowledge , attitudes and behaviour at 12 weeks .
label: background

string: A matched pairs design , randomised controlled trial was conducted in the Western Cape of South Africa .
label: method

string: Occupational therapists employed by the Department of Health were randomised using matched-pair stratification by type ( clinician or manager ) and knowledge score .
label: method

string: Allocation to an IE or a DE was by coin-tossing .
label: method

string: A self-report questionnaire ( measuring objective knowledge and subjective attitudes ) and audit checklist ( measuring objective behaviour ) were completed at baseline and 12 weeks .
label: method

string: The primary outcome was EBP knowledge at 12 weeks while secondary outcomes were attitudes and behaviour at 12 weeks .
label: method

string: Data collection occurred at participants ' places of employment .
label: method

string: Audit raters were blinded , but participants and the provider could not be blinded .
label: method

string: Twenty-one of 28 pairs reported outcomes , but due to incomplete data for two participants , 19 pairs were included in the analysis .
label: result

string: There was a median increase of 1.0 points ( 95 % CI = -4.0 , 1.0 ) in the IE for the primary outcome ( knowledge ) compared with the DE , but this difference was not significant ( P = 0.098 ) .
label: result

string: There were no significant differences on any of the attitude subscale scores .
label: result

string: The median 12-week audit score was 8.6 points higher in the IE ( 95 % CI = -7.7 , 27.0 ) but this was not significant ( P = 0.196 ) .
label: result

string: Within-group analyses showed significant increases in knowledge in both groups ( IE : T = 4.0 , P < 0.001 ; DE : T = 12.0 , P = 0.002 ) but no significant differences in attitudes or behaviour .
label: result

string: Pan African Controlled Trials Register PACTR201201000346141 , registered 31 January 2012 .

string: Clinical Trials NCT01512823 , registered 1 February 2012 .

string: South African National Clinical Trial Register DOH2710093067 , registered 27 October 2009 .

string: The first participants were randomly assigned on 16 July 2008 .

string: One hundred and forty-six burn patients with hypertrophic scar ( s ) were randomly divided into an experimental group and a control group .
label: method

string: All patients received standard rehabilitation therapy for hypertrophic scars and 76 patients ( massage group ) additionally received burn scar rehabilitation massage therapy .
label: method

string: Both before and after the treatment , we determined the scores of visual analog scale ( VAS ) and itching scale and assessed the scar characteristics of thickness , melanin , erythema , transepidermal water loss ( TEWL ) , sebum , and elasticity by using ultrasonography , Mexameter ( ) , Tewameter ( ) , Sebumeter ( ) , and Cutometer ( ) , respectively .
label: method

string: The scores of both VAS and itching scale decreased significantly in both groups , indicating a significant intragroup difference .
label: result

string: With regard to the scar characteristics , the massage group showed a significant decrease after treatment in scar thickness , melanin , erythema , TEWL and a significant intergroup difference .
label: result

string: In terms of scar elasticity , a significant intergroup difference was noted in immediate distension and gross skin elasticity , while the massage group significant improvement in skin distensibility , immediate distension , immediate retraction , and delayed distension .
label: result

string: Eosinophilic esophagitis ( EoE ) is a chronic antigen-driven allergic inflammatory disease , likely involving the interplay of genetic and environmental factors , yet their respective contributions to heritability are unknown .
label: background

string: Family history was obtained from a hospital-based cohort of 914 EoE probands ( n = 2192 first-degree `` Nuclear-Family '' relatives ) and an international registry of monozygotic and dizygotic twins/triplets ( n = 63 EoE `` Twins '' probands ) .
label: method

string: Frequencies , recurrence risk ratios ( RRRs ) , heritability , and twin concordance were estimated .
label: method

string: Environmental exposures were preliminarily examined .
label: method

string: Analysis of the Nuclear-Family-based cohort revealed that the rate of EoE , in first-degree relatives of a proband , was 1.8 % ( unadjusted ) and 2.3 % ( sex-adjusted ) .
label: result

string: RRRs ranged from 10 to 64 , depending on the family relationship , and were higher in brothers ( 64.0 ; P = .04 ) , fathers ( 42.9 ; P = .004 ) , and males ( 50.7 ; P < .001 ) than in sisters , mothers , and females , respectively .
label: result

string: The risk of EoE for other siblings was 2.4 % .
label: result

string: In the Nuclear-Family cohort , combined gene and common environment heritability was 72.0 % 2.7 % ( P < .001 ) .
label: result

string: Hemorrhage and liver failure are the two major complications in partial hepatectomy .
label: background

string: The finger fracture or clamp crushing technique has been a standard technique used for transection of liver parenchyma .
label: background

string: Hepatic vascular Inflow occlusion ( Pringle maneuver , PM ) is often used to minimize blood loss , but hepatic ischemia-reperfusion may result with an increased risk of post-operative liver failure .
label: background

string: The Harmonic scalpel ( HS ) has been shown to be effective in reducing blood loss during liver parenchymal transection without any hepatic vascular inflow occlusion .
label: background

string: A randomized controlled trial was carried out to evaluate the impact of the two different hepatic transection techniques .
label: method

string: The post-operative short-term results were compared .
label: method

string: During the study period , 160 of 212 patients who received partial hepatectomy in our hospital were randomized into 2 groups : the PM group ( n = 80 ) and the HS group ( n = 80 ) .
label: result

string: The numbers of patient who had a poor liver function on post-operative day 5 ( ISLGS Grade B ) were 30 , and 18 , respectively ( p < 0.05 ) .
label: result

string: The post-operative complication rate was significantly higher in the PM group ( 41.3 % versus 22.5 % , p < 0.05 ) .
label: result

string: The HS group had significantly less blood loss and blood transfusion requirements than the PM group ( p < 0.05 ) .
label: result

string: Although both researchers and practitioners widely recognize therapeutic alliance 's importance in general psychotherapy , studies specific to alcohol use treatments have produced mixed results and generally do not investigate if and how alliance changes over course of treatment .

string: Using parallel process latent growth curve modeling , the authors examined if increase in alliance was associated with reduced drinking behaviors and a statistical mediator in the relationship between treatment modality and outcome .

label: method

label: method

string: More than 50 % of children in Nepal are malnourished .
label: background

string: Economic growth and poverty reduction are not always sufficient to improve the health and nutritional status of children .
label: background

string: Heifer Nepal uses livestock training as a tool for community development and poverty alleviation but does not directly address child health and nutrition .
label: background

string: The study was a 2-year , longitudinal , randomized , controlled trial in six communities in Nepal ( both Terai and hills ) , pair-matched for specific characteristics , randomly assigned to receive Heifer community development activities at baseline ( intervention ) or 1 year ( control ) .
label: method

string: At 6-month intervals over a period of 2 years , child anthropometric and comprehensive household surveys were performed .
label: method

string: Four hundred fifteen households were enrolled containing 607 children 6 months to 5 years of age .
label: result

string: The intervention and control communities were equivalent for baseline socioeconomic status , household size , ownership of land and animals , and child nutrition and health .
label: result

string: At 12 months ( prior to animal donations ) , the Terai intervention group had improved child weight ( p = .04 ) , improved child height ( p = .05 ) , and reduced sick days ( p = .03 ) , as well as increased household income ( p = .004 ) , increased ownership of animals ( p = .04 ) and land ( p = .04 ) , and improved sanitation practices ( p < .01 ) .
label: result

string: In all districts , longer participation in Heifer activities corresponded to more improvement in child height-for-age z-scores .
label: result

string: Better diet quality has been associated with less weight gain over time .
label: background

string: However , few studies have examined the role of diet quality during weight loss .
label: background

string: This study aimed to compare changes in diet quality in overweight/obese adults during a weight loss intervention , and determine whether an association between diet quality score and weight loss exists .
label: background

string: Overweight or obese ( BMI 25-40kg / m2 ) adults , aged 18-60 years , were recruited from the Hunter Region of NSW , Australia and randomized to one of three groups : a standard online weight loss program ( n = 94 ) ; an enhanced version of this online program that provided additional personalized feedback and reminders ( n = 98 ) ; or a wait-list control group ( n = 97 ) .
label: method

string: Diet quality was calculated using the Australian Recommended Food Score ( ARFS ) with dietary data from the Australian Eating Survey ( AES ) Food Frequency Questionnaire at baseline and 12-weeks .
label: method

string: The basic and enhanced groups lost significantly more weight than the control group after 12weeks ( basic -2.23.4 kg , enhanced -3.04.0 kg , control 0.42.4 kg , P < 0.001 ) with no difference between the basic and enhanced groups .
label: result

string: The mean change in ARFS in the enhanced group ( 2.25.7 ) was significantly higher ( P = 0.03 ) than the control group .
label: result

string: There were no significant differences in change in ARFS between the enhanced and basic , or basic and control groups .
label: result

string: The ARFS and the fruit , meat , wholegrain , dairy and water sub-scale scores at 12weeks were significantly associated with greater weight loss ( P < 0.05 ) .
label: result

string: We conducted a multicenter trial in which 450 couples used the single-size diaphragm , 300 randomized to acid-buffering gel and 150 to nonoxynol-9 , for at least 190 days and six menstrual cycles .

string: ClinicalTrials.gov , www.clinicaltrials.gov , NCT00578877 .
label: background

string: The prevalence of chronic venous disease is high and occurs more frequently in females .
label: background

string: According to the clinical , etiological , anatomical , and pathological classification ( CEAP ) definition , the reticular veins are included in the C1 class and are mainly associated with aesthetic complaints .
label: background

string: Several invasive techniques are used for treatment , including mini phlebectomy , laser ablation , and radiofrequency ablation .
label: background

string: However , a wide range of sclerosing agents may serve as minimally invasive alternatives , promoting chemical sclerosis of the vein wall .
label: background

string: Although this technique is routinely performed around the world , there is no consensus on the most efficacious and safe chemical agent to be used .
label: background

string: Inclusion criteria are women between 18 and 69 years old with at least 10 cm long reticular veins in the lower limbs , on the outer side of the leg/thigh .
label: method

string: Patients with CEAP 2 to 6 , or with allergies , pregnancy , performing breastfeeding , or with any dermatologic or clinical problems will be excluded .

string: Patients with venous ultrasound mapping showing involvement of saphenous trunks and/or a deep venous system will also be excluded .
label: method

string: Just one limb and one session per patient will be performed .
label: method

string: The sclerosing agent volume will not exceed 5 mL .
label: method

string: Clinical follow-up will include visits on days 7 and 60 , always with photographic documentation .

string: Prospective , randomized , fellow-eye-controlled study .
label: method

string: The setting was a single academic institution .

label: method

string: One eye of each patient was randomized to undergo wavefront-guided LASIK by the AMO Visx CustomVue S4 IR excimer laser system ; the fellow eye received wavefront-optimized LASIK by the Alcon Allegretto Wave Eye-Q 400 Hz excimer laser system .

string: Whole grain ( WG ) options are often limited in schools , which may impact rural , low-income students who rely on school meals for a substantial portion of their food intake .

string: Glaucoma is one of the leading causes of blindness .
label: background

string: Reduction of intraocular pressure is the only proven way to prevent progression of glaucomatous optic neuropathy .

string: Patients were randomly divided into two groups .

string: The non-Internet access ( NIA ) group consisted of patients who had access to the Internet-based glaucoma care support system during the 4-year period only when they were examined by ophthalmologists .
label: method

string: The Internet access ( IA ) group consisted of patients who had the same Internet-based glaucoma care support system access as the NIA group for the first 2 years following enrollment but who were also given free access to the glaucoma care support system for the remaining 2 years .

label: method

string: A total of 185 non-contact-sport players ( non-CSPs ) and 59 contact-sport players ( CSPs ) with no history of mTBI were randomly allocated to one of two conditions in which they read either a vignette depicting a sport-related mTBI ( mTBIsport ) or a motor-vehicle-accident-related mTBI ( mTBIMVA ) .

string: Numerous studies have demonstrated that sleep promotes memory consolidation , but there is little research on the effect of hypnotics on sleep-dependent memory consolidation .

string: We compared bedtime administration of zolpidem-ER 12.5 mg ( 6 - to 8-h duration of action ) , middle-of-the-night administration of zaleplon 10 mg ( 3 - to 4-h duration of action ) , and placebo to examine the effect of different durations of hypnotic drug exposure on memory consolidation during sleep .

string: Twenty-two participants with no sleep complaints underwent 3 conditions in a counterbalanced crossover study : ( 1 ) zolpidem-ER 12.5 mg ( bedtime dosing ) , ( 2 ) zaleplon 10 mg ( middle-of-the-night dosing ) , and ( 3 ) placebo .
label: method

string: Memory testing was conducted before and after an 8-h sleep period , using a word pair association task ( WPT ; declarative memory ) and a finger-tapping task ( FTT ; procedural memory ) .

label: result

string: Improvement in memory performance following sleep was lower with bedtime dosing of zolpidem-ER compared to placebo and middle-of-the-night dosing of zaleplon .
label: result

string: There were no differences between placebo and zaleplon .
label: result

string: IDeg + Lira reduced HbA1c ( -0.74 % - points ) significantly more than IDeg + IAsp ( -0.39 % - points ) ; estimated treatment difference ( ETD ) ( IDeg + Lira-IDeg + IAsp ) -0.32 % - points ( 95 % CI -0.53 ; -0.12 ) ; p = 0.0024 .

string: More IDeg + Lira ( 49.4 % ) than IDeg + IAsp ( 7.2 % ) subjects achieved HbA1c < 7.0 % without confirmed hypoglycaemia [ plasma glucose < 3.1 mmol/l ( < 56mg/dl ) or severe hypoglycaemia ) and without weight gain ; estimated odds ratio ( IDeg + Lira/IDeg + IAsp ) 13.79 ( 95 % CI 5.24 ; 36.28 ) ; p < 0.0001 .
label: result

string: IDeg + Lira subjects had significantly less confirmed and nocturnal confirmed hypoglycaemia , and significantly greater weight loss ( -2.8 kg ) versus IDeg + IAsp ( +0.9 kg ) ; ETD ( IDeg + Lira-IDeg + IAsp ) -3.75 kg ( 95 % CI -4.70 ; -2.79 ) ; p < 0.0001 .
label: result

string: Other than more gastrointestinal side effects with IDeg + Lira , no safety differences occurred .
label: result

string: Durability of IDeg was established in the non-randomized arm , as mean HbA1c remained < 7.0 % [ mean 6.5 % ( 48mmol/mol ) at end-of-trial ] .
label: result

string: Sixty-six slaughterhouse workers with upper-limb chronic pain and work disability were randomly allocated to 10 weeks of either strength training for the shoulder , arm , and hand muscles ( 3 times per week , 10 minutes per session ) or ergonomic training ( usual care control group ) from September to December 2012 .
label: method

string: The outcome measure was the change from baseline to 10-week follow-up in the work ability index ( WAI ) .
label: method

string: A priori hypothesis testing showed a grouptime interaction for WAI ( P < 0.05 ) .
label: result

string: Compared with the ergonomic training group , WAI increased 2.3 [ 95 % confidence interval ( 95 % CI ) 0.9-3 .7 ] in the strength training group corresponding to a moderate effect size ( Cohen 's d 0.52 ) .
label: result

string: Within-group changes indicated that between-group differences were mainly caused by a reduction in WAI in the ergonomic group .
label: result

string: Of the 7 items of WAI , item 2 ( work ability in relation to the demands of the job ) and item 7 ( mental resources ) increased following strength training compared with ergonomic training ( P < 0.05 ) .
label: result

string: Potential interactions between vaccines may compromise the immunogenicity and/or safety of individual vaccines so must be assessed before concomitant administration is recommended .
label: background

string: In this study , the immunogenicity and safety of travel vaccines against Japanese encephalitis ( JEV ) and rabies ( PCECV ) administered together with or without a quadrivalent meningococcal glycoconjugate ACWY-CRM vaccine were evaluated ( NCT01466387 ) .

string: Healthy adults aged 18 to 60 years were randomized to one of four vaccine regimens : JEV + PCECV + MenACWY-CRM , JEV + PCECV , PCECV or MenACWY-CRM .

string: Adverse events ( AEs ) were collected throughout the study period .

string: JEV + PCECV + MenACWY-CRM was non-inferior to JEV + PCECV .
label: result

string: Post-vaccination seroprotective neutralizing titers or concentrations were achieved in 98-99 % ( JE ) and 100 % ( rabies ) of subjects across the vaccine groups .
label: result

string: Antibody responses to vaccine meningococcal serogroups were in the same range for MenACWY-CRM and JEV + PCECV + MenACWY-CRM .

string: Rates of reporting of AEs were similar for JEV + PCECV and JEV + PCECV + MenACWY-CRM .
